Qǐng bǎ kǎoshì fēnshù tōngguò diànzǐyóujiàn jì gěi měi yí gè xuésheng。
请把考试分数通过电子邮件寄给每一个学生。
Your email and password will be provided in 3 working days.
Nín de diànzǐyóujiàn jí mìmǎ jiāng zài sān gè gōngzuòrì nèi tígōng。
您的电子邮件及密码将在三个工作日内提供。
I obviously was a little blundering in my last email to you.
Zài shàngcì gěi nǐ de diànzǐyóujiàn zhōng，wǒ yǒudiǎn kǒu wú zhēlán。
在上次给你的电子邮件中，我有点口无遮拦。
My email inbox gets clogged down with garbage every day.
Wǒ de diànzǐ yóujiàn shōujiànxiāng měi tiān dōu bèi lājī yóujiàn suǒ dǔsè。
我的电子邮件收件箱每天都被垃圾邮件所堵塞。
I need some way to stop being snowed under with emails.
Wǒ xūyào yìxiē zhōngzhǐ diànzǐyóujiàn xiàng xuěpiàn pū mǎn de fāngfǎ。
我需要一些终止电子邮件像雪片铺满的方法。
Someone hijacked my account and now I can\'t send emails.
Yǒu rén qiángxíng dēnglùle wǒ de zhànghù，xiànzài wǒ bù néng fāsòng diànzǐyóujiàn le。
有人强行登录了我的帐户，现在我不能发送电子邮件了。
This tax is always included in the price we send to you via email.
Wǒmen tōngguò diànzǐyóujiàn fā gěi nǐ de jiàgé zhōng zǒngshì bāohánle shuìfèi de。
我们通过电子邮件发给你的价格中总是包含了税费的。
As of now, they won\'t return my e-mails.
Zhízhì xiànzài，tāmen hái méiyǒu dáfù wǒ de diànzǐyóujiàn。
直至现在，他们还没有答复我的电子邮件。
If there is a good soul who would like to try to help me,please contact me by email.
Rúguǒ yǒu yuànyì shìzhe bāng wǒ de hǎorén，qǐng tōngguò diànzǐyóujiàn yǔ wǒ liánxì。
如果有愿意试着帮我的好人，请通过电子邮件与我联系。
Inquires or comments can be forwarded through E-mail.
Wèntí hé yìjiàn kěyǐ tōngguò diànzǐyóujiàn zhuǎndá。
问题和意见可以通过电子邮件转达。
We send notices to visitors, usually in the form of an e-mail.
Wǒmen tōngcháng yǐ diànzǐ yóujiàn de xíngshì xiàng yóukè fāchū tōngzhī。
我们通常以电子邮件的形式向游客发出通知。
They should assume their private email will get passed on.
Tāmen yīnggāi jiǎshè tāmen de sīrén diànzǐ yóujiàn dōu bèi fāsòng chūqù le。
他们应该假设他们的私人电子邮件都被发送出去了。
Viruses can be reduced by not opening email from unknown sources.
Bìngdú kěyǐ tōngguò bù dǎkāi wèizhī láiyuán de diànzǐ yóujiàn lái jiǎnshǎo。
病毒可以通过不打开未知来源的电子邮件来减少。
We do our best to reply to all the emails we receive.
Wǒmen jìnlì huífù shōudào de suǒyǒu diànzǐ yóujiàn。
我们尽力回复收到的所有电子邮件。
I will send the email straight away.
Wǒ huì lìjí fā fēng diànzǐ yóujiàn。
我会立即发封电子邮件。
Please take care to send your name, address, and either telephone number or e-mail address.
Qǐng xiǎoxīn fāsòng nǐ de xìngmíng， dìzhǐ， diànhuà hàomǎ huò diànzǐ yóujiàn dìzhǐ。
请小心发送你的姓名，地址，电话号码或电子邮件地址。
Within hours of the news, emails began winging their way across the Atlantic.

She e-mailed me the good news.
Tā bǎ zhège hǎoxiāoxī tōngguò diànzǐyóujiàn gàosu wǒ le。
她把这个好消息通过电子邮件告诉我了。
He sent e-mail to his fellow hackers.

Email is much faster than snail mail.

废水渗透
fèishuǐ shèntòu
waste water infiltration

His clothes were soaked with sweat.

tòulù fēngshēng
leak (or disclose) information

他顺口把我们的秘密透露出去了。

His host brought him a cup of tea, and half rising from his seat, he said, &quot;Thank you.&quot;
三杯酒入肚，他来了精神，话也多了。
Sān bēi jiǔ rù dù，tā lái le jīngshén，huà yě duō le。
After downing three glasses, he became lively and talkative.

bàodào shìjièbēi zúqiúsài sàikuàng

麻烦是她的突出特征
Once in a blue moon you get some problems.
偶尔你也碰到一些麻烦。
to go numb
[fingers，toes，arm+] 变麻
to numb the pain
麻痹疼痛
pins and needles
发麻
to be in trouble
惹麻烦
please don\'t trouble yourself
不麻烦您了
we have no wish to cause problems
我们并不想引起麻烦
to have a problem with money
在经济上有麻烦
The patient remains conscious with local anesthetic.
病人被局部麻醉后，头脑还是清醒的。
Joe doesn\'t know how bad she messed me up.
乔不知道她给我带来了多少麻烦。
The rapids near this town bring difficulties for canal makers.
这个镇附近的急流给运河建造者带来了麻烦。
You probably remember Yao Chin-feng: tall and thin, little round face, slightly pockmarked, thirtyish, been here three years and six months? Well, as a matter of fact it was she who started the strike.&quot;
你大概还记得这个姚金凤吧？瘦长条子，小圆脸儿，有几点细白麻粒，三十多岁，在厂里已经三年零六个月，这次怠工就是她开火的”
The best student in our class is a transfer student from MIT.
我们班最好的学生是麻省理工学院转来的转校生。
There were three children down with the measles and he had a whitlow on her thumb.
她有三个孩子正在出麻疹，她自己大姆指上又长了个疔。
Cindy is so worldly-wise that she handled various troubles when she was the personal assistant of that picky boss.
辛迪真是个善于处世的人，她在给那个麻烦的老总当私人助理的时候能把一切都处理地妥妥当当。
What\'s the matter with her? She looks as if she\'s zonked on drugs.
她怎么啦？看上去是因为吸大麻神志不清了。

通讯问题会给我们部队带来很多麻烦。

他在调解争端的过程中遇到了些麻烦。

我的生意遇到麻烦时，我请求他在资金方面支持我。

麻雀是这个地区的定居鸟。

麻疹是由一种特殊的真菌引起的。

Chákàn guòqù shí nián de cáizhèng jìlù huì shì yí jiàn máfánshì。
查看过去十年的财政记录会是一件麻烦事。

没有必要再麻烦你，我得到了一直要找的东西。

单向水流只有在你逆流而上时才会造成麻烦。

Jiǔjīng ràng wǒ de wèijué biàn de mámù。

You probably remember Yao Chin-feng: tall and thin, little round face, slightly pockmarked, thirtyish, been here three years and six months? Well, as a matter of fact it was she who started the strike.&quot;
你大概还记得这个姚金凤吧？瘦长条子，小圆脸儿，有几点细白麻粒，三十多岁，在厂里已经三年零六个月，这次怠工就是她开火的”
You probably remember Yao Chin-feng: tall and thin, little round face, slightly pockmarked, thirtyish, been here three years and six months? Well, as a matter of fact it was she who started the strike.&quot;

这个藏经洞是无意间发现的。
他今天要这个，明天要那个，简直是个无底洞。
泠泠的泉水从石洞中流淌出来。
Línglíng de quánshuǐ cóng shídòng zhōng liútǎng chūlái。
A cool fountain runs through stone caves.
石花洞里的钟乳石千姿百态、怪异奇绝。
Shíhuādòng lǐ de zhōng rǔshí qiānzī bǎitài、guàiyì qíjué。
The stalactites in Shihua cave are of all kinds of shapes and postures that are strangely wonderful.
石花洞的冰凌奇观让人叹为观止。
Shíhuādòng de bīnglíng qíguān ràng rén tànwéiguānzhǐ。
The spectacle of the icicle in the cave is amazing.
石花洞里的景象真是太奇瑰了！
Shíhuādòng lǐ de jǐng xiàng zhēnshì tài qíguī le！
The scene in the Shihua cave is unsurpassably magnificent.
在钟乳石溶洞里，可以见到渗流现象。
Zài zhōng rǔshí róngdòng lǐ，kěyǐ jiàndào shènliú xiàn xiàng。
Seepage flow can be observed in stalactite caves.
堵住管道的漏洞，不让石油流失。
Dǔzhù guǎndào de lòudòng，bú ràng shíyóu liúshī。
stop up the leaks in the pipe so that no oil will seep through
石灰岩经地下水长时期的侵蚀，形成岩洞。
Shíhuīyán jīngdìxiàshuǐ chángshíqī de qīnshí，xíngchéngyándòng。
Caves are formed by the erosion of limestone by groundwater over many thousands of years.
走投无路的歹徒龟缩在石洞里继续顽抗
水从洞顶嘀落，长年累月形成石笋。
石灰岩地层因受地下水长期浸蚀而形成溶洞。
They have found cave paintings dating back thousands of years.
他们在洞穴里发现了石洞壁画，历史可追溯至数千年前。
When saline solutions in rock pores become saturated salt crystals begin to form.
Dāng shídòng zhōng de yánshuǐ róngyè bǎohé yǐhòu，yánjīng jiù kāishǐ xíngchéng。
当石洞中的盐水溶液饱和以后，盐晶就开始形成。
Some urchins use their jaws to make burrows in solid rock.
Yǒuxiē cìwei lìyòng tāmen de yáchǐ zài jiānyìng de yánshí shàng wā dòng。
有些刺猬利用它们的牙齿在坚硬的岩石上挖洞。
The image of Buddha was carved into the rocks in very old caves.

这尊佛像刻在非常古老洞穴的岩石上。
The team probed the cave for the sample of rock.
这个小队为了寻找岩石样品，探寻了山洞。
There is a cave hidden among the rocks.

有一个山洞隐藏在岩石之中。

Zài shíhuīyán shàng tāo chéng de jùdà de dòngxué shì fángwū。
在石灰岩上掏成的巨大的洞穴式房屋。
Some rock is too weak to allow the development of large underground cavities.

一些岩石太脆弱了，不允许发展大面积的地下洞穴。
You should wear hard hats when caving to protect the head from bumps and falling rocks.

有两个人鬼头鬼脑地从山洞里钻了出来。

山洞里一片黑暗。
Shāndònglǐ yípiàn hēi\'àn。
It\'s all darkness in the cave.

山洞里黑得怕人。

山洞里黢黑，什么也看不见。

这山洞有多深？

山洞里一麻黑，什么也看不见。

It was pitch-dark in the cave; you couldn\'t see a thing.

这个山洞可能是狼群的巢窟。

Water tinkles in the mountain cave and waves are rising over one another.
我在山上的一个山洞里发现了这件神物。

小王是个有心人，进入山洞时特别留下了记号。

Xiaowang is a person with high aspirations and determination. He left special marks when entering the cave.

裁缝把这个洞缝合得很好，就好像从没破过。

关于它们完全消失的想法看起来违反了逻辑，目前他们还不能那个逃离黑洞。

pulmonary cavity
空洞的理论
kōngdòng de lǐlùn
an empty theory
空洞无物的八股调
kōngdòngwú wù de bāgǔdiào
a piece of stereotyped writing devoid of content
在墙上抠个洞
zài qiángshàngkōu gè dòng
drill a hole in the wall
堵住管道的漏洞，不让石油流失。
Dǔzhù guǎndào de lòudòng，bú ràng shíyóu liúshī。
stop up the leaks in the pipe so that no oil will seep through
检查一下管道有没有漏洞。
Jiǎnchá yíxià guǎndào yǒu méiyǒu lòudòng。
Check and see if there is any leak in the pipe.
他的话里有许多漏洞。
Tā de huà lǐ yǒu xǔduō lòudòng。
What he says is full of holes.
他的话前后矛盾，漏洞百出。
Tā de huà qián hòu máodùn，lòudòngbǎichū。
His argument is full of holes.
蛇正往洞里爬。
Shé zhèngwǎngdònglǐ pá。
The snake is crawling into a hole.
山洞里黑得怕人。
Shāndònglǐ hēi de pàrén。
It\'s frighteningly dark inside the cave.
山洞里黢黑，什么也看不见。
Shāndòng lǐ qūhēi，shénme yě kàn bú jiàn。
The cave is pitch-dark. You can\'t see anything.
世事洞明皆学问，人情练达即文章。
Shìshì dòngmíng jiē xuéwèn, rénqíng liàndá jí wénzhāng。
A grasp of mundane affairs is genuine knowledge, and worldly wisdom is true learning.
由于水的不断侵蚀，日久天长就形成了一个大溶洞。
Yóuyú shuǐ de búduàn qīnshí，rìjiǔtiāncháng jiù xíngchéng le yígè dà róngdòng。
As a result of continuous water erosion, in the course of time a huge cave was formed.
这山洞有多深？
Zhè shāndòng yǒu duō shēn?
What is the depth of the cave?
实际行动胜过空洞的言辞。
Shíjì xíngdòng shèngguò kōngdòng de yáncí。
Action speaks louder than words.
把漏洞堵死
bǎ lòudòng dǔsǐ
plug the holes; stop up loopholes
在墙上掏一个洞
Zài qiángshàngtāo yígè dòng。
make a hole in the wall
填塞洞隙
tiánsè dòngxì 
stop up a loophole
在硬纸盒上捅个洞
zài yìngzhǐhé shàngtǒnggè dòng
poke a hole in the cardboard box
挖防空洞
wā fángkōngdòng
dig an air-raid shelter
山洞又黑又深，进去可真吓人。
Shāndòngyòu hēi yòu shēn，jìnqù kě zhēn xiàrén。
It was really frightening to get into that deep and pitch dark cave.
石灰岩经地下水长时期的侵蚀，形成岩洞。
Shíhuīyán jīngdìxiàshuǐ chángshíqī de qīnshí，xíngchéngyándòng。
Caves are formed by the erosion of limestone by groundwater over many thousands of years.
山洞里一麻黑，什么也看不见。
Shāndònglǐ yìmáhēi，shénme yě kàn bu jiàn。
It was pitch-dark in the cave; you couldn\'t see a thing.
洞察舆情
dònɡchá yúqínɡ 
know public sentiment well
火车走这条线得钻许多山洞。
Huǒchē zǒu zhètiáo xiàn děi zuān xǔduō shāndòng。
The train has to pass through quite a few tunnels on this railway line.
洞晓
dòngxiǎo
have a clear knowledge of
他的辩诉漏洞百出。
Tā de biànsù lòudòng bǎichū。
His defended himself with an argument full of loopholes.
春天的十渡遍山开满了野花，别有洞天。
Chūntiān de shídù biànshān kāimǎn le yěhuā，biéyǒu dòngtiān。
The hills of Shidu are covered with wild flowers, which are full of exceptional beauty and charm.
石花洞的冰凌奇观让人叹为观止。
Shíhuādòng de bīnglíng qíguān ràng rén tànwéiguānzhǐ。
The spectacle of the icicle in the cave is amazing.
这个山洞可能是狼群的巢窟。
Zhège shāndòng kěnéng shì lángqún de cháokū。
The cave maybe a den of wolves.
山洞里水声丁冬，此起彼伏。
Shāndòng lǐ shuǐshēng dīngdōng，cǐqǐ bǐfú。
Water tinkles in the mountain cave and waves are rising over one another.
泉水叮咚，从洞顶不停地滴下来。
Quánshuǐ dīngdōng，cóng dòngdǐng bùtíng de dī xiàlái。
The spring water is tinkling and keeps dropping from the ceiling of the cave.
据说这里就是孙悟空的洞府。
Jùshuō zhèlǐ jiùshì sūnwùkōng de dòngfǔ。
People say this is the cave dwelling of the Monkey King.
他敏锐地洞见了这个问题的关键所在。
Tā mǐnruì de dòngjiàn le zhège wèntí de guānjiàn suǒzài。
He sees clearly where the problems lies.
展览会门庭洞开，欢迎各界来宾。
Zhǎnlǎnhuì méntíng dòngkāi，huānyíng gèjiè láibīn。
The door of the exhibition is open wide to guests from all walks of life.
这里真是洞天福地，让人舍不得离去。
Zhèlǐ zhēnshi dòngtiān fúdì，ràng rén shěbùdé lí qù。
It is such a charming place that nobody is willing to leave.
子弹穿过墙壁，留下了一个洞眼儿。
Zǐdàn chuānguò qiángbì，liúxià le yígè dòngyǎnr。
A bullet went through the wall, leaving a hole on it.
狼群把猎物拖进了附近的洞子中。
Lángqún bǎ lièwù tuōjìn le fùjìn de dòngzi zhōng。
Wolves dragged the prey into a nearby cave.
即使在冬季，我们也可以吃到新鲜的洞子菜。
Jíshǐ zài dōngjì，wǒmen yě kěyǐ chī dào xīnxiān de dòngzicài。
Even in winter, fresh vegetables are still available because we can plant them in greenhouses.
这些防空洞都是战争年代留下来的。
Zhèxiē fángkōngdòng dōushì zhànzhēng niándài liú xiàlái de。
These bomb shelters are left over from the time of war.
家人朋友的包庇窝赃，很容易成为犯罪分子继续作恶的防空洞。
Jiārén péngyou de bāobì wōzāng，hěn róngyì chéngwéi fànzuìfènzǐ jìxù zuò\'è de fángkōngdòng。
The shield of family and friends can easily used as a shelter by criminals for further crimes.
她用彩色棉线把衣服上那个小破洞缝缀得像个花朵儿一样。
Tā yòng cǎisè miánxiàn bǎ yīfu shàng nàge xiǎopòdòng féngzhuì de xiàng gè huāduǒr yíyàng。
She stitched on the patch and made it look like a flower by using colorful thread.
有的花适合种植在花儿洞子里。
Yǒu de huā shìhé zhòngzhí zài huārdòngzi lǐ。
Some flowers are fit to be planted in greenhouses with part of them under the ground.
这房子建得太久了，灰顶都破了个洞。
Zhè fángzi jiàn de tài jiǔ le，huīdǐng dōu pò le gè dòng。
The house was built too long ago, there is even a hole in the roof.
小王谦虚地说自己的文章漏洞很多，诚请前辈见示。
Xiǎo Wáng qiānxū de shuō zìjǐ de wénzhāng lòudòng hěnduō，chéngqǐng qiánbèi jiànshì。
Xiao Wang said in a modest way that his essay teemed with errors and hoped his senior would give advice.
刚回到乡下老家，妈总怕我冷，给我那炕洞里不住地添柴烧火。
Gāng huídào xiāngxià lǎojiā，mā zǒng pà wǒ lěng，gěi wǒ nà kàngdòng lǐ búzhù de tiānchái shāohuǒ。
After I had just returned to my hometown in the countryside, mother was quite afraid that I felt cold and kept adding firewood to the flue of our kang.
这个窟穴洞口很小，成年人很难钻进去。
Zhège kūxué dòngkǒu hěnxiǎo，chéngniánrén hěnnán zuān jìnqù。
The opening of the cave is so small that an adult can hardly pass through.
洞里面隐隐约约透出蓝盈盈的光。
Dòng lǐmian yǐnyǐnyuēyuē tòuchū lányíngyíng de guāng。
The hole shines with a faintly bright blue light.
咱们现在缺少的是力证，已有的证据都有很明显的漏洞。
Zánmen xiànzài quēshǎo de shì lìzhèng，yǐyǒu de zhèngjù dōu yǒu hěnmíngxiǎn de lòudòng。
What we lack now is cogent evidence. All the evidence we have obtained has obvious flaws.
泠泠的泉水从石洞中流淌出来。
Línglíng de quánshuǐ cóng shídòng zhōng liútǎng chūlái。
A cool fountain runs through stone caves.
龙洞的形成，要经历上千年的时间。
Lóngdòng de xíngchéng，yào jīnglì shàngqiānnián de shíjiān。
It takes thousands of years to form a stalactite cave.
穿过这个门洞就可以看到故宫的大门了。
Chuānguò zhège méndòng jiù kěyǐ kàndào Gùgōng de dàmén le。
After passing through the doorway, you can see the gate of the Forbidden City.
没想到老鼠居然把这个米囤咬了一个洞。
Méi xiǎngdào lǎoshǔ jūrán bǎ zhège mǐtún yǎo le yígè dòng。
It is surprising that mice have bitten a hole in the store of rice bamboo.
石花洞里的景象真是太奇瑰了！
Shíhuādòng lǐ de jǐng xiàng zhēnshì tài qíguī le！
The scene in the Shihua cave is unsurpassably magnificent.
石花洞里的钟乳石千姿百态、怪异奇绝。
Shíhuādòng lǐ de zhōng rǔshí qiānzī bǎitài、guàiyì qíjué。
The stalactites in Shihua cave are of all kinds of shapes and postures that are strangely wonderful.
我在山上的一个山洞里发现了这件神物。
Wǒ zài shān shàng de yígè shāndòng lǐ fāxiàn le zhèjiàn shénwù。
I discovered this odd mystical thing in a cave.
在钟乳石溶洞里，可以见到渗流现象。
Zài zhōng rǔshí róngdòng lǐ，kěyǐ jiàndào shènliú xiàn xiàng。
Seepage flow can be observed in stalactite caves.
敌人不知道躲哪里去了，团长想出了一个引蛇出洞的办法。
Dírén bùzhīdào duǒ nǎlǐ qù le，tuánzhǎng xiǎngchū le yígè yǐnshé chūdòng de bànfǎ。
We didn\'t know where the enemies were hiding, so the regimental commander figured out a way to lure them out.
眼看着老鼠钻进洞了，他却是有劲无处使，不知道该怎么办。
Yǎnkàn zhe lǎoshǔ zuānjìn dòng le，tā quèshì yǒujìn wúchùshǐ，bùzhīdào gāi zěnme bàn。
Though the mouse running into the hole is full of strength, he doesn\'t know what to do.
小王是个有心人，进入山洞时特别留下了记号。
Xiǎo Wáng shì gè yǒu xīn rén，jìnrù shāndòng shí tèbié liúxià le jìhào。
Xiaowang is a person with high aspirations and determination. He left special marks when entering the cave.
要想从这个洞口过去只能侧棱着身子。
Yào xiǎng cóng zhège dòngkǒu guòqù zhǐnéng zhāi leng zhe shēnzi。
If you want to go out through this hole, you have to incline your body.
渣子洞是大革命时期国民党迫害共产党员的集中营。
Zhāzidòng shì dàgémìng shíqī guómíndǎng pòhài gòngchǎndǎngyuán de jí zhōng yíng。
The Zhazi Cave is a concentration camp where the Kuomintang persecuted our communist party members during the Great Revolution.
这些文学作品空洞无物，丝毫没有人民性。
Zhèxiē wénxué zuòpǐn kōngdòng wúwù，sīháo méiyǒu rénmínxìng。
These inane literary works have no affinity to the masses.

An auditor usually listens to the lectures, but is permitted to treat assignments and exams as optional.

她工作认真，下课后又去家访了。

She was very conscientious. After school, she went to visit her students\' parents.

下课铃打了，老师还在滔滔不绝地拖堂。

The teacher was still holding forth after the bell had rung.
早下课了。

As soon as the teacher dismissed the class, students had packed their schoolbags.
下课后，同学喜欢扎堆做游戏。

下课后我赶紧回家。

xiàkè
finish class

This is your first day giving lessons in this school, so you should leave the students a good impression.
他今天上课居然没有睡觉，真是稀奇。
Tā jīntiān shàngkè jūrán méiyǒu shuìjiào，zhēnshì xīqí。
He didn\'t sleep in class today, which is rare.
雪灾使学生不能正常上课。
Xuězāi shǐ xuésheng bùnéng zhèngcháng shàngkè。
The snowstorm stops students from going to class as usual.
小明注意力老是不集中，上课常常走神儿。
Xiǎo Míng zhùyìlì lǎoshì bùjí zhōng，shàngkè chángcháng zǒushénr。
Xiaoming can\'t concentrate and is always absent minded in class.
把上课和开会时间错开
bǎshàngkè hé kāihuì shíjiān cuòkāi
stagger the time between classes and meetings
他早上8点上课。
Tā zǎoshangbādiǎn shàngkè。
He starts class at eight o\'clock in the morning.
珍妮跟海伦都去上课了。
Zhēnnī gēn Hǎilún dōuqùshàngkè le。
Jenny and Helen both went to their lectures.
他上课的时候老是左右顾盼。
Tāshàngkède shíhou lǎoshì zuǒyòugùpàn。
He was always looking around in class.
他上课发言很积极。
Tā shàngkè fāyán hěn jījí.
He participates actively in class.
上课不许讲话。
Shàngkè bùxǔ jiǎnghuà.
No talking in class.
你昨天怎么没来上课？
Nǐ zuótiān zěnme méi lái shàngkè?
Why weren\'t you in class yesterday?
实验班为了能在考试前上完课，每周加开三课时。
Shíyànbān wèi le néng zài kǎoshì qián shàngwán kè，měi zhōu jiākāi sān kè shí。
In order to finish all the lessons before the exam, the experimental class are going to take three additional classes every week.
上完课后，老师又在备课了。
Shàngwánkè hòu，lǎoshī yòuzài bèikè le。
When class was over the teacher prepared another lesson.
小明觉得数学课很枯燥，所以一上数学课就犯困。
Xiǎo Míng jué de shùxuékè hěn kūzào，suǒyǐ yí shàng shùxuékè jiù fànkùn。
Xiao Ming finds the math class boring and feels sleepy whenever he has one.
课堂上同学们很认真地朗声读课文。
Kètáng shàng tóngxuémen hěnrènzhēn de lǎngshēng dú kèwén。
Students read texts loudly and clearly in class.
我们上生物课时解剖了一只青蛙。
Wǒmen shàngshēngwùkè shí jiěpōu le yìzhī qīngwā。
We dissected a frog in biology class.
每天上四堂课
měitiān shàng sì táng kè
have four classes every day
逻辑课上，老师正在给学生讲解一个悖论问题。
Luójíkè shàng，lǎoshī zhèngzài gěi xuésheng jiǎngjiě yígè bèilùn wèntí。
In Logic class, the teacher is explaining a logical paradox.
语文课上老师教大家如何贬辞褒用。
Yǔwénkè shàng lǎoshī jiāo dàjiā rúhé biǎncí bāoyòng。
In Chinese class, the teacher shows the students how to use a derogatory term to convey a positive meaning.
今天化学课上，老师带我们做了个关于二氧化硫的实验。
Jīntiān huàxué kèshàng，lǎoshī dài wǒmen zuò le gè guānyú èryǎnghuàliú de shíyàn。
In today\'s chemistry class, our teacher taught us how to carry out an experiment with sulphur dioxide.
在今天的数学课上，老师讲了合数的概念。
Zài jīntiān de shùxuékè shàng，lǎoshī jiǎng le héshù de gàiniàn。
In today\'s math class, the teacher talked about composite numbers.
微生物课上，我们试着培养黑霉。
Wēishēngwù kè shàng，wǒmen shì zhe péiyǎng hēiméi。
We try to incubate black mould in biology class.
体育课上，老师让我们站成横排。
Tǐyùkè shàng，lǎoshī ràng wǒmen zhànchéng héngpái。
In the P.E. class, the teacher asked us to stand in a row.
化学课上，老师让我们把试纸在溶液中浸湿。
Huàxuékè shàng，lǎoshī ràng wǒmen bǎ shìzhǐ zài róngyè zhōng jìnshī。
Our chemistry teacher asked us to immerse the test paper in the liquid.
生物课上，老师讲到“植物是具有抗逆性的”。
Shēngwùkè shàng，lǎoshī jiǎngdào“zhíwù shì jùyǒu kàngnìxìng de”。
In biology class, the teacher said &quot;plants have resistance.&quot;
今天生物课上，老师在草丛里逮到一只磕头虫，它真的在老师的手里磕头似的动呢！
Jīntiān shēngwùkè shàng，lǎoshī zài cǎocóng lǐ dǎidào yìzhī kētóuchóng，tā zhēn de zài lǎoshī de shǒulǐ kētóu sì de dòng ne！
In today\'s biology class, teacher caught a snapping beetle and it seemed that it was really kowtowing in the teacher\'s palm.
我小时候就爱上劳作课，因为可以亲手制作工艺品。
Wǒ xiǎoshíhou jiù ài shàng láozuòkè，yīnwèi kěyǐ qīnshǒu zhìzuò gōngyìpǐn。
I liked handiwork courses when I was young, because I could make handicrafts myself.
今天课上我们学习了龙山文化。
Jīntiān kè shàng wǒmen xuéxí le lóngshān wénhuà。
We studied the Longshan Culture in class today.
体育课上，老师教我们蹲马步。
Tǐyùkè shàng，lǎoshī jiāo wǒmen dūn mǎbù。
The teacher teaches us to practice horse-riding steps in PE class.
小明不喜欢数学课，经常在数学课上跑神儿。
Xiǎo Míng bùxǐhuan shùxuékè，jīngcháng zài shùxuékè shàng pǎoshénr。
Xiao Ming doesn\'t like math classes, he is always absent-minded in these courses.
今天在语文课上，老师给我们评讲了《红楼梦》人物。

In the language and literature class today, the teacher commented on characters in &quot;The Dream of the Red Mansions&quot;.
“稍息”、“立正”、“齐步走”是体育课上最常听到的命令。
“Shāoxī”、“lìzhèng”、“qíbùzǒu”shì tǐyùkèshàng zuìcháng tīngdào de mìnglìng。
&quot;At ease&quot;, &quot;attention&quot; and &quot;quick time, march&quot; are the most commonly heard orders in PE classes.
法律基础课上，老师教了我们行政起诉状的写法。

生物课上老师用手术刀解剖了一只青蛙。

In the biology lesson, the teacher dissected a frog with a scalpel.

化学课上，老师讲到了盐类化合物。

政治课上，老师给我们讲了必要产品和剩余产品的区别。

课上的笔记若是没记全，回家应补记。
Kè shàng de bǐjì ruòshì méi jìquán，huíjiā yīng bǔjì。
If you did not complete your notes in class, you should finish when you get home.
实验课上，老师让用龙胆紫进行染色。

这孩子在课堂上一点也不安分，老要搞小动作。

The boy doesn\'t behave himself in class; he\'s always playing some prank or other.

Míngtiān de yǔwénkè hái shàngbu shàng?

kètángshàng
in class

好了，今天课就上到这里。

Right, let\'s finish today\'s lesson here.

He\'s always drifting off in class.
我明天上午旁听你的课可以吗？

小张有每天晚上坐在屋角温习功课的习惯。
Xiǎo Zhāng yǒu měitiān wǎnshàng zuòzài wūjiǎo wēnxí gōngkè de xíguàn。
Xiao Zhang always revises his lessons at the corner of the house every evening.
她把课本放在桌子上。
Tā bǎ kèběn fàngzài zhuōzishàng。
She put the book on the table.
把课文灌制在磁带上
bǎ kèwén guànzhì zài cídài shàng

选修课也很有意思的，但是很多人都不去上。

In order to get admitted to a good university, Xiao Liu goes to his teachers\' to make up his cultural lessons.

to absent oneself from classes
旷课，不去上课
Will school keep all day?

尽管上课要迟到了，卡尔还是坐下来吃了早餐。

下午好！开始上课。

上个月她因病没来上课。

一周六天上课时间中共有五节核心学术课。

上课时孩子们最好能围坐成一圈。

醒醒，否则你就赶不上上课了。

他今天没来上课，所以我猜他一定是不舒服了。

左边的这个是教学楼，下星期你就在这儿上课。

老师正在大声朗读，所以我能很容易就跟上课文的内容。
She was told off for eating in class.
她上课吃东西被批评了。

网上课堂很快成为当下非常时髦的学习方式，是传统课堂以外的又一选择。
in class
[教育] 上课时
A class implies teacher and student.
上课必须有老师和学生。
I am taking a class at night school where I learn to paint landscapes.
我正在学习风景画的夜校上课。
Students are not allowed to make calls during class.

Chūguóliúxué ràng nǐ yǒu jīhuì zài wàiguó shàngkè bìng xuéxí bùtóng de wénhuà。
出国留学让你有机会在外国上课并学习不同的文化。
Students may delay their entry onto the course after confirming their acceptance of the offer for a period of one year.
Xuésheng men zài quèrèn jiēshòu rùxué yāoqǐng zhīhòu kěyǐ yánqī yìnián dào xiào shàngkè。
学生们在确认接受入学邀请之后可以延期一年到校上课。
Class begins at the sound of the bell.
Língshēng xiǎng guò zhīhòu kāishǐ shàngkè。
铃声响过之后开始上课。
He has difficulty staying awake during class.
Tā shàngkè de shíhou hěn nán yìzhí xǐngzhe bú shuìjiào。
他上课的时候很难一直醒着不睡觉。
An auditor usually listens to the lectures, but is permitted to treat assignments and exams as optional.
Tōngcháng láishuō，pángtīngshēng suīrán shàngkè，dànshì tāmen zài zuòyè hé kǎoshì fāngmiàn kěyǐ zuò zìyóuxuǎnzé。
通常来说，旁听生虽然上课，但是他们在作业和考试方面可以做自由选择。
Only the top 3 students were exempted from attending the last day of classes.
Zhǐyǒu qián sān míng xuésheng zuìhòu yì tiān kěyǐ bù lái shàngkè。
只有前3名学生最后一天可以不来上课。
Not paying attention to the teacher will get you in a lot of trouble.
Rúguǒ shàngkè zhùyìlì bù jízhōng，nǐ jiāng huì yùdào hěn duō máfan。
如果上课注意力不集中，你将会遇到很多麻烦。
The two would always cut up telling jokes during class.
Zhè liǎng gè rén jīngcháng shàngkè húnào,jiǎng xiàohuà。
这两个人经常上课胡闹，讲笑话。
We got back to the campus in time for class.
Wǒmen jíshí huídào xuéxiào shàngkè。
我们及时回到学校上课。
He was in class，grinding in his thoughts.
Tā zài shàngkè，kèkǔ gōngdú yǐ láojì tā de sīxiǎng。
他在上课，刻苦攻读以牢记他的思想。
The teacher said she might not come tomorrow. In this case we won\'t have class.
Lǎoshī shuōguò tā míngtiān kěnéng bù lái， jìrán zhèyàng de huà， wǒmen jiù bú shàngkè le。
老师说过她明天可能不来，既然这样的话，我们就不上课了。
He has been having lessons for the last year and practises morning, noon and night!
Tā zài guòqù yì nián lǐ dōu zài shàngkè，bìngqiě rìrì-yèyè de liánxì。
他在过去一年里都在上课，并且日日夜夜地联系。
If you don\'t go to class, it will be on your head.
Rúguǒ nǐ búqù shàngkè， nà jiù yóu nǐ fùzé。
如果你不去上课，那就由你负责。
A circle was painted on the floor for the use of classes.

课堂上最能引起学生注意的就是课桌铃，虽然比较老式但是很好用。

课程设置
kèchénɡ shèzhì
courses offered in a college or school; curriculum
增设新课程
zēnɡshè xīn kèchénɡ
establish a new course; offer a new course
学校实行了学分制，不及格的课程都要重修。
Xuéxiào shíxíng le xuéfēnzhì，bùjígé de kèchéng dōuyào chóngxiū。
The school has began to practice credit hour system, students now must retake failed courses.
国防教育是我们入学的必修课程。
Guófáng jiàoyù shì wǒmen rùxué de bìxiū kèchéng。
Education for national defense is our compulsory course.
这个学期，他选修了国际私法的课程。
Zhège xuéqī，tā xuǎnxiū le guójì sīfǎ de kèchéng。
He took Private International Law as an elective course  this semester.
我们的课程由于老师生病不能够连属。
Wǒmen de kèchéng yóuyú lǎoshī shēngbìng bùnéng gòu liánzhǔ。
Our course can\'t be continued because our teacher was ill.
刚刚开始学习模特课程，她的猫步还走不好呢。
Gānggāng kāishǐ xuéxí mótè kèchéng，tā de māobùhái zǒubùhǎo ne。
She has begun a modeling course, and can not walk the cat walk well.
她以旁听生的身份学习了中文系的许多课程。
Tā yǐ pángtīngshēng de shēnfèn xuéxí le zhōng wénxì de xǔduō kèchéng。
She took many courses of the department of Chinese language as a listener.
数理统计的课程教学大纲已经公布在网上，请同学们自行查阅。

The teaching outline for the course on mathematical statistics has been put up on the internet, please look yourself.
课程
kèchéng
curriculum
选修课程
Xuǎnxiū kèchéng
optional course
他自修了企业管理课程。
Tā zìxiūle qǐyèguǎnlǐ kèchéng。
He taught himself business management.
课文要按难易程度编排。
Kèwén yào àn nányì chéngdù biānpái。
The texts should be graded in order of difficulty.
请总工程师来讲课
qǐng zǒnggōngchéngshī lái jiǎngkè
invite the chief engineer to give a lecture
三门课程
各门课程考试都得百分。

小学课程是为以后学习打底子的

从小学到中学，小明一直是体育课代表。

正式讲课前，学生需起立向老师问好，待老师答礼后，才能坐下。
Zhèngshì jiǎngkè qián，xuésheng xū qǐlì xiàng lǎoshī wènhǎo，dài lǎoshī dálǐ hòu，cáinéng zuòxià。
Before beginning class, students must stand up and say hello to the teacher, and can not take their seats until the teacher returns their greeting.
由于长时间讲课，老师的声音变得低哑。

The teacher\'s voice became hoarse after lecturing for a long time.
我们学校的课外活动多姿多彩。
Wǒmen xuéxiào de kèwài huódòng duōzī duōcǎi。
We have a wide variety of extracurricular activities in our school.
今天化学课上，老师带我们做了个关于二氧化硫的实验。
Jīntiān huàxué kèshàng，lǎoshī dài wǒmen zuò le gè guānyú èryǎnghuàliú de shíyàn。
In today\'s chemistry class, our teacher taught us how to carry out an experiment with sulphur dioxide.
小明尽干犯傻的事儿，今天上课他又走错教室了。
Xiǎo Míng jìn gān fànshǎ de shìr，jīntiān shàngkè tā yòu zǒu cuò jiàoshì le。
Xiao Ming always acts foolishly, he went to the wrong classroom today.
老师让学生把朗读速度放慢复诵一遍课文。
Lǎoshī ràng xuésheng bǎ lǎngdú sùdù fàngmàn fùsòng yíbiàn kèwén。
The teacher asked the students to recite the text again.
除了这几门主修课，我还副修了绘画和书法。
Chúle zhèjǐmén zhǔxiūkè，wǒ hái fùxiū le huìhuà hé shūfǎ。
Besides these major courses, I minored in painting and handwriting.
老师已经把连续三次都没来上课的同学在名单中勾除，他们这学期就没有成绩了。
Lǎoshī yǐjing bǎ liánxù sān cì dōu méilái shàngkè de tóngxué zài míngdān zhōng gōuchú，tāmen zhè xuéqī jiù méiyǒu chéngjì le。
The teacher has deleted from the name list the names of the students who haven\'t shown up in class three times in succession, and they will not get scores for this semester.
我今天背课文时磕磕巴巴的，他直冲我刮鼻子。
Wǒ jīntiān bèi kèwén shí kēkēbābā de，tā zhí chòng wǒ guābízi。
I stuttered when reciting the text today, so he criticized me directly.
老师身体贵恙，今天的课取消了。
Lǎoshī shēntǐ guìyàng，jīntiān de kè qǔxiāo le。
Today\'s class is cancelled, because our teacher is not feeling well.
国防教育是我们入学的必修课程。
Guófáng jiàoyù shì wǒmen rùxué de bìxiū kèchéng。
Education for national defense is our compulsory course.
这个学期，他选修了国际私法的课程。
Zhège xuéqī，tā xuǎnxiū le guójì sīfǎ de kèchéng。
He took Private International Law as an elective course  this semester.
国语课是一门基础性学科。
Guóyǔkè shì yìmén jīchǔxìng xuékē。
National language course is a basic subject.
别人都在认真听课，他却酣眠正香。
Biérén dōu zài rènzhēn tīngkè，tā què hānmián zhèngxiāng。
All the students are listening carefully to the teacher except for the girl who is sleeping soundly.
在今天的数学课上，老师讲了合数的概念。
Zài jīntiān de shùxuékè shàng，lǎoshī jiǎng le héshù de gàiniàn。
In today\'s math class, the teacher talked about composite numbers.
微生物课上，我们试着培养黑霉。
Wēishēngwù kè shàng，wǒmen shì zhe péiyǎng hēiméi。
We try to incubate black mould in biology class.
体育课上，老师让我们站成横排。
Tǐyùkè shàng，lǎoshī ràng wǒmen zhànchéng héngpái。
In the P.E. class, the teacher asked us to stand in a row.
他读起课文来，声音宏亮，语气抑扬顿挫。
Tā dúqǐ kèwén lái，shēngyīn hóngliàng，yǔqì yìyáng dùncuò。
He reads loud, and the tone is in cadence.
不听课的学生喜欢坐在后座。
Bùtīngkè de xuésheng xǐhuan zuòzài hòuzuò。
Students who don\'t listen to the lecture like to sit in the back.
老师把课件做成了幻灯片供大家观看。
Lǎoshī bǎ kèjiàn zuòchéng le huàndēngpiān gōng dàjiā guānkàn。
The teacher made the courseware in lantern slides and played them to students.
她听到上课铃后，急步赶到教室。
Tā tīngdào shàngkè líng hòu，jíbùgǎndào jiàoshì。
She quickly went to the classroom after hearing the bell.
她经常加班加点为学生补课，但却从不要求学生回报。
Tā jīngcháng jiābān jiādiǎn wèi xuésheng bǔkè，dàn què cóng bú yāoqiú xuésheng huíbào。
She always worked extra hours to make up missed lessons for the students, but never asked for something in return.
这位退休教师虽然退休了但仍在教课。
Zhèwèi tuìxiū jiàoshī suīrán tuìxiū le dàn réngzài jiāokè。
Though retired, he still teaches courses.
今天的体育课，我们要去跤场学习摔跤。
Jīntiān de tǐyùkè，wǒmen yào qù jiāochǎng xuéxí shuāijiāo。
In today\'s P.E. class, we are going to learn wrestling in the wrestling area.
作为一名教师在课堂上要时刻注意自己的教态。
Zuòwéi yìmíng jiàoshī zài kètáng shàng yào shíkè zhùyì zìjǐ de jiàotài。
As a teacher, one should pay attention to one\'s manner when giving lessons in class.
这节生物课老师给我们讲了进化论。
Zhè jié shēngwùkè lǎoshī gěi wǒmen jiǎng le jìnhuàlùn。
The teacher gave a lecture on the theory of evolution.
化学课上，老师让我们把试纸在溶液中浸湿。
Huàxuékè shàng，lǎoshī ràng wǒmen bǎ shìzhǐ zài róngyè zhōng jìnshī。
Our chemistry teacher asked us to immerse the test paper in the liquid.
生物课上，老师讲到“植物是具有抗逆性的”。
Shēngwùkè shàng，lǎoshī jiǎngdào“zhíwù shì jùyǒu kàngnìxìng de”。
In biology class, the teacher said &quot;plants have resistance.&quot;
今天生物课上，老师在草丛里逮到一只磕头虫，它真的在老师的手里磕头似的动呢！
Jīntiān shēngwùkè shàng，lǎoshī zài cǎocóng lǐ dǎidào yìzhī kētóuchóng，tā zhēn de zài lǎoshī de shǒulǐ kētóu sì de dòng ne！
In today\'s biology class, teacher caught a snapping beetle and it seemed that it was really kowtowing in the teacher\'s palm.
从小学到中学，小明一直是体育课代表。
Cóng xiǎoxué dào zhōng xué，Xiǎo Míng yìzhí shì tǐyùkè dàibiǎo。
In both primary and middle schools, Xiaoming has always been the head of PE classes.
课间操对一直坐着学习的学生来说，很有益。
Kèjiāncāo duì yìzhí zuò zhe xuéxí de xuésheng láishuō，hěnyǒu yì。
Recess calisthenics are helpful to those students who always sit and study all day long.
小明对于他感兴趣的课目学得很好。
Xiǎo Míng duìyú tā gǎn xìngqù de kèmù xué de hěnhǎo。
Xiaoming learns the subjects he is interested in well.
今天是小明值日，他负责打扫课室的卫生。
Jīntiān shì Xiǎo Míng zhírì，tā fùzé dǎsǎo kèshì de wèishēng。
Xiaoming is on duty today, and he is responsible for cleaning up the classroom.
这个课题组的组长是张教授。
Zhège kètízǔ de zǔzhǎng shì Zhāng jiàoshòu。
The leader of the research group is Prof. Zhang.
这个班的课椅高度，不太符合小学生的身高比例。
Zhège bān de kèyǐ gāodù，bú tài fúhé xiǎoxuésheng de shēngāo bǐlì。
The height of the classroom chairs does not conform to the height of primary students.
今天上了一天课，我很劳乏。
Jīntiān shàng le yìtiān kè，wǒ hěnláofá。
Having given classes all day long, I am exhausted.
我小时候就爱上劳作课，因为可以亲手制作工艺品。
Wǒ xiǎoshíhou jiù ài shàng láozuòkè，yīnwèi kěyǐ qīnshǒu zhìzuò gōngyìpǐn。
I liked handiwork courses when I was young, because I could make handicrafts myself.
他是王教授力荐的课题组长，一定非常优秀。
Tā shì Wáng jiàoshòu lìjiàn de kètí zǔzhǎng，yídìng fēicháng yōuxiù。
He was strongly recommended to be the project leader by Professor Wang. He must be very excellent.
他力克了几个科研难关，最终完成了这个课题的研究工作，研究成果显著。
Tā lìkè le jǐgè kēyán nánguān，zuì zhōng wánchéng le zhège kètí de yánjiū gōngzuò，yánjiū chéngguǒ xiǎnzhù。
After doing all he could and overcoming several research difficulties, he finally completed the research on this topic with brilliant research accomplishments.
我们的课程由于老师生病不能够连属。
Wǒmen de kèchéng yóuyú lǎoshī shēngbìng bùnéng gòu liánzhǔ。
Our course can\'t be continued because our teacher was ill.
这篇课文还是请你来领诵吧。
Zhèpiān kèwén háishi qǐng nǐ lái lǐngsòng ba。
You lead in reading the text aloud, please.
今天课上我们学习了龙山文化。
Jīntiān kè shàng wǒmen xuéxí le lóngshān wénhuà。
We studied the Longshan Culture in class today.
老师宣布下课的话刚落音，同学们就已经收拾好了书包。
Lǎoshī xuānbùxiàkè de huà gāng luòyīn，tóngxuémen jiù yǐjing shōushi hǎo le shūbāo。
As soon as the teacher dismissed the class, students had packed their schoolbags.
体育课上，老师教我们蹲马步。
Tǐyùkè shàng，lǎoshī jiāo wǒmen dūn mǎbù。
The teacher teaches us to practice horse-riding steps in PE class.
刚刚开始学习模特课程，她的猫步还走不好呢。
Gānggāng kāishǐ xuéxí mótè kèchéng，tā de māobùhái zǒubùhǎo ne。
She has begun a modeling course, and can not walk the cat walk well.
他被获准免考英语和数学两门功课。
Tā bèi huòzhǔn miǎnkǎo yīngyǔ hé shùxué liǎng mén gōngkè。
He is exempt from the English and mathematics examinations.
历史课后，老师带领我们参观了农会旧址。
Lìshǐkè hòu，lǎoshī dàilǐng wǒmen cānguān le nónghuì jiùzhǐ。
After the history lesson, the teacher led us to look around the former site of a peasant association.
她以旁听生的身份学习了中文系的许多课程。
Tā yǐ pángtīngshēng de shēnfèn xuéxí le zhōng wénxì de xǔduō kèchéng。
She took many courses of the department of Chinese language as a listener.
今天在语文课上，老师给我们评讲了《红楼梦》人物。
Jīntiān zài yǔwénkè shàng，lǎoshī gěi wǒmen píngjiǎng le《Hónglóumèng》rénwù。
In the language and literature class today, the teacher commented on characters in &quot;The Dream of the Red Mansions&quot;.
我们这学期开了朴学这门课。
Wǒmen zhè xuéqī kāi le pǔxué zhè mén kè。
We had a plain learning class this semester.
“稍息”、“立正”、“齐步走”是体育课上最常听到的命令。
“Shāoxī”、“lìzhèng”、“qíbùzǒu”shì tǐyùkèshàng zuìcháng tīngdào de mìnglìng。
&quot;At ease&quot;, &quot;attention&quot; and &quot;quick time, march&quot; are the most commonly heard orders in PE classes.
法律基础课上，老师教了我们行政起诉状的写法。
Fǎlǜjīchǔkè shàng，lǎoshī jiāo le wǒmen xíngzhèng qǐsùzhuàng de xiěfǎ。
In basic law classes, the teacher taught us how to write an administrative statement of claim.
不要在老师讲课时窃窃私语。
Búyào zài lǎoshī jiǎngkè shí qièqièsīyǔ。
Don’t whisper when the teacher is lecturing.
教我们生物课的老师是位清真教的教徒。
Jiāo wǒmen shēngwùkè de lǎoshī shì wèi qīngzhēnjiào de jiàotú。
Our biology teacher is a Muslim.
生物课上老师用手术刀解剖了一只青蛙。
Shēngwùkè shàng lǎoshī yòng shǒushùdāo jiěpōu le yìzhī qīngwā。
In the biology lesson, the teacher dissected a frog with a scalpel.
数理统计的课程教学大纲已经公布在网上，请同学们自行查阅。
Shùlǐ tǒngjì de kèchéng jiàoxué dàgāng yǐjing gōngbùzài wǎngshàng，qǐng tóngxuémen zìxíng cháyuè。
The teaching outline for the course on mathematical statistics has been put up on the internet, please look yourself.
课堂上，老师正在教学生们怎么用炭精棒制作电池。
Kètáng shàng，lǎoshī zhèngzài jiāo xuéshengmen zěnme yòng tànjīngbàng zhìzuò diànchí。
In the class, the teacher is telling the students how to make batteries with carbon sticks.
这三个逃课的学生遭到了老师严厉的批评。
Zhè sāngè táokè de xuésheng zāodào le lǎoshī yánlì de pīpíng。
The three students that played truant were severely criticized by the teacher.
生物课上，老师给我们讲解了同化作用的原理。
Shēngwùkè shàng，lǎoshī gěi wǒmen jiǎngjiě le tónghuà zuòyòng de yuánlǐ。
In the biology class, the teacher explained to us the principle of assimilation.
你头天去这所学校上课，要给同学们留下一个好印象。
Nǐ tóutiān qù zhè suǒ xuéxiào shàngkè，yào gěi tóngxuémen liúxià yígè hǎo yìn xiàng。
This is your first day giving lessons in this school, so you should leave the students a good impression.
老师在课堂上把这个公式重新推演了一遍。
Lǎoshī zài kètáng shàng bǎ zhège gōngshì chóngxīn tuīyǎn le yí biàn。
The teacher deductively inferred this formula again in class.
小刚每天晚上都要温课。
Xiǎo Gāng měitiān wǎnshàng dōuyào wēnkè。
Xiao gang revises his classes every evening.
为了考上理想的学校，小刘每天都到老师家补习文化课。
Wèile kǎoshàng lǐxiǎng de xuéxiào，Xiǎo Liú měitiān dōu dào lǎoshī jiā bǔxí wénhuàkè。
In order to get admitted to a good university, Xiao Liu goes to his teachers\' to make up his cultural lessons.
小张有每天晚上坐在屋角温习功课的习惯。
Xiǎo Zhāng yǒu měitiān wǎnshàng zuòzài wūjiǎo wēnxí gōngkè de xíguàn。
Xiao Zhang always revises his lessons at the corner of the house every evening.
他今天上课居然没有睡觉，真是稀奇。
Tā jīntiān shàngkè jūrán méiyǒu shuìjiào，zhēnshì xīqí。
He didn\'t sleep in class today, which is rare.
因为学习成绩差，老师经常给他开设小锅饭，帮他补习功课。
Yīnwéi xuéxí chéngjì chà，lǎoshī jīngcháng gěi tā kāishè xiǎoguōfàn，bāng tā bǔxí gōngkè。
Due to his poor performance, the teacher often coaches him privately to help him catch up.
这学期将增加五门新课。
Zhè xuéqī jiāng zēngjiā wǔ mén xīnkè。
We are going to have five more new courses this term.
雪灾使学生不能正常上课。
Xuězāi shǐ xuésheng bùnéng zhèngcháng shàngkè。
The snowstorm stops students from going to class as usual.
化学课上，老师讲到了盐类化合物。
Huàxuékè shàng，lǎoshī jiǎngdào le yánlèi huàhéwù。
In the chemistry class, the teacher mentioned compounds.
课堂上的要义你记了没有啊。
Kètáng shàng de yàoyì nǐ jì le méiyǒu a。
Have you written down the key points of the class?
如何使市场经济有序运行成了又一课题。
Rúhé shǐ shìchǎng jīngjì yǒuxù yùnxíng chéng le yòu yí kètí。
How to run an orderly market economy became another problem.
学校规定体育课必须穿运动服。
Xuéxiào guīdìng tǐyùkè bìxū chuān yùndòngfú。
The school requires that all students in P.E classes must wear sports clothes.
她利用课余时间增修古汉语。
Tā lìyòng kèyú shíjiān zēngxiū gǔhànyǔ。
She spent her time after class studying archaic Chinese.
下课后，同学喜欢扎堆做游戏。
Xiàkè hòu，tóngxué xǐhuan zhāduī zuò yóuxì。
After class, students like to get together and play games.
王梅政教课考试得了满分。
Wáng Méi zhèngjiàokè kǎoshì dé le mǎnfēn。
Wangmei got a full credit for her politics exam.
一下课，他就直奔厕所去了。
Yí xiàkè，tā jiù zhíbèn cèsuǒ qù le。
As soon as the class was over, he ran directly to the washroom.
今天的物理课讲了重臂的概念。
Jīntiān de wùlǐkè jiǎng le zhòngbì de gàiniàn。
At today\'s physics class, the teacher taught us the concept of the resistance arm.
他在民族大学里教授《周易》这门课。
Tā zài mínzú dàxué lǐ jiàoshòu《Zhōuyì》zhè mén kè。
He teaches the Book of Changes at the University for Nationalities.
作为一名医学生，除了要学好专业课外，英语也是非常重要的。
Zuòwéi yìmíng yīxuésheng，chú le yào xuéhǎo zhuānyèkè wài，yīngyǔ yěshì fēicháng zhòngyào de。
For medical students, besides learning specialized courses well, it is also of great importance to learn English well.
这堂生动的警示课教会了小学生面对危险该怎样自保。
Zhè táng shēngdòng de jǐngshìkè jiāohuì le xiǎoxuésheng miànduì wēixiǎn gāi zěnyàng zìbǎo。
This vivid warning demonstration class teaches primary students how to protect themselves from danger.
小明注意力老是不集中，上课常常走神儿。
Xiǎo Míng zhùyìlì lǎoshì bùjí zhōng，shàngkè chángcháng zǒushénr。
Xiaoming can\'t concentrate and is always absent minded in class.
政治课上，老师给我们讲了必要产品和剩余产品的区别。
Zhèngzhìkè shàng，lǎoshī gěi wǒmen jiǎng le bìyào chǎnpǐn hé shèngyú chǎnpǐn de qūbié。
In the political education class, the teacher tells us the difference between necessary products and surplus products.
小学阶段的基础课就那么几门。
Xiǎoxué jiēduàn de jīchǔkè jiù nàme jǐ mén。
There are only a few elementary lessons in primary school.
美术课上，孩子们在学画静物画。
Měishùkè shàng，háizimen zài xué huà jìngwùhuà。
The children are learning still life painting in art class.
这个小学的课间餐都是请营养配餐员设计调配出来的。
Zhège xiǎoxué de kèjiāncān dōushì qǐng yíngyǎng pèicānyuán shèjì tiáopèi chūlái de。
Break-time snacks in this primary school are created by dietitians.
今天的物理课我们学的是连锁反应，大家都没怎么听懂。
Jīntiān de wùlǐkè wǒmen xué de shì liánsuǒ fǎnyìng，dàjiā dōu méi zěnme tīngdǒng。
Toaday we learned about chain reactions in physics class, but none of us quite understood it.
今天化学课上，老师介绍了硫化氢的化学成分。
Jīntiān huàxuékè shàng，lǎoshī jièshào le liúhuàqīng de huàxué chéngfèn。
In today’s chemistry class, the teacher introduced the chemical components of hydrogen sulphide.
我们下学期开设了伦理学这门课。
Wǒmen xiàxuéqī kāishè le lúnlǐxué zhè mén kè。
We have an ethics course next semester.
体育课上，老师教了我们一套徒手操。
Tǐyùkè shàng，lǎoshī jiāo le wǒmen yítào túshǒucāo。
The teacher taught us a freehand drill in the physical education class.
这节生物课，我们来讲解一下脂肪酸。
Zhè jié shēngwùkè，wǒmen lái jiǎngjiě yíxià zhīfángsuān。
In this biology class, we are going to talk about fatty acids.
这帮孩子暗渡陈仓，说是补课竟然去打游戏了。
Zhè bāng háizi àndùchéncāng，shuōshì bǔkè jìngrán qù dǎ yóuxì le。
The children cheated. They said they were going to a rescheduled class, but they played computer games instead.
课上的笔记若是没记全，回家应补记。
Kè shàng de bǐjì ruòshì méi jìquán，huíjiā yīng bǔjì。
If you did not complete your notes in class, you should finish when you get home.
实验课上，老师让用龙胆紫进行染色。

In the experiment class, the teacher let us dye using gentian violet.
政治课后，小明明白了：学校的制度也体现着民主集中制。

After the political class, Xiaoming came to understand that the system of his school also reflects democratic supervision.
在历史课上我们了解到，民族资产阶级处在很无奈的地位。

In the historical class, we came to know that national bourgeoisie is in a resigned position.
我们在美术课上学习了木炭画。

今天的生物课上，老师带领我们解剖了青蛙的内皮。
Jīntiān de shēngwù kè shàng，lǎoshī dàilǐng wǒmen jiěpōule qīngwā de nèipí。
In the biology class today, the teacher showed us how to dissect the endothelium of frogs.
这节生物课的内容是用显微镜观察动物的上皮组织。

The object of this biology class is to observe the epithelial tissue of animals through a microscope.
选修课也很有意思的，但是很多人都不去上。

to hold classes in the morning
上午讲课

折射线
zhéshèxiàn 
refracted ray
宇宙射线有时候也会对地球产生影响。
Yǔzhòu shèxiàn yǒushíhou yě huì duì dìqiú chǎnshēng yǐngxiǎng。
Sometimes, cosmic rays affect the earth.
镜子能反射光线。
Jìngzi néng fǎnshè guāngxiàn。
Mirrors reflect light.
斜射的光线
xiéshè de guāngxiàn
oblique light (or beams)
门缝里射出一线微光。
Ménfèng lǐ shè chū yíxiàn wēiguāng。
A ray of light shone through the crack in the door.
宇宙线簇射
yǔzhòuxiàn cùshè 
cosmic-ray shower
用紫外线照射
yònɡ zǐwàixiàn zhàoshè 
irradiate with ultraviolet rays
太阳灯能够像太阳一样放射出紫外线。
Tàiyángdēng nénggòu xiàng tàiyáng yíyàng fàngshè chū zǐwàixiàn。
Solar light can send off ultraviolet rays, just like the sun does.
射线。
incident rays
入射线
the punishing rays of the sun
太阳的有害射线

科学家们制作令人惊叹的X射线图。

X射线天文学在中国已取得了引人注目的发展。

同时，我通过电报发送了这位患者的X射线胸片。
The CAT scan apparently showed no damage to the brain.

The enemy launched three air-to-air missiles.

Shuǐ zhōng de liányī zài yángguāng de zhàoshè xià sì jǐnduàn bùpǐ yíyàng guānghuá yóuliàng。
The ripples on the water are as smooth and bright as a brocade under the sunshine.
在古代六艺是指礼、乐、射、御、书、数等六种技能。
Zài gǔdài liùyì shì zhǐ lǐ、lè、shè、yù、shū、shù děng liùzhǒng jìnéng。

麻醉师给她注射了一针后，她就失去知觉了。
Mázuìshī gěi tā zhùshè le yì zhēn hòu，tā jiù shīqù zhījué le。

只有拉满弓才能射得到那么远距离的靶子。

In a shooting match, she was in bad form, and had a low percentage of hits.
水枪是孩子们爱玩儿的一种玩具喷射器。

The water gun is a kind of spraying apparatus loved by children.

The crystal ball can reflect various colors of light from the sun.
他心脏骤停，医生赶紧为他注射了强心针。
Tā xīnzàng zhòutíng，yīshēng gǎnjǐn wèi tā zhùshè le qiángxīnzhēn。
His heart halted suddenly, the doctor injected him with a cardiotonic needle.
战士们正在射击场上苦练枪法。
Zhànshìmen zhèngzài shèjīchǎng shàng kǔliàn qiāngfǎ。
The soldiers are diligently practicing their marksmanship.

Tā yòng mázuìqiāng bǎ mázuì yàojì shèrù le fāfēng de dà xiàng de tǐnèi。
He used an anesthetic rifle to inject the drug into the body of the mad elephant.

The television station broadcast the launch of this rocket live.
她的礼服上缀满了亮片，真是光芒四射啊。
Tā de lǐfú shàng zhuìmǎn le liàngpiàn，zhēnshì guāngmáng sìshè a。
Her dress was fully covered with tinsel, which glittered to all directions.
他的射门击中了门柱，全场观众一片叹声。
Tā de shèmén jīzhòng le ménzhù，quánchǎng guānzhòng yípiàn tànshēng。
His shot hit into the goalpost, and all the audience sighed.
我们需要在这里安装一台天波发射装置。
Wǒmen xūyào zài zhèlǐ ānzhuāng yìtái tiānbō fāshè zhuāngzhì。
We need to install a space wave transmission set-up here.
他被一颗子弹射中了天门，当场毙命。
Tā bèi yì kē zǐdàn shèzhòng le tiānmén，dāngchǎng bìmìng。

This year, China has launched three man-made satellites.

He is good with a gun, he doesn\'t miss any moving target.

In order to figure out the situation of the disaster in front, the troops fighting the flood have launched several flares.
针孔堵住了，注射剂出不来。
Zhēnkǒng dǔzhù le，zhùshèjì chū bùlái。

Before being put into practical use, a new injection would normally go through a series of strict tests.
注射器的绝对无菌是对医院的基本要求。

Absolutely sterile needles are a fundamental requirement for hospitals.

After the injection has gone into the blood, it is resolved by chemical ferment while passing through the liver.

We should not ignore the radioactive pollution caused by home appliances in our daily life.

Bazookas have a long range and are very destructive, they make a strong contribution in wars.

主谓结构。
这首诗可谓命意新奇，别开生面。
Zhèshǒushī kěwèi mìngyì xīnqí，biékāishēngmiàn。
This poem can be considered fresh and original, quite a new approach to the subject.
我倒无所谓，可别人不愿意。
这是随便说的，无所谓什么批评。

采取无所谓的态度
cǎiqǔ wúsuǒwèi de tàidu 
adopt an indifferent attitude
你替他着急，他自己却好像无所谓似的。

You are worried about him, but he himself doesn\'t seem to care.
你就不来，我也无所谓。
Nǐ jiù bù lái，wǒ yě wúsuǒwèi.
Even if you don\'t come, I really don\'t care.
拿不到冠军也无所谓，不要勉为其难。

她对别人的看法一向都持无所谓的态度。
Tā duì biérén de kànfǎ yíxiàng dōu chí wúsuǒwèi de tàidù。
She was always indifferent to other people\'s views.
会议不重要，你来不来无所谓。
Huìyì bú zhòngyào，nǐ láibùlái wúsuǒwèi。
The meeting isn\'t important so it doesn\'t matter if you\'re there or not.
无所谓。
Wúsuǒwèi.
I don\'t care.
他们的所谓新建议无非是老一套。
Tāmen de suǒwèi xīn jiànyì wúfēi shì lǎoyítào。
Their so-called new proposal is nothing but the same old stuff.
无所谓好，也无所谓坏。
我倒无所谓，可别人不愿意。

他对什么事都无所谓。

品牌无所谓，质量才重要。

谓语名词或形容词
You put too much emphasis on predicates.
你把谓语读得太重了。

谓语名词或形容词

无谓
wúwèi
meaningless; pointless; senseless

他演奏的音乐可谓绕梁三日，不绝于耳。

This is an erudite old man.
他俩有共同的艺术主张，真可谓同声相应，同气相求。

My father died at the age of 98, which is a venerated age.
喜宴上，知客的表现可谓是中规中矩。
Xǐyàn shàng，zhīkè de biǎoxiàn kěwèi shì zhōng guī zhōng jǔ。
At the wedding feast, the person in charge of reception behaved according to the rules.
城市的众生相可谓千姿百态。
Chéngshì de zhòngshēngxiàng kěwèi qiānzī bǎitài。
The postures of various people in the city take thousands of forms.
火车可谓是重载交通工具中最为快捷的一种。
Huǒchē kěwèi shì zhòngzǎi jiāotōng gōngjù zhōng zuìwéi kuàijié de yìzhǒng。
Trains may be called the fastest and most convenient transportation tools for heavy loads.
汉字的字形可谓是千变万化。
Hànzì de zìxíng kěwèi shì qiānbiàn wànhuà。
Chinese characters have ever-changing forms.
所谓官僚资产阶级都是有钱有势的人。

Bureaucratic capitalists refer to people that own money and power.
现在的影视界可谓是鱼龙混杂，良莠不齐。
Xiànzài de yǐngshìjiè kěwèishì yúlónghùnzá，liángyǒubùqí。
Nowadays,in film and TV circles, good and bad are mixed together.
他鼓吹他所谓的发明。
Tā gǔchuī tā suǒwèide fāmíng。
He boasted about his so-called invention.
你就不来，我也无所谓。
Nǐ jiù bù lái，wǒ yě wúsuǒwèi.
Even if you don\'t come, I really don\'t care.
拿不到冠军也无所谓，不要勉为其难。
Nábúdào guànjūn yě wúsuǒwèi，búyào miǎnwéiqínán.
It doesn\'t matter if you don\'t win first prize – don\'t be attempting the impossible.
中医所谓上火不止是指嗓子疼一种症状。
Zhōngyī suǒwèi shànghuǒ bùzhǐ shìzhǐ sǎngzi téng yìzhǒng zhèngzhuàng。
What is known in Chinese medicine as excess internal heat covers a lot more than sore throats and the like.

Suǒwèi wǎngchóng，jiùshì shàngwǎng shàngyǐn de rén。

此谓自食其果。
Cǐ wèi zìshíqíguǒ。

Tā duì jiādiànwéixiū kěwèi wúshīzìtōng。

她对别人的看法一向都持无所谓的态度。

不管你怎么说，她总是做无谓的争执。

这个木匠对古典家具的制作可谓经验丰富。

所谓辉煌的试验结果都不怎么辉煌。
Subjects and verbs must always agree in English.
Yīngyǔ zhōng zhǔyǔ hé wèiyǔ bìxū bǎochí yízhì。
英语中主语和谓语必须保持一致。
When forming a question，invert the subject and the verb.
Zài gòuzào yíwènjù shí，yào diāndǎo zhǔyǔ hé wèiyǔ de wèizhi。
在构造疑问句时，要颠倒主语和谓语的位置。
These so-called experts are no help.
Zhèxiē suǒwèi de zhuānjiā dōu bù néng tígōng rènhé bāngzhù。
这些所谓的专家都不能提供任何帮助。
A good lecture was my father\'s idea of discipline.
Wǒ fùqīn duì jìlǜ wèntí de kànfǎ kěwèi yì piān shànghǎo de xùndǎo zhī cí。
我父亲对纪律问题的看法可谓一篇上好的训导之辞。
The pleasures of the table，never of much consequence to one naturally abstemious.
Suǒwèi de kǒufú duìyú tiānshēng jìnyù de de rén éryán méiyǒu shénme yòngchu。
所谓的口福对于天生禁欲的人而言没有什么用处。
In England &quot;fanny&quot; is vulgar slang for female genitals.
Zài Yīnggélán，“fanny”shì duì nǚxìng shēngzhíqì de cūbǐ chēngwèi。
在英格兰，“fanny”是对女性生殖器的粗鄙称谓。
In engineering the margin of safety is the strength of the material minus the anticipated stress.
Zài gōngchéng lǐngyù，suǒwèi ānquán biānjì shì zhǐ cáiliào de qiángdù jiǎn qù yùqī yìnglì de jiéguǒ。

He rejected a black-and-white world.
Tā fǒurèn suǒwèi de hēibáixiāngjiàn de hùnhé shìjiè。
他否认所谓的黑白相间的混合世界。
医学的发达，使很多所谓痼疾都能治好。
Yīxué de fādá，shǐ hěnduō suǒwèi gùjí dōu néngzhìhǎo。
Advances in medical science have made it possible to cure many so-called chronic diseases.
他们的所谓新建议无非是老一套。
Tāmen de suǒwèi xīn jiànyì wúfēi shì lǎoyítào。
Their so-called new proposal is nothing but the same old stuff.
所谓和战问题竟闹得甚嚣尘上。
Suǒwèi hézhàn wèntí jìng nào de shènxiāochénshàng。
A great clamor arose around the question of peace or war.
这本所谓回忆录，实际上是为他自己树碑立传的。
Zhèběn suǒwèi huíyìlù，shíjìshàng shì wèi tā zìjǐ shùbēi lìzhuàn de。
These so-called memoirs are, in fact, an attempt on his part to build up his own image.
他的所谓朋友都背弃了他。
Tā de suǒwèi péngyou dōu bèiqì le tā。
All his so-called friends deserted him.
这是随便说的，无所谓什么批评。
Zhè shì suíbiàn shuō de，wúsuǒwèi shénme pīpíng。
It was a passing remark; I didn\'t mean it as a criticism.
采取无所谓的态度
cǎiqǔ wúsuǒwèi de tàidu 
adopt an indifferent attitude
你替他着急，他自己却好像无所谓似的。
Nǐ tì tā zháojí，tā zìjǐ què hǎo xiàng wúsuǒwèi sì de。
You are worried about him, but he himself doesn\'t seem to care.
这个集团虽然垮台了，但余威尚存，正所谓“百足之虫，死而不僵”。
Zhège jítuán suīrán kuǎtái le，dàn yúwēi shàngcún，zhèng suǒwèi“bǎizú zhī chóng，sǐér bùjiāng”。
Though the group has fallen from prominence, its influence remains.
遇事要冷静，正所谓“兵来将挡，水来土掩”。
Yùshì yào lěngjìng，zhèng suǒwèi“bīnglái jiàngdǎng，shuǐlái tǔyǎn”。
One has to be calm when facing all kinds of situations, as the saying goes “counter measure for measure”.
正所谓“人为刀俎，我为鱼肉”，现在只能任人摆布了。
Zhèng suǒwèi“rén wéi dāozǔ，wǒ wéi yúròu”，xiànzài zhǐnéng rèn rén bǎibù le。
Just as a Chinese saying goes, &quot;being meat or fish on another\'s chopping board&quot;, I am now at others\' mercy.
商家所谓的返利销售，能够真正地让利于消费者吗？
Shāngjiā suǒwèi de fǎnlì xiāoshòu，nénggòu zhēnzhèng de ràng lì yú xiāofèizhě ma?
Can the so-called beneficial sales benefit the consumers in a real sense?

Suǒwèi“huózhì”，tā shì zìránjiè zhōng zhǔyào yóu dànbáizhì gòuchéng bìng jùyǒu shēngzhǎng、fāyù、fánzhí děng nénglì de wùtǐ。

The so-called heretic was sent to the gallows.

Your idea was really amazing.

One may well say that the teacher has done his very best to educate and save him.
他这番表演，真可谓淋漓尽致。

He put on an act, which showed him up completely.
先生这番议论，真可谓之振聋发聩。
Xiānshēngzhè fān yìlùn，zhēn kěwèi zhī zhènlóngfākuì。
Your arguments, sir, would make a deaf man hear and a blind man see.

Tā shì jīnnián de gāokǎo zhuàngyuán，kěwèi dúzhànáotóu！
He came in the first place in this year\'s college entrance exam. He really was the best.
这段经历对于他可谓彻骨铭心。
Zhè duàn jīnglì duìyú tā kěwèi chègǔ míngxīn。
This experience was deeply etched in his mind.
他发表过很多小说，可谓著作等身了。
Tā fābiǎo guò hěnduō xiǎoshuō，kěwèi zhùzuò děngshēn le。
He has published many novels, if you stack them up, they are as tall as he is.

keep within bounds; restrain; bind

欢迎的群众摇动着花束。
Huānyíng de qúnzhòngyáodòng zhe huāshù。
The welcoming crowd waved their bouquets.
用纪律约束自己
yòngjìlǜ yuēshù zìjǐ
keep oneself within the bounds of discipline
本联合声明及其附件具有同等约束力。
Běn liánhéshēngmíng jíqí fùjiàn jùyǒu tóngděng yuēshùlì。
This Joint Declaration and its Annexes shall be equally binding.
交易会展期两天结束。
Jiāoyìhuì zhǎnqī liǎngtiān jiéshù。
The fair will be extended for another two days.
战事结束
zhànshì jiéshù 
conclusion of the war; termination of hostilities
在银行开立(结束)账户
zài yínhángkāilì（jiéshù）zhànghù
open (close) an account with a bank
束之高阁
shùzhīgāogé
tie sth. up and place it on the top shelf—lay aside and neglect; shelve; pigeonhole
拘束
jūshù
restrain; restrict
他光会耍笔杆，碰到实际问题就束手无策。
Tā guānghuì shuǎ bǐgǎn，pèngdào shíjì wèntí jiù shùshǒuwúcè。
He knows only how to wield a pen and is helpless in the face of practical problems.
约束
yuēshù
keep within bounds; restrain; bind
她的婚育期快结束了。
Tā de hūnyùqī kuài jiéshù le。
总统先生今天下午结束了对我国的访问。
Zǒngtǒng xiānshēng jīntiān xiàwǔ jiéshù le duì wǒguó de fǎngwèn。
This afternoon the President wrapped up his visit to China.
英国于1922年2月28日宣布结束埃及保护国地位。
Yīngguó yú yījiǔèrèr nián èryuè èrshíbārì xuānbùjiéshù Āijí bǎohùguó dìwèi。
The United Kingdom declared that, starting from February 28th, 1922,  Egypt would no longer be its protectorate .
我们应摒除传统观念对思想的束缚。
Wǒmen yīng bìngchú chuántǒng guānniàn duì sīxiǎng de shùfù。
We should get rid of the bondage that traditional ideas have on our mind.
战争结束后，原本繁华的城市已是花草残败，一片萧条。
Zhànzhēng jiéshù hòu，yuánběn fánhuá de chéngshì yǐ shì huācǎo cánbài，yí piàn xiāotiáo。
After the war, the cities were in ruins.
对方的态度过于粗硬，我们只好暂时结束会谈。
Duìfāng de tàidu guòyú cūyìng，wǒmen zhǐhǎo zànshí jiéshù huìtán。
Due to the course manner of the other party, we have to temporarily stop the meeting.
这个地区的冬种工作已经基本结束。
Zhège dìqū de dōngzhòng gōngzuò yǐjing jīběn jiéshù。
The winter planting job has almost been finished in this area.
战争结束后，这里的防空壕被改建成了水渠。
Zhànzhēng jiéshù hòu，zhèlǐ de fángkōngháo bèi gǎijiàn chéng le shuǐqú。
When the war was over, these air-raid dugouts were rebuilt as canals.
教师节那天，全班同学为张老师奉上了一束鲜花。
Jiàoshījié nàtiān，quánbān tóngxué wèi Zhāng lǎoshī fèngshàng le yí shù xiānhuā。
On Teachers\' Day, the whole class offered a bunch of flowers to Professor Zhang.
我们要突破条条杠杠的束缚，勇于改革。
Wǒmen yào tūpò tiáotiáogànggàng de shùfù，yǒngyú gǎigé。
We should break rules and regulations as well as pursue courageous reforms.
这些常用书怎么能束之高阁呢？
Zhèxiē chángyòng shū zěnme néng shùzhīgāogé ne？
How can you put aside these commonly used books?
为了结束战争，两国进行了和平谈判。
Wèile jiéshù zhànzhēng，liǎng guó jìnxíng le hépíng tánpàn。
The two countries are having negotiations in order to end the war.
为了尽快结束战争，他们提出了和议。
Wèile jìnkuài jiéshù zhànzhēng，tāmen tíchū le héyì。
They proposed a negotiation to end the war as soon as possible.
这样浑噩的日子，还有什么好过的，不如早点结束吧。
Zhèyàng húnè de rìzi，háiyǒu shénme hǎo guò de，bùrú zǎodiǎn jiéshù ba。
Such a muddle-headed life is meaningless. Stop it right now!
他受不了家庭的羁束，离家出走了。
Tā shòubuliǎo jiātíng de jīshù，líjiā chūzǒu le。
He went away from home because he couldn\'t stand the restrictions there.
小王在结婚纪念日送给妻子一束玫瑰花。
Xiǎo Wáng zài jiéhūn jìniànrì sònggěi qīzǐ yí shù méiguīhuā。
Xiao Wang gave his wife a bouquet of roses for their wedding anniversary.
小孩子从小就要受检束，否则长大会没有规矩的。
Xiǎoháizi cóng xiǎo jiùyào shòu jiǎnshù，fǒuzé zhǎngdà huì méiyǒu guījǔ de。
Children should be taught to follow rules, so that they will discipline themselves when they grow up.
会议就要结束了，我们请大会主席讲几句结语。
Huìyì jiùyào jiéshù le，wǒmen qǐng dàhuì zhǔxí jiǎng jǐ jù jiéyǔ。

期末考试结束了，孩子们解绳松绑了。

他把球一脚踢到了界外，这时比赛正好结束了。

He kicked the ball out of the field when the game was over.
警务人员要用警绳约束举止失控的醉酒人。

The police officers use police ropes to discipline drunkards.
这场篮球赛结束时，中国队净胜15分。
Zhèchǎng lánqiúsài jiéshù shí，Zhōngguóduì jìngshèng shíwǔ fēn。
Team China won the basketball game by 15 points.
我们的演出劳务费都是在演出结束时候才结算。
Wǒmen de yǎnchū láowùfèi dōushì zài yǎnchū jiéshù shíhou cái jiésuàn。

他总是打扮成老派的装束，看起来也蛮有意思。
Tā zǒngshì dǎbànchéng lǎopài de zhuāngshù，kànqǐlái yě mányǒu yìsi。
He always wears obsolete clothes and looks very funny.

bùchéngwén de lìguī zhàoyàng jùyǒu yuēshùlì。

他讲话结束后，掌声络绎不绝。
Tā jiǎnghuà jiéshù hòu，zhǎngshēng luòyìbùjué。
After his speech, applause went on endlessly.

这次竞赛结束后，他被评为最佳运动员。

这场话剧演出一结束，就有专人放下了帲幪。

Zhèběn shīkān zhǔyào kāndēng de shì qīngnián shīrén de xīnzuò，qí nèiróng yǔ xíngshì dōu hěnqiánwè，gǎnyú dǎpò qiánrén de shùfù。

我性情疏放，最受不了拘束。
Wǒ xìngqíng shūfàng，zuì shòubuliǎo jūshù。
I am a self-indulgent person, and can\'t stand restraint.
与其束手待毙还不如拼死一战，死也要死得有骨气！

We would rather fight with all our might than helplessly wait for death. We won\'t lose moral integrity even in death!
这几个犯罪分子还算老实，警察一到，他们就束手就擒了。

These criminals were somewhat docile. Once the policemen came, they allowed themselves to be seized without putting up a fight.
他不是一个遇到困难就束手无策的人。
Tā búshì yígè yùdào kùnnan jiù shùshǒuwúcè de rén。
He is not a man without resources when running into trouble.
她每天都束腰，看起来是瘦点了，但不知道对身体是否有害。
Tā měitiān dōu shùyāo，kànqǐlái shì shòudiǎn le，dàn bùzhīdào duì shēntǐ shìfǒu yǒu hài。
She wears a girdle around her waist every day, and indeed looks thinner, but I don\'t know whether it is harmful to her body.
这个束腰的裙子，越发衬托出了她的高挑婀娜。
Zhège shùyāo de qúnzi，yuè fā chèntuō chū le tā de gāotiāo ēnuó。
This waist-hugging dress sets off her slimness and grace.
不知道为什么，酒宴还没结束他就逃席了。

The reform should be pursued to the end. We should not let rules and regulations restrain us.
你不能一辈子被这个铁锁链束缚着呀！
Nǐ bùnéng yíbèizi bèi zhège tiěsuǒliàn shùfù zhe ya！
You should break away from the constraint some day!
缓缓落下的帏幕表明舞台剧已经结束了。

表演结束后他们从下场门走下了台。

她每天出门前都要妆束很久。

Jìngxuǎnyùndòng gǎigé de héxīnnèiróng shì yǒuguān“ruǎn qián”（bú shòu liánbāng jìngxuǎn cáiwù fǎ yuēshù de jìngxuǎn zījīn）de jìnlìng。
竞选运动改革的核心内容是有关“软钱”（不受联邦竞选财务法约束的竞选资金）的禁令。
I am willing to accept certain restrictions on my movements.
Wǒ yuànyì jiēshòu duì wǒ huódòng fànwéi de mǒuxiē yuēshù。
我愿意接受对我活动范围的某些约束。
He was unconstrained by any of the sanctions of polite society.
Tā bú shòu shàngliúshèhuì de rènhé tiáotiáokuāngkuāng de yuēshù。
他不受上流社会的任何条条框框的约束。
应该用纪律约束懒散的工作人员。
The gathering dissipated as the day waned on.
Suízhe yì tiān de jiéshù，jùhuì yě mànmàn de sǎn le。
随着一天的结束，聚会也慢慢地散了。
会议就要结束了，我们请大会主席讲几句结语。

结束讲话
jiéshù jiǎnghuà 
wind up a speech

jiéshù zhànzhēngzhuàngtài 
terminate the state of war

zhànshì jiéshù 
conclusion of the war; termination of hostilities
在银行开立(结束)账户
zài yínhángkāilì（jiéshù）zhànghù
open (close) an account with a bank

yí shù xiānhuā
a bunch of flowers
教师节那天，全班同学为张老师奉上了一束鲜花。
Jiàoshījié nàtiān，quánbān tóngxué wèi Zhāng lǎoshī fèngshàng le yí shù xiānhuā。

他手捧一束鲜花。
Tā shǒu pěng yíshù xiānhuā.
He held a bouquet of flowers in both hands.
他送给妻子一大束鲜花。
Tā sònggěi qīzǐ yídàshù xiānhuā。
He gave his wife a big bunch of flowers.
她注视着窗台上的一束鲜花。
Tā zhùshìzhe chuāngtái shàng de yíshù xiānhuā。
She\'s staring at the bunch of fresh flowers on the windowsill.

After the war, the cities were in ruins.

Tā duì xué wàiyǔ bùgǎnxìngqù，ràng tā xuéxue huìhuà kàn，dào xǔ héshì。

兴趣
xìngqù
interest

后宫干政现象引起了我的兴趣。

他对滚石乐很感兴趣。

He is interested in rock-and-roll.
他对红铜很感兴趣，经常拿来做实验。

He is very interested in, and experimenting with red copper.

识趣

There are many interesting stories about the theatre to talk about, but fewer and fewer old gentlemen know them today.

Students in the university are interested in stories of celebrities.
小镇上的人们对一般性的佚闻都不感兴趣。

People in the town show no interest in ordinary anecdotes.

他真会逗趣儿！

他是一个很有风趣的人。

He is a man of charm and wit.
她说话很有风趣。

Her interests are fairly broad.
广泛的兴趣
guǎngfàn de xìngqù
wide interests

He began to be interested in dictionary-making 20 years ago, and since then has worked at it gladly and never tired.
生活中的乐趣
shēnghuó zhōng de lèqù 
joys of life

Yào zài gōngzuò zhōng zhǎodào lèqù，děi xiān bǎ gōngzuò zuòhǎo。
Joy in work comes from mastery of work.
孤立地看，每一个情节都很平淡，连缀在一起，就有趣了。
Gūlì de kàn，měi yígè qíngjié dōu hěn píngdàn，liánzhuì zài yìqǐ，jiù yǒuqù le。
When taken separately, each of the episodes is rather dull, but when linked together, they\'re very interesting.
咱们别理他，给他个没趣。
Zánmen bié lǐ tā，gěi tā gè méiqù。
Let\'s pay no attention to him. Just ignore him.

biǎoxiàn nóngyù de xìngqù
show a great interest in sth.

ráoyǒufēngqù

This book is so interesting that you can\'t put it aside once you start reading it.

他没有兴趣去找麻烦。
The men heard her pleas for help, but they shrugged their shoulders and did nothing.

男人们听到了她的求救，但他们缺乏兴趣，没做任何事。
His lack of interest in the project reflects badly on him.
Tā duì zhège xiàngmù méiyǒu xìngqù，zhè qiàrúqífèn de fǎnyìngle tā de tèdiǎn。
他对这个项目没有兴趣，这恰如其分地反映了他的特点。
I let it be known that I was not interested.
Wǒ xuānbù，wǒ méiyǒu xìngqù。
我宣布，我没有兴趣。
Interest in his novels waned.
Rénmen duì tā de xiǎoshuō yuèláiyuè méiyǒu xìngqù le。
人们对他的小说越来越没有兴趣了。
I have no real interest in working for that company.
其实我对在那家公司工作没什么兴趣。

这篇文章写的不错，颇为有趣，只是没多少实质性的内容。
They have made the place as unappealing as possible.
Tāmen shǐde zhè kuài dìfang yìdiǎn qùwèi dōu méiyǒu le。
他们使得这块地方一点趣味都没有了。
Don is not the least bit interested in her.

当恩对她没有丝毫的兴趣。

他们没有说什么太有趣的事情。

没有卖座明星，这部电影剧本很难令人感兴趣。
生活中的乐趣
shēnghuó zhōng de lèqù 
joys of life
要在工作中找到乐趣，得先把工作做好。
Yào zài gōngzuò zhōng zhǎodào lèqù，děi xiān bǎ gōngzuò zuòhǎo。
Joy in work comes from mastery of work.
这个新建的公园给市民平添许多乐趣。
Zhège xīn jiàn de gōngyuán gěi shìmín píngtiān xǔduō lèqù。
The new park is an important addition to the amenities of the town.
久居城市的人们都喜欢到乡村度假，就是为了追寻反璞归真的乐趣。
Jiǔjū chéngshì de rénmen dōu xǐhuan dào xiāngcūn dùjià，jiùshì wèi le zhuīxún fǎnpúguīzhēn de lèqù。
People living in the city like to spend their vacation in the countryside to pursue the pleasures of returning to nature.
他以揭疮疤为乐趣，所以大家都很讨厌他。

He takes delight in touching others\' sore spots, which disgusts everybody.

Tao Yuanming was not interested in becoming an official, and finally chose to be a hermit in a forest enjoying the fun of rural life.

Wǒ mǎnhuái xǐyuè guānchá tánjǐng，tǐhuì tán zhōng yú yǔ yóuzhě xiānglè de jiāqù。
I enjoyed the charming scene of the pool, where the fish and the swimmers were enjoying each other\'s company.
他对滚石乐很感兴趣。
Tā duì gǔnshíyuè hěngǎn xìngqù。
He is interested in rock-and-roll.
20年前他对编词典产生了兴趣，从此乐此不疲。
Èrshínián qián tā duì biāncídiǎn chǎnshēng le xìngqù，cóngcǐ lècǐbùpí。
He began to be interested in dictionary-making 20 years ago, and since then has worked at it gladly and never tired.
对于他的趣闻，邻居们都津津乐道。
Duìyú tā de qùwén，línjūmen dōu jīnjīn lèdào。
About his anecdotes, his neighbours all took delight in talking.

The students were very interested in English, so they started an English club.
乐趣
校园生活充满乐趣。
你别拿我凑趣儿取乐了
你真会逗趣儿，把死人都能逗乐了

音乐给她乐趣。
Life is not all pleasure.
生活并不全是乐趣。
deep joy
极大的乐趣
to find pleasure in music
在音乐中感受到乐趣
to give pleasure
带来乐趣
Think what joy was ours.
回忆哪些是我们往昔的乐趣。

狩猎者捕杀这些无辜的鸟能得到什么乐趣呢？！
My children had all the fun of the fair playing in the bumper cars.
我的几个孩子玩碰碰车，公平比赛，乐趣多多。
to get a lot of fun out of sth
从某事中得到许多乐趣
he gets a lot of pleasure from music
他从音乐中得到了很大乐趣
to get a kick out of sth
从某事中获得乐趣

structure of an article; composition

篇章

篇章布局
piānzhāng bùjú
structure of an article
这篇文章篇幅不太长。
Zhèpiān wénzhāngpiānfú bú tài cháng。
This article is not very long.
这篇文章通篇都是溢美之词。
Zhèpiān wénzhāng tōngpiān dōushì yìměi zhī cí。
The whole article is filled with undeserved words of praise.
这篇文章白字连篇。
Zhèpiān wénzhāng báizì liánpiān。
There\'re so many wrong characters in this piece.
这篇文章简直是废话连篇。
Zhèpiān wénzhāng jiǎnzhí shì fèihuàliánpiān。
This article is just so much nonsense.
他一个月写两篇文章，我一星期就写3篇。
Tā yígè yuè xiě liǎngpiān wénzhāng，wǒ yì xīngqī jiù xiě sānpiān.
He writes two articles a month. I write as many as three a week.
这篇文章文理显豁，主题清楚，是篇不可多得的佳作。
Zhèpiān wénzhāng wénlǐ xiǎnhuō，zhǔtí qīngchu，shì piān bùkě duōdé de jiāzuò。
This article is clear in its theme, and logical in its structure.
他的这篇文章言辞流畅语意联贯，是一篇不错的作品。
Tā de zhèpiān wénzhāng yáncí liúchàng yǔyì liánguàn，shì yì piān búcuò de zuòpǐn。
His essay was verbally smooth, and consistent in content.  It is quite a good article.
这篇文章没有表现出作者平素的笔力
zhèpiān wénzhāng méiyǒu biǎoxiànchū zuòzhě píngsù de bǐlì。
This essay lacks the vigour and vitality which characterize the author\'s usual style.
这篇文章苍白无力。
Zhèpiān wénzhāngcāngbái wúlì。
This article is flat writing.
这篇文章侧重讨论交通运输问题。
Zhèpiān wénzhāngcèzhòngtǎolùn jiāotōngyùnshū wèntí。
In this article, special emphasis is laid on problems of communications and transportation.
这篇文章层次不清。
Zhèpiān wénzhāng céngcì bùqīng。
This article lacks unity and coherence.
这篇文章阐发了在我国发展商品经济的意义。
Zhèpiān wénzhāng chǎnfā le zài wǒguó fāzhǎn shāngpǐn jīngjì de yìyì。
This article elucidates the significance of developing a commodity economy in our country.
抽印学报的头一篇文章
chōuyìn xuébào de tóuyìpiān wénzhāng
offprint the first article of the journal
这篇文章我先打个底子，再请你修改。
Zhèpiān wénzhāng wǒ xiān dǎ gè dǐzi，zài qǐng nǐ xiūgǎi。
I\'ll make a draft of the essay and then ask you to revise it.
这篇文章写得真带劲。
Zhèpiān wénzhāng xiě de zhēn dàijìn。
This is a very forceful piece of writing.
如果一篇文章颠来倒去总是那么几个词，人家就不愿看。
Rúguǒ yì piān wénzhāng diānláidǎoqù zǒngshì nàme jǐgè cí，rénjia jiù búyuàn kàn。
No one cares to read an article that merely rings the changes on a few terms.
那篇文章是东拼西凑来的。
Nà piān wénzhāng shì dōngpīnxīcòu lái de。
That article is just scissors-and-paste work.
这篇文章段落清楚。
Zhèpiān wénzhāng duànluò qīngchu。
This article is well paragraphed.
这篇文章长而空。
Zhèpiān wénzhāng cháng ér kōng。
This article is long-winded and lacks substance.
这篇文章写得太烦琐。
Zhèpiān wénzhāng xiě de tài fánsuǒ。
This article is too long and wordy.
他写完这篇文章以后，又改了改。
Tā xiěwán zhèpiān wénzhāng yǐhòu，yòu gǎi le gǎi。
After he finished writing the essay he made a few more changes in it.
这篇文章我只改动了一些词句。
Zhèpiān wénzhāng wǒ zhǐ gǎidòng le yìxiē cíjù。
I just polished a few sentences in this essay.
这篇文章写得狗屁不通。
Zhèpiān wénzhāng xiě de gǒupìbùtōng。
This article is mere trash.
这篇文章讲国民经济，具有一定的广度和深度。
Zhèpiān wénzhāngjiǎngguómínjīngjì，jùyǒu yídìng de guǎngdù hé shēndù。
This article is a fairly comprehensive and in-depth study of the national economy.
请你把这篇文章的大意归纳一下。
Qǐngnǐ bǎ zhèpiān wénzhāng de dàyì guīnà yíxià。
Will you please sum up the main ideas of this article?
这篇文章记叙了他的先进事迹。
Zhèpiān wénzhāngjìxù le tā de xiānjìn shìjì。
The article tells about his exemplary deeds.
这篇文章需要加工。
Zhèpiān wénzhāngxūyào jiāgōng。
This article needs polishing.
这篇文章不是他写的，是别人假托他的名义发表的。
Zhèpiān wénzhāngbú shì tā xiě de，shì biérén jiǎtuō tā de míngyì fābiǎo de。
He didn\'t write the essay; somebody else did, and published it under his name.
这篇文章语言质朴，毫无矫饰。
Zhèpiān wénzhāngyǔyán zhìpǔ，háo wú jiǎoshì。
This article is written in a simple style, free from any kind of affectation.
这篇文章可长可短，你看着办吧。
Zhèpiān wénzhāngkě chángkě duǎn，nǐ kàn zhe bàn ba。
You can make this article either long or short, as you see fit.
这篇文章写得还可以。
Zhèpiān wénzhāng xiě de hǎi kěyǐ。
This article is pretty good.
这篇文章写得空空洞洞，没有什么内容。
Zhèpiān wénzhāngxiě de kōngkōngdòngdòng，méiyǒu shénme nèiróng。
The article is empty and hollow, devoid of substance.
这篇文章写得太拉杂。
Zhèpiān wénzhāngxiě de tài lāzá。
This article is very badly organized.
这篇文章读起来很流畅。
Zhèpiān wénzhāngdú qǐlái hěn liúchàng。
The essay reads very smoothly.
这篇文章论点鲜明。
Zhèpiān wénzhānglùndiǎn xiānmíng。
The argument set forth in the article is clear-cut.
这篇文章结构严谨，脉络分明。
Zhèpiān wénzhāngjiégòu yánjǐn，màiluò fēnmíng。
This article is closely knit and presents its ideas in a clear, logical way.
这篇文章眉目清楚。
Zhèpiān wénzhāngméimù qīngchu。
The article is clear and well-organized.
你这篇文章哪会儿才能脱稿？
Nǐ zhèpiān wénzhāngnǎhuìr cái néngtuōgǎo?
When can you get the draft ready?
一篇文章
yì piān wénzhānɡ
a piece of writing; an article
这篇文章拼排有错误。
Zhèpiān wénzhāngpīnpái yǒu cuòwù。
There is something wrong in the composition and layout of this article.
这篇文章里，有的地方用词不恰当。
Zhèpiān wénzhānglǐ，yǒu de dìfāngyòngcí bú qiàdāng。
Words were used inappropriately in some parts of this essay.
你这样解释这篇文章太牵强附会了。
Nǐ zhèyàngjiěshì zhèpiān wénzhāngtài qiānqiángfùhuì le。
Your interpretation of this essay is much too forced.
这篇文章写得不错，然而还可以改进。
Zhèpiān wénzhāng xiě de búcuò，rán\'ér hái kěyǐ gǎijìn。
The composition is all right, there is room for improvement, however.
这篇文章需要润色一下。
Zhèpiān wénzhāng xūyào rùnsè yíxià。
This essay needs polishing.
主编很赏识他这篇文章。
Zhǔbiān hěn shǎngshí tā zhèpiān wénzhāng。
The editor in chief thinks highly of this article of his.
茅盾的这篇文章值得赏析。
Máodùn de zhèpiān wénzhāngzhídé shǎngxī。
This article of Mao Dun\'s merits careful study.
这篇文章已收录在他的选集里。
Zhèpiān wénzhāng yǐ shōulù zài tā de xuǎnjí lǐ。
This essay is included in his selected works.
这篇文章抒写了他在日内瓦工作时的一些感受。
Zhèpiān wénzhāng shūxiě le tā zài Rìnèiwǎ gōngzuò shí de yìxiē gǎnshòu。
The article describes how he felt while working in Geneva.
这篇文章还得顺一顺。
Zhèpiān wénzhāng hái děi shùnyishùn。
This essay needs polishing.
把这篇文章连同我的修改部分誊写出来。
Bǎ zhèpiān wénzhāng liántóng wǒ de xiūgǎi bùfen téngxiě chūlái。
Copy out the article, including all the corrections I have made.
这篇文章，论证严密天衣无缝。
Zhèpiān wénzhāng，lùnzhèngyánmì tiānyīwúfèng。
The article is close-knit and its argument flawless.
这篇文章条理清楚。
Zhèpiān wénzhāngtiáolǐ qīngchu。
The article is well-organized.
这篇文章的结尾显得有点秃。
Zhèpiān wénzhāng de jiéwěi xiǎnde yǒudiǎn tū。
This article seems to end rather lamely.
这篇文章论证周密，无懈可击。
Zhèpiān wénzhānglùnzhèngzhōumì，wúxièkějī。
The article is closely reasoned and the arguments are unassailable.
这篇文章可以做教材。
Zhèpiān wénzhāngkěyǐ zuò jiàocái。
This article may be used as teaching material.
这篇文章写得半文半白的。
Zhèpiān wénzhāng xiě de bànwén bànbái de。
This paper is written in a confusing linguistic style.
他认为，这篇文章最终得出的结论是背谬的。
Tā rènwéi，zhèpiān wénzhāng zuì zhōng déchū de jiélùn shì bèimiù de。
He believes that the conclusion of this article is ridiculous.
相信大家已经领会了这篇文章的本旨。
Xiāngxìn dàjiā yǐjing lǐnghuì le zhèpiān wénzhāng de běnzhǐ。
I believe that everyone has grasped the main idea of this article.
这篇文章笔意从容，令人印象深刻。
Zhèpiān wénzhāng bǐyì cóngróng，lìngrén yìn xiàng shēnkè。
This article is impressive, it is written with both ease, and grace.
他的这篇文章分析辨难，却又不露锋芒。
Tā de zhèpiān wénzhāng fēnxī biànnán，què yòu búlòu fēngmáng。
He argues by using challenging questions in a subtle way.
金庸曾写过一篇文章叫《丙丁之岁》。
Jīn Yōng céng xiěguò yì piān wénzhāng jiào《Bǐngdīngzhīsuì》。
Jingyong, the famous novelist once wrote an article called “the age of fire”.
这篇文章的内容不够充实，需要进一步补写。
Zhèpiān wénzhāng de nèiróng búgòu chōngshí，xūyào jìnyíbùbǔxiě。
This article is not informative enough, and should be expanded to include more details.
他的这篇文章剿说而无当，受到了老师的批评。
Tā de zhèpiān wénzhāng jiǎoshuō ér wúdāng，shòudào le lǎoshī de pīpíng。
He was criticized by the teacher, because in his article he took ideas from others, and presented them as his own.
这篇文章都是陈言俗套，毫无新意。
Zhèpiān wénzhāng dōushì chényán sútào，háowú xīnyì。
Without the least innovation, the article is full of platitudes.
这个词在这篇文章中的词频很高。
Zhège cí zài zhèpiān wénzhāng zhōng de cípín hěngāo。
This word appears frequently in the article.
这篇文章使用了倒叙手法。
Zhèpiān wénzhāng shǐyòng le dàoxù shǒufǎ。
This article adopts the flashback technique.
你的这篇文章还需要再雕饰一下。
Nǐ de zhèpiān wénzhāng hái xūyào zài diāoshì yíxià。
You should make some more improvements in this article.
这篇文章不仅语言繁冗，而且也没什么思想。
Zhèpiān wénzhāng bùjǐn yǔyán fánrǒng，érqiě yě méi shénme sīxiǎng。
This article is flowery in language but empty in content.
这篇文章语言繁芜，最好能再精炼一下。
Zhèpiān wénzhāng yǔyán fánwú，zuì hǎo néng zài jīngliàn yíxià。
This article is too wordy, it needs revision.
你千万不要以为这篇文章单单是写风月之事的，其实它有着严肃的主题。
Nǐ qiānwàn búyào yǐwéi zhèpiān wénzhāng dāndān shì xiě fēngyuè zhī shì de，qíshí tā yǒu zhe yánsù de zhǔtí。
This article is by no means just a romance, it actually has an elevated theme.
这篇文章出自著名政治观察家之手。
Zhèpiān wénzhāng chūzì zhùmíng zhèngzhì guānchájiā zhī shǒu。
This article was written by a political observer.
这篇文章你就别看了，我瞎划拉的。
Zhèpiān wénzhāng nǐ jiù biékàn le，wǒ xiā huála de。
You needn\'t read this essay. I wrote it withoiut planning.
这篇文章太过冗长，要简缩一下。
Zhèpiān wénzhāng tài guò rǒngcháng，yào jiǎnsuō yíxià。
The essay is too wordy, you\'d better condense it.
简言之，这篇文章的结尾一定要写的感人。
Jiǎnyánzhī，zhèpiān wénzhāng de jiéwěi yídìng yào xiě de gǎnrén。
In short, the ending of this essay should be as impressive as possible.
这篇文章文笔显得有些蹇涩，可见作者的功力尚浅。
Zhèpiān wénzhāng wénbǐ xiǎnde yǒuxiē jiǎnsè，kějiàn zuòzhě de gōnglì shàngqiǎn。
The essay doesn\'t reads smoothly, which reveals that the author is far from being skilled in writing.
这篇文章介绍了梵蒂冈教廷的现状。
Zhèpiān wénzhāng jièshào le fàndìgāng jiàotíng de xiànzhuàng。
This article introduces the current situation of the papal government in the Vatican.
这篇文章在前后接榫的地方需要处理。
Zhèpiān wénzhāng zài qiánhòu jiēsǔn de dìfāng xūyào chǔlǐ。
This essay is not coherent enough, it needs to be improved in this respect.
这篇文章多次使用了借代的手法。
Zhèpiān wénzhāng duōcì shǐyòng le jièdài de shǒufǎ。
This article often employs metaphors.
这篇文章是理解《易经》的津梁。
Zhèpiān wénzhāng shì lǐjiě《Yìjīng》 de jīnliáng。
This article is a bridge to understanding The Book of Changes.
这篇文章的筋节处处理得很好。
Zhèpiān wénzhāng de jīnjiéchù chǔlǐ de hěnhǎo。
The vital links in this article are very well handled.
这篇文章就教于广大读者。
Zhèpiān wénzhāng jiù jiàoyú guǎngdà dúzhě。
This article consults all its readers.
读这篇兰章是一种阅读的享受！
Dú zhèpiān lánzhāng shì yìzhǒng yuèdú de xiǎngshòu！
It is a pleasure to read the beautiful writing.
这篇文章鲁鱼亥豕，错误百出。
Zhèpiān wénzhāng lǔyú hàishǐ，cuòwù bǎichū。
In this article, a lot of clerical and typographical errors are made through confusing similar characters.
相比较而言，还是这篇文章略胜一筹。
Xiāng bǐjiào éryán，háishi zhèpiān wénzhāng lüèshèng yìchóu。
By comparison, this article is a notch above.
这篇文章的论旨很清晰，没有什么复杂难懂的地方。
Zhèpiān wénzhāng de lùnzhǐ hěnqīngxī，méiyǒu shénme fùzá nándǒng de dìfāng。
The article has a clear argumentation, and contains nothing complicated.
这篇文章漫议了京剧发展的现状。
Zhèpiān wénzhāng mànyì le jīngjù fāzhǎn de xiànzhuàng。
This article discusses freely the development of Beijing opera.
这篇文章文辞妙丽，一定是出自名家之手。
Zhèpiān wénzhāng wéncí miàolì，yídìng shì chūzì míngjiā zhī shǒu。
This article is beautiful and smart in diction, so it must be written by a famous master.
他的这篇文章写得十分凝炼简洁。
Tā de zhèpiān wénzhāng xiě de shífēn níngliàn jiǎnjié。
The language of this article is concise and succinct.
这篇文章浓墨重彩地描写了唐长安城的繁华。
Zhèpiān wénzhāng nóngmò zhòngcǎi de miáoxiě le Táng Chángānchéng de fánhuá。
The article describes Chang\'an\'s prosperity in the Tang dynasty in a rich and colorful manner.
你这篇文章根本没破题，不符合要求。
Nǐ zhèpiān wénzhāng gēnběn méi pòtí，bùfúhé yāoqiú。
Your article hasn’t addressed the theme at all, it doesn\'t meet the requirements.
他这篇文章大量使用了曲笔手法。
Tā zhèpiān wénzhāng dàliàng shǐyòng le qūbǐ shǒufǎ。
He uses a great number of deliberate digressions in this article.
删节号用在这篇文章的末尾，恰到好处。
Shānjiéhào yòng zài zhèpiān wénzhāng de mòwěi，qiàdàohǎochu。
It is just fine to put the ellipsis at the end of the article.
《天桥拾趣》这篇文章讲的是老北京天桥艺人们的零散故事。
《Tiānqiáoshíqù》zhèpiān wénzhāng jiǎng de shì lǎo Běijīng tiānqiáo yìrénmen de língsǎn gùshì。
The Interesting Stories on the Overpasses is an article describing odd stories of the artists on overpasses in old Beijing.
如果这篇文章能够再条畅一些就更好了。
Rúguǒ zhèpiān wénzhāng nénggòu zài tiáochàng yìxiē jiù gèng hǎo le。
If the article becomes a bit more coherent, it will be a much better article.
在这篇文章中这个“燕”字通假“宴”字。
Zài zhèpiān wénzhāng zhōng zhège“yàn”zì tōngjiǎ“yàn”zì。
In this article, the two characters are Tongjiazi (a Chinese character used to express another character because of same or similar pronunciation in ancient China).
这篇文章是最突显作者写作风格的一部作品。
Zhèpiān wénzhāng shì zuì tūxiǎn zuòzhě xiězuò fēnggé de yíbù zuòpǐn。
This article is the author\'s work that best displays his writing style.
请你把这篇文章上的脱误之处加以改正。
Qǐng nǐ bǎ zhèpiān wénzhāng shàng de tuōwù zhī chù jiāyǐ gǎizhèng。
Please correct the omissions and errors in this article.
与开头比起来，这篇文章的尾部写得更加精彩。
Yǔ kāitóu bǐqǐlái，zhèpiān wénzhāng de wěibùxiě de gèngjiā jīngcǎi。
The ending of this article outshines the beginning.
出版社请知名画家为这篇文章配画尾花。
Chūbǎnshè qǐng zhīmíng huàjiā wèi zhèpiān wénzhāng pèihuà wěihuā。
The publisher has invited a famous painter to paint an ornamental flower for this article.
昨天我扬扬洒洒写了一篇文章，结果没存盘。
Zuótiān wǒ yángyángsǎsǎ xiě le yì piān wénzhāng，jiéguǒ méi cúnpán。
I wrote an long article yesterday, but I didn\'t save it.
这篇文章记录了我在学习过程中的一得之见。
Zhèpiān wénzhāng jìlù le wǒ zài xuéxí guòchéng zhōng de yìdé zhī jiàn。
The article records my opinions during the study process.
这篇文章纯属杂凑而成，文理不通。
Zhèpiān wénzhāng chúnshǔ zácòu érchéng，wénlǐ bùtōng。
This article has been written entirely from different pieces so that it doesn\'t make any sense.
请把这篇文章直接送到责任编辑那里。
Qǐng bǎ zhèpiān wénzhāng zhíjiē sòngdào zérèn biānjí nàlǐ。
Please send this article to the executive editor.
我们把这两篇文章安排在增编的版面里。
Wǒmen bǎ zhè liǎng piān wénzhāng ānpái zài zēngbiān de bǎnmiàn lǐ。
We put these two articles in the added layout.
这篇文章写的比较含蓄，其中的感情只可意会，不可言传。
Zhèpiān wénzhāng xiě de bǐjiào hánxù，qí zhōng de gǎnqíng zhǐkě yìhuì，bùkě yánchuán。
This article is very implicit. The feelings expressed by it can be felt, but not explained in words.
这篇文章最后一个自然段与开头相呼应。
Zhèpiān wénzhāng zuìhòu yígè zìránduàn yǔ kāitóu xiāng hūyìng。
The last paragraph of this works in concert with the opening paragraph.
这篇文章一连用了二十多个感叹句。
Zhèpiān wénzhāng yìlián yòng le èrshí duō gè gǎntànjù。
This article has over twenty exclamatory sentences in a row.
这篇文章读起来有点别扭。
Zhèpiān wénzhāng dúqǐlái yǒudiǎn bièniǔ。
This essay reads a little awkwardly.
大家需要仔细读这篇文章。
Dàjiā xūyào zǐxìdú zhèpiān wénzhāng。
Everyone should read this article carefully.
对于这篇文章，大家理解不一。
Duìyú zhèpiānwénzhāng，dàjiā lǐjiěbùyī。
Not everyone understands this article in the same way.
为写这篇文章我费了很大的神。
Wèi xiě zhèpiān wénzhāng wǒ fèile hěndàde shén。
I put a lot of energy into writing this article.
这篇文章记载了当时的情况。
Zhè piān wénzhāng jìzǎile dāngshí de qíngkuàng.
This essay records the situation at that time.
这篇文章颇有见地。
Zhè piān wénzhāng pōyǒu jiàndì.
This essay is quite insightful.
这篇文章眉目不清。
Zhè piān wénzhāng méimù bù qīng.
This article is badly ordered.

sānpiān wénzhāng
three essays
这篇文章虽然平铺直叙，但十分感人。
Zhè piān wénzhāng suīrán píngpūzhíxù，dàn shífēn gǎnrén.
Although this essay is a little pedestrian, it\'s deeply moving all the same.
这篇文章读起来绕嘴。

Zhèpiān wénzhāng quēfá shēndù。

Zhèpiān wénzhāng shōuwěi cāngcù le xiē。
This article concludes in a hasty fashion.

This piece is a biting satire on bureaucracy.
这篇文章引经据典，非常令人信服。
Zhè piān wénzhāng yǐnjīngjùdiǎn，fēicháng lìngrén xìnfú。
This article quotes from the classics, which makes it more convincing.
这篇文章很有章法。
Zhè piān wénzhāng hěn yǒu zhāngfǎ。
This essay is very well organized.
他最近发表了几篇文章。
Tā zuìjìn fābiǎole jǐpiān wénzhāng。
He\'s recently published several essays.
文章篇幅不要过长。
Wénzhāng piānfú búyào guòcháng.
The essay shouldn\'t be overlong.
文章因篇幅有限，不可能讲得面面俱到。
Wénzhāngyīn piānfú yǒuxiàn，bùkěnéngjiǎng de miànmiànjùdào。
Limitation of space forbids full treatment of the subject.
那些文章千篇一律，没有什么新东西。
Nàxiē wénzhāngqiānpiānyílǜ，méiyǒu shénme xīn dōngxi。
Those articles repeat each other; they contain nothing new.
几篇评论文章的调门儿都一样。
Jǐpiān pínglùnwénzhāngde diàoménr dōuyíyàng。
A number of reviews took the same line.
这篇报道还配发了一篇评论员文章。
Zhèpiān bàodào hái pèifā le yì piān pínglùnyuán wénzhāng。
A commentator\'s article was carried along with the news report.
专家认为这篇优秀的文章仍有可评改之处。
Zhuānjiā rènwéi zhèpiān yōuxiù de wénzhāng réng yǒu kěpínggǎi zhī chù。
Experts point out that the excellent article still needs some corrections.
这篇报告杂乱无章，文理不通。
Zhèpiān bàogào záluànwúzhāng，wénlǐ bùtōng。
This report is just a jumble of words, lacking logic and coherence.
恰当地称引名篇会使你的文章增色不少。
Qià dāngdì chēngyǐn míngpiān huì shǐ nǐ de wénzhāng zēngsè bùshǎo。
Using appropriate quotations from classics will add lustre to your essay.
一篇很有见解的文章
yì piān hěn yǒu jiànjiě de wénzhāng

liánpiānlěidú de fābiǎo wénzhāng

报纸上刊载了几篇有关激光技术的文章。

The newspaper carried a few articles about laser technology.
这是一篇关于明清秘密教门的内容的文章。

The essay is about the religious sects of the Ming and Qing Dynasties.
读了这篇文章以及对这篇文章的分析之后，收获很大。

to turn over a new leaf
翻开新的篇章
So began a new and fateful chapter in Greek history.
Jiù zhèyàng，luómǎ de lìshǐ fānkāile jùyǒu juédìng yìyì de xīn piānzhāng。
就这样，罗马的历史翻开了具有决定意义的新篇章。
The industrial revolution opened a new chapter in British history.
Gōngyègémìng kāipìle Yīngguó lìshǐ de xīnpiānzhāng。
工业革命开辟了英国历史的新篇章。
to organize an essay
构思一篇文章
The article I wrote will be published tomorrow morning on the first page.
我写的这篇文章将发表在明天的头版上。
Before going, I want to finish reading this article, it will take only 5 minutes.
我想在走之前把这篇文章看完，只需要五分钟。
I\'ll give you my full attention later but not now, I have to finish this article.
现在不行，我要先写完这篇文章，之后我会洗耳恭听。
This is just the basic model of the article you are interested in.
这只是你感兴趣的那篇文章的基本框架。
From a lay perspective, the article is difficult to get through.
在外行的眼光来看，这篇文章很难通过。
She has published some articles in important magazines.
她已经在一些重要的杂志上发表了几篇文章。
This article doesn\'t make any sense .
这篇文章根本不知所云。
