Zhèpiān wénzhāng xiě de tài fánsuǒ。
This article is too long and wordy.
我这篇稿子您费神给看看好吗？
Wǒ zhèpiān gǎozi nín fèishén gěi kànkan hǎo ma?
Would you mind going over this article for me?
他写完这篇文章以后，又改了改。
Tā xiěwán zhèpiān wénzhāng yǐhòu，yòu gǎi le gǎi。
After he finished writing the essay he made a few more changes in it.
这篇文章我只改动了一些词句。
Zhèpiān wénzhāng wǒ zhǐ gǎidòng le yìxiē cíjù。
I just polished a few sentences in this essay.
这篇课文是根据《中国文学》上的一个故事改写的。
Zhèpiān kèwén shì gēnjù《Zhōngguó Wénxué》 shàng de yígè gùshì gǎixiě de。
This text is adapted from a story in Chinese Literature.
这篇稿子是谁写的？
Zhèpiān gǎozi shì shuí xiě de?
Who wrote this article?
这个集子共收小说十二篇。
Zhège jízi gòng shōu xiǎoshuō shí\'èr piān。
There are altogether twelve short stories in this collection.
这篇文章写得狗屁不通。
Zhèpiān wénzhāng xiě de gǒupìbùtōng。
This article is mere trash.
我就自己观感所及，写了一篇通讯。
Wǒ jiù zìjǐ guāngǎn suǒ jí，xiě le yì piān tōngxùn。
I wrote a news report based on my own observations.
这篇文章讲国民经济，具有一定的广度和深度。
Zhèpiān wénzhāngjiǎngguómínjīngjì，jùyǒu yídìng de guǎngdù hé shēndù。
This article is a fairly comprehensive and in-depth study of the national economy.
请你把这篇文章的大意归纳一下。
Qǐngnǐ bǎ zhèpiān wénzhāng de dàyì guīnà yíxià。
Will you please sum up the main ideas of this article?
咱们把这篇稿子再过一遍。
Zánmen bǎ zhèpiān gǎozi zài guò yí biàn。
Let\'s go over the draft once again.
这些诗篇构成了一幅农村生活多彩的画图。
Zhèxie shīpiān gòuchéng le yìfú nóngcūn shēnghuó duōcǎi de huàtú。
These poems give a colourful picture of country life.
谎话连篇
huǎnɡhuà liánpiān 
a pack of lies
这篇小说里的人物都是活生生的，有血有肉的。
Zhèpiān xiǎoshuō lǐ de rénwù dōushì huóshēngshēng de，yǒuxuèyǒuròu de。
The characters in the novel are all vividly portrayed.
这是一篇充满火药味的声明。
Zhè shì yì piān chōngmǎn huǒyàowèi de shēngmíng。
This statement has a strong smell of gunpowder.
这个集子里收有二十篇小说。
Zhège jízi lǐ shōu yǒu èrshí piān xiǎoshuō。
This anthology consists of 20 novels.
这篇文章记叙了他的先进事迹。
Zhèpiān wénzhāngjìxù le tā de xiānjìn shìjì。
The article tells about his exemplary deeds.
这篇文章需要加工。
Zhèpiān wénzhāngxūyào jiāgōng。
This article needs polishing.
这篇文章不是他写的，是别人假托他的名义发表的。
Zhèpiān wénzhāngbú shì tā xiě de，shì biérén jiǎtuō tā de míngyì fābiǎo de。
He didn\'t write the essay; somebody else did, and published it under his name.
一篇很有见解的文章
yì piān hěn yǒu jiànjiě de wénzhāng
an article with original ideas
这篇文章语言质朴，毫无矫饰。
Zhèpiān wénzhāngyǔyán zhìpǔ，háo wú jiǎoshì。
This article is written in a simple style, free from any kind of affectation.
揭开两国关系史上的新篇章
jiēkāi liǎngguó guānxìshǐ shàng de xīn piānzhāng
open a new chapter in the annals of relations between the two countries
节省篇幅
jiéshěngpiānfú 
save space
报纸上刊载了几篇有关激光技术的文章。
Bàozhǐ shàngkānzài le jǐpiān yǒuguān jīguāngjìshù de wénzhāng。
The newspaper carried a few articles about laser technology.
这篇稿子太长，得砍去一半。
Zhèpiān gǎozi tài cháng，děi kǎnqù yíbàn。
The manuscript is too long and should be cut down by half.
这篇文章可长可短，你看着办吧。
Zhèpiān wénzhāngkě chángkě duǎn，nǐ kàn zhe bàn ba。
You can make this article either long or short, as you see fit.
这篇文章写得还可以。
Zhèpiān wénzhāng xiě de hǎi kěyǐ。
This article is pretty good.
这篇文章写得空空洞洞，没有什么内容。
Zhèpiān wénzhāngxiě de kōngkōngdòngdòng，méiyǒu shénme nèiróng。
The article is empty and hollow, devoid of substance.
这篇评论语言干瘪，内容空泛。
Zhèpiān pínglùn yǔyán gānbiě，nèiróngkōngfàn。
The review is dull and devoid of content.
空话连篇
kōnghuà liánpiān 
pages and pages of empty verbiage
这篇文章写得太拉杂。
Zhèpiān wénzhāngxiě de tài lāzá。
This article is very badly organized.
连篇累牍地发表文章
liánpiānlěidú de fābiǎo wénzhāng
publish one article after another
长篇连载
chángpiān liánzǎi 
serial (of a novel, etc.)
这篇文章读起来很流畅。
Zhèpiān wénzhāngdú qǐlái hěn liúchàng。
The essay reads very smoothly.
他写这篇回忆录的时候，屡屡搁笔沉思。
Tā xiě zhèpiān huíyìlù de shíhou，lǚlǚ gēbǐ chénsī。
While writing his reminiscences, again and again he laid down his pen and fell into meditation.
为了节省篇幅，恕不一一缕述。
Wèile jiéshěngpiānfú，shù bùyīyī lǚshù。
For economy of space, I shall not go into details.
这篇文章论点鲜明。
Zhèpiān wénzhānglùndiǎn xiānmíng。
The argument set forth in the article is clear-cut.
这篇文章结构严谨，脉络分明。
Zhèpiān wénzhāngjiégòu yánjǐn，màiluò fēnmíng。
This article is closely knit and presents its ideas in a clear, logical way.
漫无边际的长篇大论
mànwúbiānjì de chángpiāndàlùn 
a long-winded speech (or article); a long rambling talk
这篇文章眉目清楚。
Zhèpiān wénzhāngméimù qīngchu。
The article is clear and well-organized.
文章因篇幅有限，不可能讲得面面俱到。
Wénzhāngyīn piānfú yǒuxiàn，bùkěnéngjiǎng de miànmiànjùdào。
Limitation of space forbids full treatment of the subject.
这篇社论进一步明确了当前的中心任务。
Zhèpiān shèlùn jìnyíbùmíngquè le dāngqián de zhōng xīn rènwu。
The editorial further defined the key task for the present period.
你这篇文章哪会儿才能脱稿？
Nǐ zhèpiān wénzhāngnǎhuìr cái néngtuōgǎo?
When can you get the draft ready?
歌篇
ɡēpiān
song sheet
单篇油印材料
dān piān yóuyìn cáiliào
mimeographed sheets
三篇纸
sān piān zhǐ
three sheets (or pieces) of paper
一篇文章
yì piān wénzhānɡ
a piece of writing; an article
这本书缺了一篇。
Zhèběnshū quē le yì piān。
One leaf is missing from this book.
篇幅有限
piānfú yǒuxiàn
have limited space
报纸用大量篇幅报道了这次会议的情况。
Bàozhǐ yòng dàliàng piānfú bàodào le zhècì huìyì de qíngkuàng。
The press gave the conference wide coverage.
篇章结构
piānzhāngjiégòu
structure of an article; composition
这篇文章拼排有错误。
Zhèpiān wénzhāngpīnpái yǒu cuòwù。
There is something wrong in the composition and layout of this article.
这篇论文我已经看过，其中提出的问题值得重视。
Zhèpiān lùnwén wǒ yǐjing kànguò，qí zhōng tíchū de wèntí zhídé zhòngshì。
I have read that paper. The questions it raises deserve serious attention.
他的长篇大论真叫人起腻。
Tā de chángpiāndàlùn zhēn jiào rén qǐ nì。
He bored everyone with his lengthy speech.
本书每篇各有头尾，自成起讫。
Běnshū měipiān gèyǒu tóuwěi，zìchéngqǐqì。
Each chapter is complete in itself, having beginning and end.
一篇气壮山河的宣言
yì piān qìzhuàngshānhé de xuānyán
a magnificent manifesto
这篇文章里，有的地方用词不恰当。
Zhèpiān wénzhānglǐ，yǒu de dìfāngyòngcí bú qiàdāng。
Words were used inappropriately in some parts of this essay.
千篇一律的论调
qiānpiānyílǜ de lùndiào
stereotyped views
那些文章千篇一律，没有什么新东西。
Nàxiē wénzhāngqiānpiānyílǜ，méiyǒu shénme xīn dōngxi。
Those articles repeat each other; they contain nothing new.
你这样解释这篇文章太牵强附会了。
Nǐ zhèyàngjiěshì zhèpiān wénzhāngtài qiānqiángfùhuì le。
Your interpretation of this essay is much too forced.
这篇课文很浅。
Zhèpiān kèwén hěn qiǎn。
This lesson is very easy.
这篇文章写得不错，然而还可以改进。
Zhèpiān wénzhāng xiě de búcuò，rán\'ér hái kěyǐ gǎijìn。
The composition is all right, there is room for improvement, however.
这篇文章需要润色一下。
Zhèpiān wénzhāng xūyào rùnsè yíxià。
This essay needs polishing.
主编很赏识他这篇文章。
Zhǔbiān hěn shǎngshí tā zhèpiān wénzhāng。
The editor in chief thinks highly of this article of his.
茅盾的这篇文章值得赏析。
Máodùn de zhèpiān wénzhāngzhídé shǎngxī。
This article of Mao Dun\'s merits careful study.
这些诗篇抒发了作者的革命豪情。
Zhèxiē shīpiān shūfā le zuòzhě de gémìng háoqíng。
These poems express the revolutionary fervour of the poet.
我们时代的壮丽诗篇
wǒmen shídài de zhuànglì shīpiān
a magnificent epic of our era
英雄的诗篇
yīngxióng de shīpiān
a heroic epic
在民族解放斗争史册上写下灿烂的篇章
zài mínzú jiěfàng dòuzhēng shǐcèshàng xiě xià cànlàn de piānzhāng
add an illustrious page to the annals of national liberation struggles
这篇文章已收录在他的选集里。
Zhèpiān wénzhāng yǐ shōulù zài tā de xuǎnjí lǐ。
This essay is included in his selected works.
这篇文章抒写了他在日内瓦工作时的一些感受。
Zhèpiān wénzhāng shūxiě le tā zài Rìnèiwǎ gōngzuò shí de yìxiē gǎnshòu。
The article describes how he felt while working in Geneva.
这篇文章还得顺一顺。
Zhèpiān wénzhāng hái děi shùnyishùn。
This essay needs polishing.
这一期我们特约钱教授写了一篇书评。
Zhè yì qī wǒmen tèyuē Qián jiàoshòu xiě le yì piān shūpíng。
For this issue we have specially requested Professor Qian to write a book review.
把这篇文章连同我的修改部分誊写出来。
Bǎ zhèpiān wénzhāng liántóng wǒ de xiūgǎi bùfen téngxiě chūlái。
Copy out the article, including all the corrections I have made.
这篇文章，论证严密天衣无缝。
Zhèpiān wénzhāng，lùnzhèngyánmì tiānyīwúfèng。
The article is close-knit and its argument flawless.
这篇文章条理清楚。
Zhèpiān wénzhāngtiáolǐ qīngchu。
The article is well-organized.
我给《英语学习》投了篇稿。
Wǒ gěi《Yīngyǔ Xuéxí》tóu le piān gǎo。
I submitted an article to the English Language Learning.
这篇文章的结尾显得有点秃。
Zhèpiān wénzhāng de jiéwěi xiǎnde yǒudiǎn tū。
This article seems to end rather lamely.
这篇文章论证周密，无懈可击。
Zhèpiān wénzhānglùnzhèngzhōumì，wúxièkějī。
The article is closely reasoned and the arguments are unassailable.
限于篇幅，来电不能一一登载。
Xiànyú piānfú，láidiàn bùnéng yīyī dēngzǎi。
As space is limited, it is impossible to publish all the messages we have received.
你给我们的晚报写篇稿好吗？
Nǐ gěi wǒmen de wǎnbào xiě piān gǎo hǎo ma?
Will you write an article for our evening paper?
两国关系史上的新篇章
liǎngguó guānxìshǐ shàng de xīn piānzhāng
a new page in the history of relations between the two countries
这篇作文行文流畅。
Zhèpiān zuòwén xíngwén liúchàng。
This composition reads smoothly.
雄浑的诗篇
xiónghún de shīpiān
powerful poetry
请你把这篇稿子修饰一下。
Qǐngnǐ bǎ zhèpiān gǎozi xiūshì yíxià。
Please polish this piece of writing.
能否请您为这本书写一篇序？
Néngfǒu qǐngnín wèi zhèběnshū xiě yì piān xù?
Would you write a preface to this book?
一篇充满悬念的侦探小说
yì piān chōngmǎn xuánniàn de zhēntàn xiǎoshuō
a suspenseful detective story
这篇报道有血有肉。
Zhèpiān bàodào yǒuxuèyǒuròu。
This news report is full of vivid details.
这篇报告杂乱无章，文理不通。
Zhèpiān bàogào záluànwúzhāng，wénlǐ bùtōng。
This report is just a jumble of words, lacking logic and coherence.
这篇课文不合适，一则太长，二则太难。
Zhèpiān kèwén bùhéshì，yì zé tài cháng，èr zé tài nán。
This text is unsuitable. For one thing it\'s too long, for another it\'s too difficult.
战斗的诗篇
zhàndòu de shīpiān 
militant poem
这篇通讯写得真切感人。
Zhèpiān tōngxùn xiě de zhēnqiè gǎnrén。
The report is vividly written and very moving.
这篇文章可以做教材。
Zhèpiān wénzhāngkěyǐ zuò jiàocái。
This article may be used as teaching material.
篇章
piānzhāng
sections and chapters; writings
这篇文章写得半文半白的。
Zhèpiān wénzhāng xiě de bànwén bànbái de。
This paper is written in a confusing linguistic style.
他认为，这篇文章最终得出的结论是背谬的。
Tā rènwéi，zhèpiān wénzhāng zuì zhōng déchū de jiélùn shì bèimiù de。
He believes that the conclusion of this article is ridiculous.
这篇论文的本论部分有很多问题。
Zhèpiān lùnwén de běnlùn bùfēn yǒu hěnduō wèntí。
There are many problems in the body of this paper.
相信大家已经领会了这篇文章的本旨。
Xiāngxìn dàjiā yǐjing lǐnghuì le zhèpiān wénzhāng de běnzhǐ。
I believe that everyone has grasped the main idea of this article.
这篇文章笔意从容，令人印象深刻。
Zhèpiān wénzhāng bǐyì cóngróng，lìngrén yìn xiàng shēnkè。
This article is impressive, it is written with both ease, and grace.
他的这篇文章分析辨难，却又不露锋芒。
Tā de zhèpiān wénzhāng fēnxī biànnán，què yòu búlòu fēngmáng。
He argues by using challenging questions in a subtle way.
从这篇杂文中，我们可以看到作者辨识事物的水平和能力。
Cóng zhèpiān záwén zhōng，wǒmen kěyǐ kàndào zuòzhě biànshí shìwù de shuǐpíng hé nénglì。
We can see the outstanding analytical abilities of the author in this essay.
金庸曾写过一篇文章叫《丙丁之岁》。
Jīn Yōng céng xiěguò yì piān wénzhāng jiào《Bǐngdīngzhīsuì》。
Jingyong, the famous novelist once wrote an article called “the age of fire”.
这篇文章的内容不够充实，需要进一步补写。
Zhèpiān wénzhāng de nèiróng búgòu chōngshí，xūyào jìnyíbùbǔxiě。
This article is not informative enough, and should be expanded to include more details.
他参合了相关书籍才写出了这篇论文。
Tā cānhé le xiāngguān shūjí cái xiěchū le zhèpiān lùnwén。
He wrote this paper after consulting, and summing up relevant materials.
今天下午我草就了一篇《年度总结报告》。
Jīntiān xiàwǔ wǒ cǎojiù le yì piān《niándù zǒngjié bàogào》。
I drafted an Annual Summary Report this afternoon.
这部作品真是长篇巨制！
Zhèbù zuòpǐn zhēnshì chángpiān jùzhì！
This work of art is really a long piece!
他完成了自己的第一部长篇。
Tā wánchéng le zìjǐ de dìyī bùchángpiān。
He finished his first full-length novel.
他这篇短评清新而不落常套。
Tā zhèpiān duǎnpíng qīngxīn ér búluò chángtào。
This notice of his is fresh, yet still conventional.
他的这篇文章剿说而无当，受到了老师的批评。
Tā de zhèpiān wénzhāng jiǎoshuō ér wúdāng，shòudào le lǎoshī de pīpíng。
He was criticized by the teacher, because in his article he took ideas from others, and presented them as his own.
午休时她们就坐在田边扯闲篇了。
Wǔxiū shí tāmen jiù zuòzài tiánbiān chěxiánpiān le。
They sat by the field, and chatted during the noon break.
这篇文章都是陈言俗套，毫无新意。
Zhèpiān wénzhāng dōushì chényán sútào，háowú xīnyì。
Without the least innovation, the article is full of platitudes.
恰当地称引名篇会使你的文章增色不少。
Qià dāngdì chēngyǐn míngpiān huì shǐ nǐ de wénzhāng zēngsè bùshǎo。
Using appropriate quotations from classics will add lustre to your essay.
这篇《老舍民族心理刍说》深入浅出，对我们很有帮助。
Zhè piān《Lǎoshè mínzúxīnlǐ chúshuō》shēnrù qiǎnchū，duì wǒmen hěnyǒu bāngzhù。
The article &quot;A Skin-deep Discussion of Lao She\'s National Mentality&quot; explains profound things in simple ways, which is very helpful to us.
《武成》篇：“敦信明义，崇德报功，垂拱而天下治。”
《Wǔchéng》piān：“dūnxìn míngyì，chóngdé bàogōng，chuígǒng ér tiānxiàzhì。”
这个词在这篇文章中的词频很高。
Zhège cí zài zhèpiān wénzhāng zhōng de cípín hěngāo。
This word appears frequently in the article.
这篇散文写得淡而无味，吸引不了读者。
Zhèpiān sǎnwén xiě de dàn ér wúwèi，xīyǐn bùliǎo dúzhě。
This prose is uninteresting, and can not attract readers.
这篇报道的导语写得言简意赅。
Zhèpiān bàodào de dǎoyǔ xiě de yánjiǎn yìgāi。
The prologue to the report is brief and to the point.
你这篇作文离题万里，不倒扣你几分就不错了。
Nǐ zhèpiān zuòwén lí tí wànlǐ，bú dàokòu nǐ jǐ fēn jiù búcuò le。
Since your composition is far from the subject, you should consider yourself lucky that the teacher has not deducted marks.
这篇文章使用了倒叙手法。
Zhèpiān wénzhāng shǐyòng le dàoxù shǒufǎ。
This article adopts the flashback technique.
你的这篇文章还需要再雕饰一下。
Nǐ de zhèpiān wénzhāng hái xūyào zài diāoshì yíxià。
You should make some more improvements in this article.
老师要求每个看过这本书的同学都要写一篇读后感。
Lǎoshī yāoqiú měigè kàn guò zhèběnshū de tóngxué dōuyào xiě yí piān dúhòugǎn。
The teacher has asked every student who has read the book to write an article about it.
这篇作文有不少讹舛，但立意还不错。
Zhèpiān zuòwén yǒu bùshǎo échuǎn，dàn lìyì hái búcuò。
Though the composition has quite a few mistakes in wording, it shows a great approach.
要把这些事情翻篇儿过去，新的生活就要开始了。
Yào bǎ zhèxiē shìqing fānpiānr guòqu，xīn de shēnghuó jiùyào kāishǐ le。
We must leave these things behind and turn over a new leaf in our lives.
这篇散文词藻繁丽，意境优美。
Zhèpiān sǎnwén cízǎo fánlì，yìjìng yōuměi。
This essay is rich and flowery in diction and elegant in its artistic mood.
这篇文章不仅语言繁冗，而且也没什么思想。
Zhèpiān wénzhāng bùjǐn yǔyán fánrǒng，érqiě yě méi shénme sīxiǎng。
This article is flowery in language but empty in content.
这篇文章语言繁芜，最好能再精炼一下。
Zhèpiān wénzhāng yǔyán fánwú，zuì hǎo néng zài jīngliàn yíxià。
This article is too wordy, it needs revision.
他奋笔疾书，一夜之间完成了这篇论文。
Tā fènbǐjíshū，yí yè zhījiān wánchéng le zhèpiān lùnwén。
He took up a pen, wrote swiftly and finished his paper overnight.
你千万不要以为这篇文章单单是写风月之事的，其实它有着严肃的主题。
Nǐ qiānwàn búyào yǐwéi zhèpiān wénzhāng dāndān shì xiě fēngyuè zhī shì de，qíshí tā yǒu zhe yánsù de zhǔtí。
This article is by no means just a romance, it actually has an elevated theme.
这篇散文是我刚写的，请各位斧削。
Zhèpiān sǎnwén shì wǒ gāng xiě de，qǐng gè wèi fǔxiāo。
The essay was written by me recently; please make corrections.
请把你这篇论文的副题控制在20字以内。
Qǐng bǎ nǐ zhèpiān lùnwén de fùtí kòngzhì zài èrshízì yǐnèi。
Please limit the subtitle of your dissertation to twenty words.
这是几首流行歌曲的歌篇儿。
Zhè shì jǐ shǒu liúxíng gēqǔ de gēpiānr。
These are song sheets of these popular songs.
这篇报道请编辑更定后再发稿。
Zhèpiān bàodào qǐng biānjí gēngdìng hòu zài fāgǎo。
The report shall be published after amendments by the editor.
这篇报道由新华社供稿。
Zhèpiān bàodào yóu xīnhuáshè gōnggǎo。
This report is provided by the Xinhua news agency.
这篇文章出自著名政治观察家之手。
Zhèpiān wénzhāng chūzì zhùmíng zhèngzhì guānchájiā zhī shǒu。
This article was written by a political observer.
我刚写了一篇戏剧观后感寄给了杂志社。
Wǒ gāng xiě le yì piān xìjù guānhòugǎn jìgěi le zázhìshè。
I just finished an article about my impressions of the play and have mailed it to the periodical office.
《资治通鉴》是中国史学上的一部鸿篇巨著。
《Zīzhìtōngjiàn》 shì Zhōngguó shǐxuéshàng de yíbù hóngpiānjùzhù。
&quot;A General Reflection for Political Administration&quot; is a magnum opus in Chinese historiography.
这篇文章你就别看了，我瞎划拉的。
Zhèpiān wénzhāng nǐ jiù biékàn le，wǒ xiā huála de。
You needn\'t read this essay. I wrote it withoiut planning.
这篇电影简评是一个名作家写的。
Zhèpiān diànyǐng jiǎnpíng shì yígè míngzuòjiā xiě de。
The short film review was written by a famous writer.
这篇文章太过冗长，要简缩一下。
Zhèpiān wénzhāng tài guò rǒngcháng，yào jiǎnsuō yíxià。
The essay is too wordy, you\'d better condense it.
简言之，这篇文章的结尾一定要写的感人。
Jiǎnyánzhī，zhèpiān wénzhāng de jiéwěi yídìng yào xiě de gǎnrén。
In short, the ending of this essay should be as impressive as possible.
这篇文章文笔显得有些蹇涩，可见作者的功力尚浅。
Zhèpiān wénzhāng wénbǐ xiǎnde yǒuxiē jiǎnsè，kějiàn zuòzhě de gōnglì shàngqiǎn。
The essay doesn\'t reads smoothly, which reveals that the author is far from being skilled in writing.
这是一篇关于明清秘密教门的内容的文章。
Zhè shì yì piān guānyú míngqīng mìmì jiàomén de nèiróng de wénzhāng。
The essay is about the religious sects of the Ming and Qing Dynasties.
这篇文章介绍了梵蒂冈教廷的现状。
Zhèpiān wénzhāng jièshào le fàndìgāng jiàotíng de xiànzhuàng。
This article introduces the current situation of the papal government in the Vatican.
这篇文章在前后接榫的地方需要处理。
Zhèpiān wénzhāng zài qiánhòu jiēsǔn de dìfāng xūyào chǔlǐ。
This essay is not coherent enough, it needs to be improved in this respect.
这部热播剧要拍姐妹篇了。
Zhèbù rèbōjù yào pāi jiěmèipiān le。
This hit drama will have a sequel soon.

Zhèpiān lùnwén jièshuō le“yìjìng”zhège gàiniàn。
This article gives a definition to &quot;artistic conception&quot;.
这篇文章多次使用了借代的手法。
Zhèpiān wénzhāng duōcì shǐyòng le jièdài de shǒufǎ。
This article often employs metaphors.

这篇文章的筋节处处理得很好。
Zhèpiān wénzhāng de jīnjiéchù chǔlǐ de hěnhǎo。
The vital links in this article are very well handled.
这篇散文筋脉清晰，容易分析。
Zhèpiān sǎnwén jīnmài qīngxī，róngyì fēnxī。
This article is very clear and easy to analyze.
你的这篇报道还需要写得精审些。
Nǐ de zhèpiān bàodào hái xūyào xiě de jīngshěnxiē。
You need to be more accurate and comprehensive in your report.
这篇论文提出不少精微之论。
Zhèpiān lùnwén tíchū bùshǎo jīngwēi zhī lùn。
This paper proposes many profound arguments.
我把这篇散文中精要的句子都抄了下来。
Wǒ bǎ zhèpiān sǎnwén zhōng jīngyào de jùzi dōu chāo le xiàlái。
I wrote down all the good sayings in this essay.
这篇文章就教于广大读者。
Zhèpiān wénzhāng jiù jiàoyú guǎngdà dúzhě。
This article consults all its readers.
这篇报道写得有点空泛，最好加点具体化的事例。
Zhèpiān bàodào xiě de yǒu diǎn kōngfàn，zuì hǎo jiā diǎn jùtǐhuà de shìlì。
This report is a little too vague, some specific examples shall be added.
大年初一，他写了篇日记，算是新年的开笔吧。
Dànián chūyī，tā xiě le piān rìjì，suànshì xīnnián de kāibǐ ba。

他准备了很长时间的这部长篇小说，终于开笔了。
Tā zhǔnbèi le hěncháng shíjiān de zhèbù chángpiān xiǎoshuō，zhōng yú kāibǐ le。
He has been preparing for this long novel and has finally started to write it.
她唱的开篇既继承了传统，又有创新。

Her introductory song not only inherits tradition but also has its own innovations.
这本小说，开篇就很吸引人。
Zhèběn xiǎoshuō，kāipiān jiù hěnxīyǐn rén。
This fiction is very absorbing straight from its opening sections.
他的这篇议论文并没有把握住主题的肯綮。
Tā de zhèpiān yìlùnwén bìng méiyǒu bǎwò zhù zhǔtí de kěnqìng。
His argument does not get to the heart of the topic.
这篇论文过于空疏了，需要再补充许多东西进去！
Zhèpiān lùnwén guòyú kōngshū le，xūyào zài bǔchōng xǔduō dōngxi jìnqù！
Lacking in substance, this paper needs a lot of things added to it.

Dú zhèpiān lánzhāng shì yìzhǒng yuèdú de xiǎngshòu！
It is a pleasure to read the beautiful writing.
《白杨礼赞》是茅盾先生的散文名篇。

Praise of White Poplar is a famous essay of Mao Dun.

Wǒmen liánjù chéngpiān de shī dédào le dàjiā de rènkě。

这篇课文还是请你来领诵吧。
Zhèpiān kèwén háishi qǐng nǐ lái lǐngsòng ba。

我的每篇论文都要留底。
Wǒ de měi piān lùnwén dōuyào liúdǐ。
I keep copies of all my papers as records.
他把这几天的行程，记了一篇流水帐。
Tā bǎ zhè jǐtiān de xíngchéng，jì le yì piān liúshuǐzhàng。

这篇文章鲁鱼亥豕，错误百出。

相比较而言，还是这篇文章略胜一筹。

By comparison, this article is a notch above.

Tímù yāoqiú kǎoshēng xiě yì piān lùnshuōwén。

这篇文章的论旨很清晰，没有什么复杂难懂的地方。

The article has a clear argumentation, and contains nothing complicated.

他面壁三年，终于完成了这部长篇小说。
Tā miànbì sān nián，zhōng yú wánchéng le zhèbù chángpiān xiǎoshuō。
He studied with undivided attention for three years, and finally finished this long novel.
这篇文章文辞妙丽，一定是出自名家之手。
Zhèpiān wénzhāng wéncí miàolì，yídìng shì chūzì míngjiā zhī shǒu。
This article is beautiful and smart in diction, so it must be written by a famous master.
小明喜欢搜集、摘抄名篇佳句。
Xiǎo Míng xǐhuan sōují、zhāichāo míngpiān jiājù。

Tā de zhèpiān wénzhāng xiě de shífēn níngliàn jiǎnjié。

这篇文章浓墨重彩地描写了唐长安城的繁华。

她不太熟悉这首歌，所以演唱中她需要时常看看歌篇子。

专家认为这篇优秀的文章仍有可评改之处。

你这篇文章根本没破题，不符合要求。

Tā zhèpiān wénzhāng dàliàng shǐyòng le qūbǐ shǒufǎ。

Wǒ liúlǎn le quánpiān hòu，dàgài míngbai le zuòzhě yào biǎodá de yìsi。
I skimmed through the full article, and got a general understanding of what the author wants to express.
你这篇论文的用词十分确当。

他的这篇报告里都是冗词赘句，听者越来越不耐烦。

His report is full of redundant words and repetitive expressions, the audience are getting impatient.
删节号用在这篇文章的末尾，恰到好处。
Shānjiéhào yòng zài zhèpiān wénzhāng de mòwěi，qiàdàohǎochu。

您的这篇大作，我一定要好好赏阅、学习。
Nín de zhèpiān dàzuò，wǒ yīdìng yào hǎohǎo shǎngyuè，xuéxí。
I will surely carefully read and learn your article.
这本书怎么能够失收她最重要的一篇小说呢？

你这篇作文写得太不顺溜了，必须修改！
Nǐ zhèpiān zuòwén xiě de tài bú shùnliū le，bìxū xiūgǎi！

Zhèpiān sòngzàn shì zuòzhě de zhēnqíng liúlù，suǒyǐ yánzhēn yìqiè，dú lái lìngrén gǎndòng。

他这篇随想写得很有深度。
Tā zhèpiān suíxiǎng xiě de hěnyǒu shēndù。

如果这篇文章能够再条畅一些就更好了。

If the article becomes a bit more coherent, it will be a much better article.
在这篇文章中这个“燕”字通假“宴”字。
Zài zhèpiān wénzhāng zhōng zhège“yàn”zì tōngjiǎ“yàn”zì。
In this article, the two characters are Tongjiazi (a Chinese character used to express another character because of same or similar pronunciation in ancient China).

This article is the author\'s work that best displays his writing style.
请你把这篇文章上的脱误之处加以改正。
Qǐng nǐ bǎ zhèpiān wénzhāng shàng de tuōwù zhī chù jiāyǐ gǎizhèng。

Suīrán zhè shì piān wěizuò，dàn háishi yǒu kědúxìng de。

与开头比起来，这篇文章的尾部写得更加精彩。
Yǔ kāitóu bǐqǐlái，zhèpiān wénzhāng de wěibùxiě de gèngjiā jīngcǎi。
The ending of this article outshines the beginning.
出版社请知名画家为这篇文章配画尾花。
Chūbǎnshè qǐng zhīmíng huàjiā wèi zhèpiān wénzhāng pèihuà wěihuā。

这篇散文的文词非常华美，我很喜欢。
Zhèpiān sǎnwén de wéncí fēicháng huáměi，wǒ hěn xǐhuan。
I like this article vey much because of its rich diction.

写景细致是这篇散文的一个突出特点。
Xiějǐng xìzhì shì zhèpiān sǎnwén de yígè tūchū tèdiǎn。

昨天我扬扬洒洒写了一篇文章，结果没存盘。
Zuótiān wǒ yángyángsǎsǎ xiě le yì piān wénzhāng，jiéguǒ méi cúnpán。

这篇文章记录了我在学习过程中的一得之见。
Zhèpiān wénzhāng jìlù le wǒ zài xuéxí guòchéng zhōng de yìdé zhī jiàn。
The article records my opinions during the study process.
婉约派的词通篇透出一股阴柔之美。
Wǎnyuēpài de cí tōngpiān tòuchū yìgǔ yīnróu zhī měi。
The ci composed by the graceful and restrained group members has the beauty of blandness in all the text.
这篇文章纯属杂凑而成，文理不通。
Zhèpiān wénzhāng chúnshǔ zácòu érchéng，wénlǐ bùtōng。
This article has been written entirely from different pieces so that it doesn\'t make any sense.
请把这篇文章直接送到责任编辑那里。
Qǐng bǎ zhèpiān wénzhāng zhíjiē sòngdào zérèn biānjí nàlǐ。
Please send this article to the executive editor.
我们把这两篇文章安排在增编的版面里。
Wǒmen bǎ zhè liǎng piān wénzhāng ānpái zài zēngbiān de bǎnmiàn lǐ。
We put these two articles in the added layout.
为了完成这篇论文他整夜没有合眼。
Wèile wánchéng zhèpiān lùnwén tā zhěngyè méiyǒu héyǎn。
In order to finish this paper, he stayed up all night.
这篇文章写的比较含蓄，其中的感情只可意会，不可言传。
Zhèpiān wénzhāng xiě de bǐjiào hánxù，qí zhōng de gǎnqíng zhǐkě yìhuì，bùkě yánchuán。
This article is very implicit. The feelings expressed by it can be felt, but not explained in words.
作为一篇合格的论文，主题词是必不可少的。

Sìhū yǒu tàiduō piānfú shì yǒuguān zìdòng jiàshǐyí de。
似乎有太多篇幅是有关自动驾驶仪的。
In this essay, the author\'s personal feelings creep in.
Zuòzhě de gǎnqíng róngrù dàole zhè piān sǎnwén zhōng。
作者的感情融入到了这篇散文中。
Thoreau wrote a famous essay justifying civil disobedience.
Suōluó xiěle yì piān lùnzhèng bù hézuò zhǔyì zhèngquèxìng de zhùmíng wénzhāng。
梭罗写了一篇论证不合作主义正确性的著名文章。
The dissertation was entitled, modestly, \'remarks about a play by Shakespeare\'.
Zhè piān lùnwén de tímù bèi qiānxū de mìngmíng wéi 《 píng Shāshìbǐyà de yí gè xìjù 》。
这篇论文的题目被谦虚地命名为《评莎士比亚的一个戏剧》。
He read the article in its entirety.
Tā tōngdúle zhè piān wénzhāng。
他通读了这篇文章。
This paper was written jointly.
Zhè piān lùnwén shì yóu jǐ gè zuòzhě yìqǐ xiěchéng de。
这篇论文是由几个作者一起写成的。
Her tirade provoked a counterblast from her husband.
Tā de chángpiān dàlùn jīqǐle tā zhàngfu de qiángliè fǎnduì。
她的长篇大论激起了她丈夫的强烈反对。
The translation is...light-handed...and generally unobtrusive.
Zhè piān fānyì de hěn qiǎomiào，zǒngtǐshàng bù xiǎnde tángtū。
这篇翻译得很巧妙，总体上不显得唐突。
This newspaper story discredits the politicians.
Zhè piān bàodào sǔnhàile zhèngzhìjiāmen de shēngyù。
这篇报道损害了政治家们的声誉。
This essay argues so persuasively.
Zhè piān wénzhāng hěn yǒu shuōfúlì。
这篇文章很有说服力。
The journal article unmasked the corrupt politician.
Zhè piān zázhì wénzhāng jiēlùle zhè wèi fǔbài de zhèngzhìjiā。
这篇杂志文章揭露了这位腐败的政治家。
There is nothing unthematic in this composition.
Zhè piān wénzhāng zhōng méiyǒu pǎotí de nèiróng。
这篇文章中没有跑题的内容。
The play is an adaptation of a short novel.
Zhè bù xì cóng yí bù duǎnpiānxiǎoshuō gǎibiān érlái de。
这部戏从一部短篇小说改编而来的。
Someone should vet this report before it goes out.
Zhè piān bàogào chūlóng zhīqián yīngdāng yǒu rén shěnchá tā。
这篇报告出笼之前应当有人审查它。
The paper was well thought out.
Zhè piān lùnwén shì jīngguò shēnsīshúlǜ de。
这篇论文是经过深思熟虑的。
The scholar annotated the early edition of a famous novel.
Zhège xuézhě gěi yì piān zhùmíng xiǎoshuō de zǎoqī bǎnběn zuòle zhùshì。
这个学者给一篇著名小说的早期版本做了注释。
They never reprinted the famous treatise.
Tāmen cóng méiyǒu zàibǎn guò zhè piān zhùmíng de lùnwén。
他们从没有再版过这篇著名的论文。
The speech predicated the fitness of the candidate to be president.
Zhè piān yǎnjiǎng biǎomíng，zhè míng hòuxuǎnrén shìhé zuò zǒngtǒng。
这篇演讲表明，这名候选人适合做总统。
The paper discredited the politician with its nasty commentary.
Zhè piān wénzhāng yòng xiàliú de yǔyán lái bàihuài zhè wèi zhèngzhìjiā de shēngyù。
这篇文章用下流的语言来败坏这位政治家的声誉。
He segued into another discourse.
Tā jiēzhe tǎolùn lìng yī piān wénzhāng。
他接着讨论另一篇文章。
He hated the sameness of the food the college served.
Tā tǎoyàn xuéxiào qiānpiānyílǜ de huǒshí。
他讨厌学校千篇一律的伙食。
恰当地称引名篇会使你的文章增色不少。
Qià dāngdì chēngyǐn míngpiān huì shǐ nǐ de wénzhāng zēngsè bùshǎo。
Using appropriate quotations from classics will add lustre to your essay.
《白杨礼赞》是茅盾先生的散文名篇。
《Báiyánglǐzàn》 shì Máodùn xiānshēng de sǎnwén míngpiān。
Praise of White Poplar is a famous essay of Mao Dun.
小明喜欢搜集、摘抄名篇佳句。
Xiǎo Míng xǐhuan sōují、zhāichāo míngpiān jiājù。
Xiaoming is fond of collecting, and extracting famous literary articles and excellent sentences.
出版社请知名画家为这篇文章配画尾花。
Chūbǎnshè qǐng zhīmíng huàjiā wèi zhèpiān wénzhāng pèihuà wěihuā。
The publisher has invited a famous painter to paint an ornamental flower for this article.
这篇文章出自著名政治观察家之手。
Zhèpiān wénzhāng chūzì zhùmíng zhèngzhì guānchájiā zhī shǒu。
This article was written by a political observer.
这篇电影简评是一个名作家写的。
Zhèpiān diànyǐng jiǎnpíng shì yígè míngzuòjiā xiě de。
The short film review was written by a famous writer.
这篇文章文辞妙丽，一定是出自名家之手。
Zhèpiān wénzhāng wéncí miàolì，yídìng shì chūzì míngjiā zhī shǒu。
This article is beautiful and smart in diction, so it must be written by a famous master.
这篇文章不是他写的，是别人假托他的名义发表的。
Zhèpiān wénzhāngbú shì tā xiě de，shì biérén jiǎtuō tā de míngyì fābiǎo de。
He didn\'t write the essay; somebody else did, and published it under his name.
引用书证要注出书名、篇名，以便查核。
名篇。
称引名篇。
名篇佳作。
《历代名篇赏析集成》。
这篇文章东拼西凑，是名副其实的大杂烩

这篇文章用了一大堆新名词儿，令人费解

The teacher confronted these three essays and found they were similar.
老师比较了这三篇文章，觉得它们很相似。
空话连篇
kōnghuà liánpiān 
pages and pages of empty verbiage
她唱的开篇既继承了传统，又有创新。
Tā chàng de kāipiān jì jìchéng le chuántǒng，yòu yǒu chuàngxīn。
Her introductory song not only inherits tradition but also has its own innovations.
这本小说，开篇就很吸引人。
Zhèběn xiǎoshuō，kāipiān jiù hěnxīyǐn rén。
This fiction is very absorbing straight from its opening sections.
与开头比起来，这篇文章的尾部写得更加精彩。
Yǔ kāitóu bǐqǐlái，zhèpiān wénzhāng de wěibùxiě de gèngjiā jīngcǎi。
The ending of this article outshines the beginning.
他准备了很长时间的这部长篇小说，终于开笔了。
Tā zhǔnbèi le hěncháng shíjiān de zhèbù chángpiān xiǎoshuō，zhōng yú kāibǐ le。
He has been preparing for this long novel and has finally started to write it.
揭开两国关系史上的新篇章
jiēkāi liǎngguó guānxìshǐ shàng de xīn piānzhāng
open a new chapter in the annals of relations between the two countries
大年初一，他写了篇日记，算是新年的开笔吧。
Dànián chūyī，tā xiě le piān rìjì，suànshì xīnnián de kāibǐ ba。
On the first day of the lunar year, he wrote in his dairy as his first writing of the new year.
要把这些事情翻篇儿过去，新的生活就要开始了。
Yào bǎ zhèxiē shìqing fānpiānr guòqu，xīn de shēnghuó jiùyào kāishǐ le。
We must leave these things behind and turn over a new leaf in our lives.
这篇文章最后一个自然段与开头相呼应。
Zhèpiān wénzhāng zuìhòu yígè zìránduàn yǔ kāitóu xiāng hūyìng。
The last paragraph of this works in concert with the opening paragraph.
小说的开篇交代了故事的时代背景。
开篇点题
谱写改革开放新篇章。
这篇讲话阐明了改革和开放的关系
This chapter commences with an analysis of individual buying behavior.
Běn zhāngjié yǐ duì gèrén gòumǎi xíngwéi de fēnxī kāipiān。
本章节以对个人购买行为的分析开篇。
The opening established the basic theme.

to turn over a new leaf
翻开新的篇章
He launched into a long diatribe.
Tā kāishǐ chángpiāndàlùn de jìnxíng pēngjī。

He began to write short stories of which over a hundred were published.

他开始写短篇小说，并且有上百部已经出版了。
This article begins with a summary of the studies on global warming.
这篇文章的开头总结了对全球变暖的研究。
Each section is prefaced by a short essay.
Měi yíbùfēn dōu yǐ yì piān xiǎosǎnwén kāishǐ。
每一部分都以一篇小散文开始。
He opened the meeting with a long speech.
Tā zài huìyì kāimùshì shàng fābiǎole chángpiān jiǎnghuà。
他在会议开幕式上发表了长篇讲话。
The industrial revolution opened a new chapter in British history.
Gōngyègémìng kāipìle Yīngguó lìshǐ de xīnpiānzhāng。
工业革命开辟了英国历史的新篇章。
So began a new and fateful chapter in Greek history.
Jiù zhèyàng，luómǎ de lìshǐ fānkāile jùyǒu juédìng yìyì de xīn piānzhāng。
就这样，罗马的历史翻开了具有决定意义的新篇章。
这篇短篇小说反映了当前农村改革的一个侧面。
Zhèpiān duǎnpiān xiǎoshuō fǎnyìng le dāngqián nóngcūn gǎigé de yígè cèmiàn。
This short story presents one aspect of the present agricultural reform.
他写短篇小说颇为得手
小说篇幅虽短，但明线与暗线交错，内容十分丰富。
Charles Dickens wrote brilliant novels.
查理斯·狄更斯写了很多优秀的短篇小说。
I am trying to publish a collection of short stories.
Wǒ zhèngzài chángshì chūbǎn yì běn duǎnpiān xiǎoshuōjí。
我正在尝试出版一本短篇小说集。
He began to write short stories of which over a hundred were published.
Tā kāishǐ xiě duǎnpiānxiǎoshuō，bìngqiě yǒu shàngbǎibù yǐjīng chūbǎn le。
他开始写短篇小说，并且有上百部已经出版了。
He took some time to bathe in short stories.
Tā huāle xiē shíjiān chénjìn zài duǎnpiānxiǎoshuō lǐ。
他花了些时间沉浸在短篇小说里。
This short story allows of several different interpretations.
Guānyú zhè bù duǎnpiān xiǎoshuō，kěyǐ yǒu duō zhǒng quánshì。
关于这部短篇小说，可以有多种诠释。
The play is an adaptation of a short novel.
Zhè bù xì cóng yí bù duǎnpiānxiǎoshuō gǎibiān érlái de。
这部戏从一部短篇小说改编而来的。

Tā zhǔnbèi le hěncháng shíjiān de zhèbù chángpiān xiǎoshuō，zhōng yú kāibǐ le。
He has been preparing for this long novel and has finally started to write it.
他面壁三年，终于完成了这部长篇小说。
Tā miànbì sān nián，zhōng yú wánchéng le zhèbù chángpiān xiǎoshuō。
He studied with undivided attention for three years, and finally finished this long novel.
长篇小说连播。

不着边际的长篇大论
bùzhuóbiānjì de chángpiāndàlùn 
a long rambling talk
注意简明扼要，不要长篇大论。
Zhùyì jiǎnmíng èyào，búyào chángpiāndàlùn。
Be sure to make it clear and concise and avoid long-windedness.
长篇连载
chángpiān liánzǎi 
serial (of a novel, etc.)
漫无边际的长篇大论
mànwúbiānjì de chángpiāndàlùn 
a long-winded speech (or article); a long rambling talk
他的长篇大论真叫人起腻。
Tā de chángpiāndàlùn zhēn jiào rén qǐ nì。
He bored everyone with his lengthy speech.
这部作品真是长篇巨制！
Zhèbù zuòpǐn zhēnshì chángpiān jùzhì！
This work of art is really a long piece!
他完成了自己的第一部长篇。
Tā wánchéng le zìjǐ de dìyī bùchángpiān。
He finished his first full-length novel.
我想在进行长篇创作之前先写几个短篇。
Wǒ xiǎng zài jìnxíng chángpiān chuàngzuò zhīqián xiān xiě jǐgè duǎnpiān。
I\'m considering writing a few short novels before proceeding to long ones.
他准备了很长时间的这部长篇小说，终于开笔了。
Tā zhǔnbèi le hěncháng shíjiān de zhèbù chángpiān xiǎoshuō，zhōng yú kāibǐ le。
He has been preparing for this long novel and has finally started to write it.
他面壁三年，终于完成了这部长篇小说。

He studied with undivided attention for three years, and finally finished this long novel.
这篇文章长而空。
Zhèpiān wénzhāng cháng ér kōng。
This article is long-winded and lacks substance.
这篇稿子太长，得砍去一半。
Zhèpiān gǎozi tài cháng，děi kǎnqù yíbàn。
The manuscript is too long and should be cut down by half.
这篇文章可长可短，你看着办吧。
Zhèpiān wénzhāngkě chángkě duǎn，nǐ kàn zhe bàn ba。
You can make this article either long or short, as you see fit.
这篇文章篇幅不太长。
Zhèpiān wénzhāngpiānfú bú tài cháng。
This article is not very long.
文章篇幅不要过长。
Wénzhāng piānfú búyào guòcháng.
The essay shouldn\'t be overlong.
这篇文章太过冗长，要简缩一下。
Zhèpiān wénzhāng tài guò rǒngcháng，yào jiǎnsuō yíxià。
The essay is too wordy, you\'d better condense it.
这篇课文不合适，一则太长，二则太难。
Zhèpiān kèwén bùhéshì，yì zé tài cháng，èr zé tài nán。
This text is unsuitable. For one thing it\'s too long, for another it\'s too difficult.
这篇文章浓墨重彩地描写了唐长安城的繁华。
Zhèpiān wénzhāng nóngmò zhòngcǎi de miáoxiě le Táng Chángānchéng de fánhuá。
The article describes Chang\'an\'s prosperity in the Tang dynasty in a rich and colorful manner.

They are making a song and dance about freedom.
他们长篇大论地说了一堆关于自由的废话。

当地报纸对此次会议作了长篇报道。
Eric performed a monologue which had people in fits of laughter.

艾瑞克表演一段长篇独白，其间人们适时地发出笑声。
The Boss\'s monologue is interrupted by the sound of a fire alarm.

老板的长篇大论被一阵火警声打断。
He opened the meeting with a long speech.
Tā zài huìyì kāimùshì shàng fābiǎole chángpiān jiǎnghuà。

He launched into a long diatribe.
Tā kāishǐ chángpiāndàlùn de jìnxíng pēngjī。
他开始长篇大论地进行抨击。
Her tirade provoked a counterblast from her husband.
Tā de chángpiān dàlùn jīqǐle tā zhàngfu de qiángliè fǎnduì。
她的长篇大论激起了她丈夫的强烈反对。
The paper was rejected on account of its length.
Zhè piān lùnwén yīn qí chángdù wèntí ér méiyǒu bèi tōngguò。
这篇论文因其长度问题而没有被通过。
The content of an article will tend to be determined by its length.
Yì piān wénzhāng de nèiróng shì yóu tā de chángdù suǒ juédìng de。
一篇文章的内容是由它的长度所决定的。
The theme of this paper is &quot;The Growing Use of Instant Messaging in the Workplace&quot;.
这篇论文的主题是：“工作场所使用即时聊天工具的不断增长”。
做游戏
zuò yóuxì 
play games
下课后，同学喜欢扎堆做游戏。
Xiàkè hòu，tóngxué xǐhuan zhāduī zuò yóuxì。
After class, students like to get together and play games.
在学校的联欢会上，我们做起了和诗的游戏。
Zài xuéxiào de liánhuānhuì shàng，wǒmen zuòqǐ le héshī de yóuxì。
We composed poems in reply during the school party.
做任何事，首先要弄清游戏规则。
Zuò rènhé shì，shǒuxiān yào nòngqīng yóuxìguīzé。
No matter what you do, first you have to clarify the rules of the game.
事情已经真相大白，你别再做戏了。
他们假戏真作，把假夫妻做成了真夫妻。
For recreation he wrote poetry and solved crossword puzzles.
Tā bǎ xiě shī hé zuò tiánzì yóuxì dàngzuò xiāoqiǎn。
他把写诗和做填字游戏当做消遣。
The well-made costume is prepared for the opera to be shown.
这件做工考究的戏装是为即将上演的歌剧准备的。
I do it for the pun of it.
Wǒ shì yīnwèi zhè shì gè wénzì yóuxì cái zhèyàng zuò de。
我是因为这是个文字游戏才这样做的。
He has heard that when children play at Peter Pan, they all want to be Peter.
tā céngjīng tīngshuō ，háizǐmen zuò jiǎbàn xiǎofēixiá de yóuxì shí ，dōu xiǎng dāng Bǐdé。
他曾经听说，孩子们做假扮小飞侠的游戏时，都想当彼得。

Xiao Wang can never stop when he plays computer games.

Xiao Ming\'s eyes are itching; his mother believes it is because he has played computer games too long.
这帮孩子暗渡陈仓，说是补课竟然去打游戏了。
Zhè bāng háizi àndùchéncāng，shuōshì bǔkè jìngrán qù dǎ yóuxì le。
The children cheated. They said they were going to a rescheduled class, but they played computer games instead.
These games exert a tremendous pull on some children.

tā céngjīng tīngshuō ，háizǐmen zuò jiǎbàn xiǎofēixiá de yóuxì shí ，dōu xiǎng dāng Bǐdé。

戏曲音乐响起来了，估计这部戏快结束了。

我国许多地方戏曲都是由民间艺人世代口授而保存下来的。

dìfāngxìqǔ
local operas

在戏曲舞台上，关羽由红生扮演。

这个戏曲演员的翎子功十分出色。

shuǎ bǎxì 
play tricks; juggle

bái kànxì

冲淡戏剧效果
chōngdàn xìjù xiàoguǒ

一出戏
yì chū xì 
an opera; a play
演对台戏
yǎn duìtáixì
put on a rival show

Zhèyàng zhòngyào de gōngzuò kě bùnéng dàng érxì。

视同儿戏
shì tóng érxì
regard as a mere trifle
咱们搞这行的只不过是“逢场作戏”嘛。

She\'s the wardrobe mistress of this play.
玩弄概念游戏
wánnòng gàiniàn yóuxì
juggle with concepts
他就是高兴看电影，看戏不感兴趣。
Tā jiùshì gāoxìng kàn diànyǐng，kàn xì bùgǎn xìngqù。
He\'s fond of seeing films, and not at all interested in watching plays.
耍鬼把戏
shuǎ guǐbǎxì
play dirty tricks
我以前没看过这个戏。
Wǒ yǐqián méi kànguò zhège xì。
I\'ve never seen this opera before.
这回可有好戏看了！
Zhè huí kě yǒu hǎo xì kàn le。
We\'re going to see some fun!
好戏还在后头呢！
Hǎo xì hái zài hòutou ne！
The worst is yet to come!
耍猴戏
shuǎ hóuxì
give a monkey show
他还会两出京戏。
Tā hái huì liǎngchū Jīngxì。
He\'s able to sing a few airs of Beijing Opera.
这出戏太沉闷，观众都昏昏欲睡。
Zhè chū xì tài chénmèn，guānzhòngdōu hūnhūnyùshuì。
This dull play is sending the audience to sleep.
这出戏的场面很火暴。
Zhè chū xì de chǎngmiàn hěn huǒbào。
The play is full of action and excitement.
这出戏激发了观众的爱国心。
Zhè chū xì jīfā le guānzhòng de àiguóxīn。
This play aroused the audience\'s patriotism.
这出戏很叫座。
Zhè chū xì hěn jiàozuò。
The play is a great box-office success.
这个戏的京味儿很浓。
Zhège xì de jīngwèir hěn nóng。
The play is rich in Beijing ambience (or flavour).
他在这出戏里演哪个角儿！
Tā zài zhè chū xì lǐ yǎn nǎge juér！
What\'s his role in this play?
他们到剧院时，戏已经开场了。
Tāmen dào jùyuàn shí，xì yǐjing kāichǎng le。
The play had already begun when they got to the theatre.
戏已经开幕了。
Xì yǐjing kāimù le。
The opera has begun.
戏已开台。
Xì yǐ kāitái。
The performance has begun.
看戏
kàn xì
go to the theatre; see a play (or an opera)
这出戏大有可观。
Zhè chū xì dà yǒu kěguān。
This play is well worth seeing.
我国许多地方戏曲都是由民间艺人世代口授而保存下来的。
Wǒ guó xǔduō dìfāngxìqǔ dōushì yóu mínjiān yìrén shìdài kǒushòu ér bǎocún xiàlái de。
Many of our local operas were preserved by folk artists who passed them down from generation to generation by word of mouth.
马戏团
mǎxìtuán 
circus troupe
今晚这场戏，没法儿那么好的了。
Jīnwǎn zhè chǎngxì，méifǎr nàme hǎo de le。
The performance tonight was terrific.
去黄山旅游的事没戏了。
Qù HuángShān lǚyóu de shì méixì le。
Our trip to Huangshan Mountain is off.
他俩谈得怎样了？ —没戏！
Tā liǎ tán de zěnyàng le? —Méixì！
How is their talk going? — Nothing will come of it!
《贵妃醉酒》是她的拿手好戏。
《Guìfēi Zuìjiǔ》 shì tā de náshǒuhǎoxì。
The Drunken Beauty was the play she did best.
游泳是她的拿手好戏。
Yóuyǒngshì tā de náshǒuhǎoxì。
Swimming is her forte.
挑拨离间是他的拿手好戏。
Tiǎobōlijiàn shì tā de náshǒuhǎoxì。
He makes a speciality of sowing discord. or He is a past master at sowing discord.
明天拍“记者招待会”这场戏。
Míngtiān pāi“jìzhě zhāodàihuì”zhè chǎngxì。
Tomorrow we\'re going to film the press conference scene.

pái yì chū xīn xì

Tā yǒuxìngwèi Méilánfāngpèiguò xì。

人命关天，非同儿戏。
Rénmìngguāntiān，fēitóng\'érxì。
Taking someone\'s life is a serious crime, it\'s no joking matter.

róuhé Shāshìbǐyà xìjù hé jīngjù èrzhě de yìshù xíngshì

GuóqìngJié jiāngshàngyǎn jǐgè xīnxì。

Xìyuánzi lǐ shàngzuò yǐ dá bāchéng。
The theatre is already 80% full.
这出戏可上座了。
Zhè chū xì kě shàngzuò le。
This play is a great draw.

Jīngjù de shàngzuòlǜ bǐ ruògān dìfāngxì dī hěn duō。
Peking Opera as a whole has far smaller audiences than local shows.
收起你那套鬼把戏！
Shōu qǐ nǐ nà tào guǐbǎxì！

Biànxìfǎ děi shǒukuài。

Zhè chū xì kàn le jiào rén suānxīn。
It was heartrending to see the play.
一台戏(话剧、歌舞)
yìtái xì（huàjù、gēwǔ）
a performance (modern drama, song and dance performance)
湖面上鸭群在嬉戏。
Hú mian shàngyāqún zài xīxì。
Ducks are sporting on the lake.
后人袭取这个故事，写成了戏。
Hòurén xíqǔ zhège gùshì，xiěchéng le xì。
Later people adapted this story for the stage.

yuānyāngxì shuǐ

gǔzhuāngxì

Zhè chǎngxì yǎn de hěn jīngcǎi。

戏法人人会变，各有巧妙不同。
Xìfǎ rén rén huì biàn，gè yǒu qiǎomiào bùtóng。

xiàndài xìjù

yì qǐ fùyǒu xìjùxìng de shìjiàn

Zhèngzhì júshì fāshēng le xìjùxìngbiànhuà。

你别老戏弄人。

Bié zài yǎnxì le。

Zhè shì hái yǒuxì。

戏剧性的转折
xìjùxìng de zhuǎnzhé 
a dramatic turn
你能给我们弄几张戏票吗？ ——我可没门儿。
Nǐ néng gěi wǒmen nòng jǐzhāng xìpiào ma? ——Wǒ kě méiménr。

不能拿工作当儿戏。
Bùnéng ná gōngzuò dàng érxì。

戏言
xìyán
joking remarks; pleasantries
戏谑
xìxuè
banter; crack jokes

Wèishénme zhè duàn xì yào yòng ànchǎng de shǒufǎ lái biǎoxiàn ne？
Why don\'t they explicitly act it out?
戏台上的老生都迈着八字步，多神气啊。
Xìtái shàng de lǎoshēng dōu mài zhe bāzìbù，duō shénqì a。
Those actors on stage all walk in a very sophisticated manner. It looks great.
这是付费游戏，不可能白玩儿！
Zhè shì fùfèi yóuxì，bùkěnéng báiwánr！
This game is not free!
演员已经开始扮戏了，别打扰他们。
Yǎnyuán yǐjing kāishǐ bànxì le，bié dǎrǎo tāmen。
The players have begun to put on make up, please don\'t disturb them.
他扮戏很投入。
Tā bànxì hěntóurù。
He acts on stage with all his heart.
这样的暴力游戏对孩子的成长不利。
Zhèyàng de bàolì yóuxì duì háizi de chéngzhǎng búlì。
Such violent games are not good for children\'s development.
他的本行是唱蹦蹦儿戏的，后来才下海经商。
Tā de běnháng shì chàng bèngbèngrxì de，hòulái cái xiàhǎi jīngshāng。
He was originally a pingju actor, and went on to start business. Pingju: traditional opera popular in north and northeast China.
“戏子”就是传统上对演员的鄙称。
“Xìzi”jiùshì chuántǒngshàng duì yǎnyuán de bǐchēng。
“Opera jokery” is a traditional derogatory term for actors.
网络游戏对孩子的成长有诸多弊害。
Wǎngluò yóuxì duì háizi de chéngzhǎng yǒu zhūduō bìhài。
Internet games are bad for a child\'s well-being.
这次去湖南旅游，我们特意去欣赏了当地有名的采茶戏。
Zhècì qù Húnán lǚyóu，wǒmen tèyì qù xīnshǎng le dāngdì yǒumíng de cǎicháxì。
We watched the famous caicha opera when we went to Hunan Province for sightseeing.
她在戏校专门学习彩调。
Tā zài xìxiào zhuānmén xuéxí cǎidiào。
She majored in local color opera in drama school.
几个孩子正在院子里面玩藏猫儿的游戏。
Jǐ gè háizi zhèngzài yuànzi lǐmian wán cángmāor de yóuxì。
Some children are playing hide-and-seek in the yard.
《中国戏曲史长编》是周贻白老先生的学术著作。
《Zhōngguó xìqǔshǐ chángbiān》 shì Zhōu Yíbái lǎoxiānshēng de xuéshùzhùzuò。
The Long Draft Edition of Chinese Drama History is the academic work of Mr. Zhou Yibai.
某传媒公司正要筹拍一批戏曲的纪录片。
Mǒu chuánméi gōngsī zhèngyào chóupāi yì pī xìqǔ de jìlùpiān。
A media company is planning to shoot a series of documentary of drama.
他在这部戏中扮演丑旦。
Tā zài zhèbù xì zhōng bànyǎn chǒudàn。
He plays the role of the female clown in the drama.
樗蒲是古代的游戏名，类似于现在的掷股子。
Chūpú shì gǔdài de yóuxì míng，lèisìyú xiànzài de zhìgǔzi。
Chupu is the name of an ancient game, similar to dice.
川剧是比较有代表性的四川地方戏。
Chuānjù shì bǐjiào yǒu dàibiǎoxìng de sìchuān dìfāngxì。
Sichuan Opera is a typical local opera in Sichuan Province.
黄梅戏《天仙配》中那段对唱被人们广泛传唱。
Huángméixì《Tiānxiānpèi》 zhōng nàduàn duìchàng bèi rénmen guǎngfàn chuánchàng。
A piece of antiphonal singing from the Huangmei Opera &quot;Goddess Marriage&quot; is quite popular with the general public.
票友们经常在一起串戏自娱自乐。
Piàoyǒumen jīngcháng zài yìqǐ chuànxì zìyú zìlè。
Amateur performers always get together and take part in a professional performance as a way to amuse themselves.
戏曲流派的创始人都有自己的代表剧目传世。
Xìqǔ liúpài de chuàngshǐrén dōu yǒu zìjǐ de dàibiǎo jùmù chuánshì。
All the founders of different opera schools have passed down their typical plays to the world.
《奇双会》是一出吹腔戏。
《Qíshuānghuì》 shì yìchū chuīqiāngxì。
&quot;Surprising Double Meeting&quot; is blowing tunes style of opera.
梅兰芳大师技艺高超，艺德高尚，足以垂范戏曲后辈。
Méi Lánfāng dàshī jìyì gāochāo，yìdé gāoshàng，zúyǐ chuífàn xìqǔ hòubèi。
With superb skills and respectable artistic morals, the master, Meilanfang, sets a good example for his inferiors in the field of opera.
以前人们学戏时，只要出一点错，师傅就会打板子。
Yǐqián rénmen xuéxì shí，zhǐyào chū yìdiǎn cuò，shīfu jiùhuì dǎ bǎnzi。
In the past, people learning opera performance would be flogged by their mentor if they made any mistakes.
他可是个游戏高手，现在能打通关了。
Tā kě shì gè yóuxì gāoshǒu，xiànzài néng dǎ tōngguān le。
He is a dab hand at the game. Now he can play a drinking game with everyone at his table.
让我去演戏，那是打鸭子上架。
Ràng wǒ qù yǎnxì，nà shì dǎ yāzi shàngjià。
They want me to act in a play, but that\'s simply beyond me.
大棚里正在表演马戏、魔术。
Dàpéng lǐ zhèngzài biǎoyǎn mǎxì、móshù。
People are performing circus, and magic acts in the big tent.
她演的这出戏是梅兰芳单传的。
Tā yǎn de zhèchū xì shì Méi Lánfāng dānchuán de。
The play she performed is passed only by Mei Lanfang.
这个游戏是单机版的。
Zhège yóuxì shì dānjībǎn de。
This game is played on a single computer.
他玩起了单人游戏。
Tā wánqǐ le dānrén yóuxì。
He started a single game.
请大家再跟我学唱一遍这段戏的倒板。
Qǐng dàjiā zài gēn wǒ xuéchàng yíbiàn zhè duàn xì de dǎobǎn。
Please learn the daoban (a beat pattern used for sad, melancholic scenes in traditional Chinese opera) for the play again after me.
这两个戏曲学员倒仓了。
Zhè liǎnggè xìqǔ xuéyuán dǎocāng le。
The two opera students have changed their voices.
他的戏演砸了，观众纷纷叫倒好儿。
Tā de xì yǎnzá le，guānzhòng fēnfēn jiào díohǎor。
The audience booed his failed performance.
这几位外国人对灯影戏产生了兴趣。
Zhè jǐ wèi wàiguórén duì dēngyǐngxì chǎnshēng le xìngqù。
These foreigners were interested in shadow plays.
这个戏曲演员的底工很扎实。
Zhège xìqǔ yǎnyuán de dǐgōng hěnzāshí。
This opera actor has strong basic skills.
在这次戏曲调演中，涌现出了很多优秀剧目。
Zài zhècì xìqǔ diàoyǎn zhōng，yǒngxiàn chū le hěnduō yōuxiù jùmù。
Many excellent plays appeared in this period\'s selection of local operas.
通常戏的开头都会有几句定场白。
Tōngcháng xì de kāitóu dōuhuì yǒu jǐ jù dìngchǎngbái。
Generally, operas start with a soliloquy of an actor introducing himself on his first appearance.
以前很多文化馆都有演出独脚戏的团队。
Yǐqián hěnduō wénhuàguǎn dōu yǒu yǎnchū dújiǎoxì de tuánduì。
In the past, many cultural centers put on one-man shows.
《三岔口》这出戏主要由两个演员进行短打表演。
《Sānchàkǒu》zhèchūxì zhǔyào yóu liǎnggè yǎnyuán jìnxíng duǎndǎ biǎoyǎn。
The play features scenes of hand-to-hand fighting between two actors wearing jacket and trousers.
中国戏曲中的武生分为长靠和短打两种。
Zhōngguó xìqǔ zhōng de wǔshēng fēn wéi chángkào hé duǎndǎ liǎng zhǒng。
In Chinese drama, there are two kinds of martial roles: one using long weapons and the other which is good at fighting with bare hands.
两位影星在这部电影中有对手戏。
Liǎng wèi yǐng xīng zài zhèbù diànyǐng zhōng yǒu duìshǒuxì。
The two stars put on a rival show in that movie.
《戏为六绝句》（杜甫）：“尔曹身与名俱灭，不废江河万古流”。
《Xìwéiliùjuéjù》（Dù Fǔ）：“ěrcáo shēn yǔ míng jùmiè，búfèi jiānghé wàngǔliú”。
In A Playful Quatrain, Du Fu wrote, &quot;Even if your bodies and names should perish, the flowing of the rivers will not stop.
他在这出戏中唱二花脸。
Tā zài zhè chū xì zhōng chàng èrhuāliǎn。
He played the role of a painted face.
小明眼睛发涩，妈妈说他是电脑游戏玩儿的时间太长了。
Xiǎo Míng yǎnjīng fāsè，māma shuō tā shì diànnǎo yóuxì wánr de shíjiān tài cháng le。
Xiao Ming\'s eyes are itching; his mother believes it is because he has played computer games too long.
极品飞车，这是个很好玩儿的电脑游戏。
Jípǐn fēichē，zhè shì gè hěn hǎowánr de diànnǎo yóuxì。
&quot;The rush&quot; is a very interesting computer game.
他像疯魔了似的，几天几夜坐在电脑前打游戏。
Tā xiàng fēngmó le sì de，jǐ tiān jǐ yè zuòzài diànnǎo qián dǎyóuxì。
As if possessed, he played computer games for days.
这部戏演到动情处，观众都干咽起来。
Zhèbù xì yǎndào dòngqíngchù，guānzhòng dōu gānyàn qǐlái。
When the drama came to the most moving part, the viewers all sobbed.
《白蛇传》是川剧的高腔戏。
《Báishéchuán》 shì chuānjù de gāoqiāngxì。
&quot;The Tale of the White Serpent&quot; is a high-pitched drama in Sichuan opera.
这张光盘里有各种各样的小游戏。
Zhèzhāng guāngpán lǐ yǒu gèzhǒng gèyàng de xiǎoyóuxì。
This CD has various kinds of small games in it.
我刚写了一篇戏剧观后感寄给了杂志社。
Wǒ gāng xiě le yì piān xìjù guānhòugǎn jìgěi le zázhìshè。
I just finished an article about my impressions of the play and have mailed it to the periodical office.
这部戏是由一位从法国归来的导演执导的。
Zhèbù xì shì yóu yíwèi cóng Fǎguó guīlái de dǎoyǎn zhídǎo de。
This play is directed by a director who has returned from France.
大宅门里的贵妇们每天就是打打牌，看看戏。
Dàzháimén lǐ de guìfùmen měitiān jiùshì dǎdǎ pái，kànkàn xì。
Everyday activities of the female elite include; playing cards, and watching operas.
过山车十分的刺激，心脏不好的人不要尝试这个游戏。
Guòshānchē shífēn de cìjī，xīnzàng bùhǎo de rén búyào chángshì zhège yóuxì。
People having a weak heart should not ride the roller coaster for it is extremely exciting.
在学校的联欢会上，我们做起了和诗的游戏。
Zài xuéxiào de liánhuānhuì shàng，wǒmen zuòqǐ le héshī de yóuxì。
We composed poems in reply during the school party.
《战长沙》是京剧中一出著名的红净戏。
《Zhànchángshā》 shì jīngjù zhōng yìchū zhùmíng de hóngjìngxì。
Zhanchangsha is a famous Peking opera featuring the role of Hongjing.
在戏曲舞台上，关羽由红生扮演。
Zài xìqǔ wǔtái shàng，Guān Yǔ yóu hóngshēng bànyǎn。
On the dramatic stage, the role of Guan Yu is played by Hongsheng.
据考证，当时这些戏唱的都是徽调。
Jù kǎozhèng，dāngshí zhèxiē xìchàng de dōushì huīdiào。
According to textual research, all the dramas were then was sang in the Anhui tune-pattern.
因为突然停电，剧场不得不回戏。
Yīnwéi tūrán tíngdiàn，jùchǎng bùdébùhuíxì。
The theatre had to stop the play due to the sudden power cut.
他为了让敌人相信，假戏真作把自己腿打伤了。
Tā wèi le ràng dírén xiāngxìn，jiǎxì zhēnzuò bǎ zìjǐ tuǐ dǎshāng le。
In order to convince the enemy, he had to turn the acting into a real story and shoot himself in the leg.
这位演员在读研究生，所以最近没有接戏。
Zhèwèi yǎnyuán zài dú yánjiūshēng，suǒyǐ zuìjìn méiyǒu jiēxì。
The actor is studying for an MA degree, so he has not played any roles recently.
这出戏的女主角可真节烈。
Zhè chū xì de nǚzhǔjué kě zhēn jiéliè。
The heroine of the play is rigorously chaste.
这是张有30个游戏的节目卡。
Zhè shì zhāng yǒu sānshígè yóuxì de jiémùkǎ。
The card has thirty built-in games programs.
这出戏的结幕真令人震撼！
Zhè chū xì de jiémù zhēn lìngrén zhènhàn！
The ending of this play is very shocking.
近古是我国戏曲和小说的繁盛期。
Jìngǔ shì wǒguó xìqǔ hé xiǎoshuō de fánshèngqī。
The period between the 10th and mid-19th centuries was a flowering period for dramas and novels.
近年来，菊坛新人辈出，好戏连台。
Jìnnián lái，jútán xīnrén bèichū，hǎoxì liántái。
In recent years, many new Beijng opera talents and performances have appeared.
“人生如戏，聚散无常”，随着年龄的增长，他对这话的感触越来越深。
“Rénshēng rúxì，jùsǎn wúcháng”，suízhe niánlíng de zēngzhǎng，tā duì zhèhuà de gǎnchù yuèláiyuèshēn。
&quot;Life is like a play and everything is uncertain.&quot; With the increase of age, he is more and more touched by this sentence.
这个戏的情节简直太绝门儿了，原来情节还可以这样安排！
Zhège xì de qíngjié jiǎnzhí tài juéménr le，yuánlái qíngjié hái kěyǐ zhèyàng ānpái！
The story of this play is so beyond my imagination. I never knew that it could be arranged like this.
戏曲擂台赛今日开擂，首场比赛是青衣专场。
Xìqǔ lèitáisài jīnrì kāilèi，shǒuchǎng bǐsài shì qīngyī zhuānchǎng。

一场好戏即将开锣。
Yìchǎng hǎoxì jíjiāng kāiluó。

Hamlet is the outstanding play of our modern drama troupe.
小时候咱们一起玩过打仗游戏，你可曾记得？
Xiǎoshíhou zánmen yìqǐ wánguò dǎzhàng yóuxì，nǐ kě céng jìde？
Do you remember the war games that we used to play together when we were little?
他不好好学习，就知道上网打游戏，这不是空耗青春吗！

He wastes his life by playing computer games instead of studying hard.
每次看马戏表演，她最喜欢的节目是空中飞人。
Měi cì kàn mǎxì biǎoyǎn，tā zuì xǐhuan de jiémù shì kōng zhōng fēirén。

傀儡戏用的木偶道具大部分都是手工制作的。

Most of the props used in puppet shows are handmade.
这个坤伶年纪不太大，但会的戏已经很多了！
Zhège kūnlíng niánjì bú tài dà，dàn huì de xì yǐjing hěnduō le！
The actress is quite young, but she can perform many operas.
昆腔是几大戏曲声腔之一，在明代发展很快。

Kunqu is one of the several operatic tunes developed very quickly in the Ming dynasty.
戏曲这种艺术形式滥觞于宋朝。
Xìqǔ zhèzhǒng yìshù xíngshì lànshāngyú Sòngcháo。
Traditional opera originated in the Song dynasty.

Xìtái shàng，Shētàijūn zìchēng wéi lǎoshēn。
On the stage, the Dowager called herself &quot;Laoshen&quot;.
我们是老相识，在一起听戏有几十年了。
Wǒmen shì lǎoxiāngshí，zài yìqǐ tīngxì yǒu jǐ shí nián le。
We are old acquaintances, and have been listening to drama together for several decades.
退休后，他每天乐悠悠的，读读书，写写字，看看戏，倒也惬意。
Tuìxiū hòu，tā měitiān lèyōuyōu de，dúdú shū，xiěxiě zì，kànkàn xì，dǎo yě qièyì。
After he retired he lived leisurely and comfortably, sometimes reading, sometimes writing, or watching a play.  More simply, he lived a happy life.
梨园戏是非常古老的一个剧种，它孕育于福建泉州，流布于泉州、漳州和厦门三角地带。
Líyuánxì shì fēicháng gǔlǎo de yígè jùzhǒng，tā yùnyùyú Fújiàn Quánzhōu，liúbùyú Quánzhōu、Zhāngzhōu hé Xiàmén sānjiǎo dìdài。
Liyuan Opera is a very old type of drama. It was nurtured in Quanzhou, Fujian Province and spreaded in the triangular areas of Quanzhou, Zhangzhou, and Xiamen.
今天晚上在长安大戏院梅葆玖先生和谭元寿先生连袂演出《打渔杀家》。
Jīntiān wǎnshàng zài chángān dàxìyuàn Méi Bǎojiǔ xiānshēng hé Tán Yuánshòu xiānshēng liánmèi yǎnchū《Dǎyúshājiā》。
Tonight in the Chang\'an Grand Theatre, Mei Baojiu and Tan Yuanshou will perform together in &quot; Da Yu Sha Jia&quot;.

Chūnjié qījiān，shǒudōu de wénhuà shìchǎng kě zhēnshì hǎoxì liántái。
During Spring Festival, the cultural squares of the capital have one good performance after another.
周信芳先生在上海时排了许多连台本戏，比如《西游记》。

When Zhou Xinfang was in Shanghai, he had performed many dramas in chapter such as Journey to the West.
现在的综合联欢会经常会把戏曲联唱节目作为一个固定的节目。

Now integration get-togethers usually consider mixed drama singing as a fixed programme.
这个戏曲演员的翎子功十分出色。

This traditional Chinese opera player is good at performing with the pheasant quill worn on his helmet.
这本书主要介绍了戏曲艺术的流变历史。

This book mainly talks about the evolution of traditional Chinese opera.
山东人最爱听柳子戏。
Shāndōngrén zuì àitīng liǔzixì。
People in Shandong Province are fond of liuzi opera.
他因为长了六指所以不能唱戏。
Tā yīnwèi zhǎng le liù zhǐ suǒyǐ bùnéng chàngxì。
He has six fingers, so he cannot sing traditional Chinese opera.

Children are playing on the verdant lawn.

Tā jīntiān shàngyǎn le màozi xìfǎ，zhù běn duì yǐ sānbǐlíng huòdé le shènglì。
He scored a hat trick today, and helped his team to win three to zero.
这个游戏不用秘技恐怕很难过关了。
Zhège yóuxì búyòng mìjì kǒngpà hěnnán guòguān le。
This game is nearly impossible to finish without a remarkable strategy.

她从小练功学戏，终于成了受观众喜爱的名角。
Tā cóng xiǎo liàngōng xuéxì，zhōng yú chéng le shòu guānzhòng xǐ\'àide míngjué。
She has been exercising skill and learning traditional Chinese opera since she was very young, and finally becomes a popular among the audiences.
他曾经是个唱戏的名伶，后来告别了舞台。
Tā céngjīng shì gè chàngxì de mínglíng，hòulái gàobié le wǔtái。
He was once a renowned actor in Chinese operas, and later bid farewell to the stage.
他唱戏的水平很高，不愧是一位名票！
Tā chàngxì de shuǐpíng hěngāo，bùkuì shì yíwèi míngpiào！
He has a very high level of singing, and deserves to be a popular amateur opera performing artist.
这个孩子中了魔障了，不好好学习，天天为电子游戏而着迷！
Zhège háizi zhòng le mózhàng le，bùhǎohǎo xuéxí，tiāntiān wèi diànzǐ yóuxì ér zháomí！
The child is addicted to electronic games, and plays games rather than studying hard every day.
哭可是宝宝的拿手戏，只要她一哭，妈妈没辙了。

Crying is the baby\'s forte. Whenever she cries, her mother doesn’t know how to deal with her.
有人说南戏已经灭绝了，可是也有人说它依然生动地活在如今的瓯剧、昆曲中。

Some say that southern drama has been extinct, but others say that it still exists in the current Ou opera and Kunqu opera.
这本是一件为国为民的好事，可现在却成了一出闹戏。

玩儿过打仗游戏之后，这群孩子全都满身泥污了。

He wants to decorate the study with Nuo opera masks bought in Guizhou province.
他学戏很刻苦，每天练跑圆场都要练3个小时。
Tā xuéxì hěnkèkǔ，měitiān liàn pǎoyuánchǎng dōuyào liàn sāngè xiǎoshí。
He is diligent in learning the performing arts and spends three hours walking in circles simulating a long walk.
他的戏剧基本功不错，喷口有力、吐字清晰。
Tā de xìjù jīběngōng búcuò，pēnkǒu yǒulì、tǔzì qīngxī。
He has pretty good basic opera skills, he articulates forcefully and pronounces clearly.
爷爷是戏迷，受爷爷影响小明也从小就爱上了皮黄。
Yéye shì xìmí，shòu yéye yǐngxiǎng Xiǎo Míng yě cóng xiǎo jiù ài shàng le píhuáng。
The grandpa is a theatre fan. Under his influence, Xiao Ming fell in love with Beijing opera when he was a child.
她喜欢玩儿拼图游戏，每天都玩儿，也不腻烦。
Tā xǐhuan wánr pīntú yóuxì，měitiān dōu wánr，yě bú nìfán。
She likes to do jigsaw puzzles, and doesn’t feel bored even though she does it every day.
爷爷很喜欢听平调这种地方戏。
Yéye hěnxǐhuan tīng píngdiào zhèzhǒng dìfāngxì。
My grandpa is fond of watching a local opera named Pingdiao opera.

My grandma likes to listen to the Pingju &quot;Qin Xianglian&quot;.

Zánmen wán gè pòmír de yóuxì ba！
Let\'s play the game of solving riddles!

Wǒ zài wǎngshàng xiàzài le yígè qílèi yóuxì。
I downloaded a chess game from the internet.

他唱戏时很讲究气口的运用。
Tā chàngxì shí hěnjiǎngjiū qìkǒu de yùnyòng。

This actor added many tricks to gain applause in the drama.
导演看完了全本，觉得这是一部值得拍的好戏。

The director read the whole play, and thought it worth shooting.
这个可以入戏的好题材是我从报纸上看到的。
Zhège kěyǐ rùxì de hǎo tícái shì wǒ cóng bàozhǐ shàng kàndào de。
I saw a good theme in a newspaper, which can be put into a drama.
导演再次强调：演员表演时一定要入戏！
Dǎoyǎn zàicì qiángdiào：yǎnyuán biǎoyǎn shí yídìng yào rùxì！
The director emphasized again that actors should concentrate on their performance.
他每天沉溺于打电子游戏机，真是玩物丧志呀。
Tā měitiān chénnìyú dǎ diànzǐyóuxìjī，zhēnshi wánwùsàngzhì ya。
He is addicted to playing computer games every day. The saying &quot;excessive attention to playing saps the will&quot; really applies here.

On the playground, some students are playing games with earthbags.
戏剧里，元帅升帐点兵时都要发放令旗令箭。
Xìjù lǐ，yuánshuài shēngzhàng diǎnbīng shí dōuyào fāfàng lìngqí lìngjiàn。
In theatrical operas, whenever a marshal gathers and reviews his subordinates, flags or arrows used as a token of authority will be given out.
生角是中国戏曲艺术中的一个重要行当。

The male character is an important profession in Chinese theatre.

这部戏首场演出即获得了成功。
Zhèbù xì shǒuchǎng yǎnchū jí huòdé le chénggōng。
The premiere of this play was a great success.
戏曲界的趣闻轶事很有说头，不过现在知道这些事的老先生越来越少了。

There are many interesting stories about the theatre to talk about, but fewer and fewer old gentlemen know them today.
今天是我的婚礼，特请来了戏班唱堂会。
Jīntiān shì wǒ de hūnlǐ，tè qǐnglái le xìbān chàng tánghuì。
It is my wedding day today, and I have invited the theatrical troupe to stage a performance in my house.
我玩儿套圈儿游戏时赢得了这个小兔子玩具。
Wǒ wánr tàoquānr yóuxì shí yíngdé le zhège xiǎotùzi wánjù。
When playing quoits, I won this rabbit toy.
今天的戏一定精彩，因为是梅兰芳先生挂头牌。

Today\'s opera will definitely be wonderful, because Mr. Mei Lanfang is the leading actor.
我最喜欢在酒席宴上玩这种投壶游戏了。
Wǒ zuì xǐhuan zài jiǔxíyàn shàng wán zhèzhǒng tóuhú yóuxì le。
What I like best is playing the game of throwing arrows into a distant pot during a feast.
这个戏还缺一位娃娃生演员，你可以去试试。
Zhège xì hái quē yíwèi wáwáshēng yǎnyuán，nǐ kěyǐ qù shìshì。
This play is still lacking a young male actor, you can go to have a try.
今天马戏团里有腽肭兽的水上表演。
Jīntiān mǎxìtuán lǐ yǒu wànàshòu de shuǐshàng biǎoyǎn。
Today, the circus will put on a fur seals aquashow.
由于沉迷于网络游戏，他养成了晚睡晚起的顽习。
Yóuyú chénmí yú wǎngluò yóuxì，tā yǎngchéng le wǎnshuì wǎnqǐ de wánxí。
Indulging in on-line games, he got into the inveterate habit of sleeping late at night and getting up late in the morning.
还没开戏，文场已经坐在舞台边上了。
Háiméi kāixì，wénchǎng yǐjing zuòzài wǔtái biānshàng le。

&quot;The Endless Task&quot; is a current internet game that is very popular.
小王只要一打起游戏来就无尽无休！
Xiǎo Wáng zhǐyào yì dǎqǐ yóuxì lái jiù wújìn wúxiū！
Xiao Wang can never stop when he plays computer games.
爷爷每天早上都要去公园练五禽戏。
Yéye měitiān zǎoshàng dōuyào qù gōngyuán liàn wǔqínxì。
My grandfather goes to the park to do the Five-Animal Exercises every morning.
中国古代戏曲伴奏需要文场和武场。
Zhōngguó gǔdài xìqǔ bànzòu xūyào wénchǎng hé wǔchǎng。
The orchestra of traditional opera consists of percussion, stringed and wind instruments.
听说摄制组正在我们这里拍戏，村里人都去看希罕了。

Xiao Wu is very nosy, and is nicknamed &quot;the inquirer&quot;.

mǎxì
circus

现在的综合联欢会经常会把戏曲联唱节目作为一个固定的节目。
Xiànzài de zōnghé liánhuānhuì jīngcháng huì bǎ xìqǔ liánchàng jiémù zuòwéi yígè gùdìng de jiémù。
Now integration get-togethers usually consider mixed drama singing as a fixed programme.
他耍的把戏很难看穿。
Tā shuǎde bǎxì hěnnán kànchuān。
It\'s not easy to see through his tricks.
他为了让敌人相信，假戏真作把自己腿打伤了。
Tā wèi le ràng dírén xiāngxìn，jiǎxì zhēnzuò bǎ zìjǐ tuǐ dǎshāng le。
In order to convince the enemy, he had to turn the acting into a real story and shoot himself in the leg.
有的人把交朋友当作是逢场作戏。
Yǒuderén bǎ jiāopéngyou dàngzuòshì féngchǎngzuòxì。
Some people regard friendship as a game.
耍把戏的来了
把戏人人会耍，巧妙各不相同。
戳穿他的鬼把戏。
他为人老实厚道，不会耍把戏。
把好戏放在后面压场。
你也太会演戏了，把大家都给蒙住了。
他们假戏真作，把假夫妻做成了真夫妻。
不要把工作当儿戏
把一个简单的事件敷演成一部大戏。
I discovered the salesman\'s trick that he sells display products to customers as new ones.
我认清了这个销售员的把戏，他把陈列品当作新的卖给顾客。
to restore the theater to its former estate
把戏院恢复到以前的状况
to put a dog through its tricks
让狗变把戏
You can\'t teach an old dog new tricks.
老狗学不了新把戏（朽木不可雕也；积习难改）。
Don\'t turn a drama into a crisis.
别把戏剧变成闹剧。
It was a bit of a cheat but none found out.
Zhè shì yí gè xiǎobǎxì，búguò méiyǒu rén kàn chūlái。
这是一个小把戏，不过没有人看出来。
He loves performing magic tricks for the designers in their studios.
Tā àihào zài tāmen de gōngzuòshì zhōng wèi shèjìshīmen biǎoyǎn móshù bǎxì。
他爱好在他们的工作室中为设计师们表演魔术把戏。
She is up to her old tricks again.
Tā yòu kāishǐ wán tā de lǎobǎxì le。
她又开始玩她的老把戏了。
I used to pay all of the bills，but now I\'ve got wise to their plan.
Yǐqián wǒ wéi suǒyǒu de zhàngdān mǎidān，kě xiànzài wǒ qīngchule tāmen de bǎxì。
以前我为所有的账单买单，可现在我清楚了他们的把戏。
The police played a cat and mouse game with the robbers.
Jǐngchá hé jiéfěi wánle chǎng yùqín-gùzòng de bǎxì。
警察和劫匪玩了场欲擒故纵的把戏。
Too much monkey business for me to get involved in.
Tài duō piànrén de bǎxì，wǒ wúfǎ shèzú qízhōng。
太多骗人的把戏，我无法涉足其中。
So that\'s your game，is it?
Suǒyǐ zhè jiùshì nǐ de guǐbǎxì，shì ma？
所以这就是你的鬼把戏，是吗？
His testimony was just a contrivance to throw us off the track.
Tā de zhèngcí zhǐshì wèile ràng wǒmen tuōlí zhèngguǐ de bǎxì éryǐ。
他的证词只是为了让我们脱离正轨的把戏而已。
The circus used a tent as their cookhouse.
Mǎxìtuán bǎ yí gè zhàngpeng yòngzuò tāmen de hùwài chúfáng。
马戏团把一个帐篷用作他们的户外厨房。
A broken back is nothing to be casual about; it is no fooling matter.
Kě bùnéng bǎ hòubèi tòng dāng érxì；zhè búshì kāiwánxiào de。
可不能把后背痛当儿戏；这不是开玩笑的。
For recreation he wrote poetry and solved crossword puzzles.
Tā bǎ xiě shī hé zuò tiánzì yóuxì dàngzuò xiāoqiǎn。
他把写诗和做填字游戏当做消遣。
I treated his advances as a joke.
Wǒ bǎ zhè zhǒng jìnzhǎn shìwéi érxì。
我把这种进展视为儿戏。
This part of the game is driving me nuts.
游戏的这个地方快把我弄疯了。
If you keep spending time on that stupid game you\'ll fail the final examination.
要是再把时间花在玩那个蠢游戏上面，你就没法通过期末考试了。
He thought of his painting as a game that filled his empty time.
Tā bǎ huàhuà dàngzuò tiánchōng tā kōngxū shēnghuó de yì zhǒng yóuxì。
他把画画当做填充他空虚生活的一种游戏。
他的胸前血糊糊的，肯定受了重伤。
Tā de xiōngqián xiěhūhū de，kěndìng shòu le zhòngshāng。
There is a lot of blood on his chest, he must be injured.
He took my blood pressure and then gave me a chest X-ray.
他给我量了血压并作了X光胸透。
这件事情他很没有把握，胸中无数。
Zhèjiàn shìqing tā hěn méiyǒu bǎwò，xiōng zhōng wúshù。
He has no certainty of confidence on this matter.
不用担心，他胸中有数，不会出事的。
Búyòng dānxīn，tā xiōngzhōng yǒushù，búhuì chūshì de。
Don\'t worry. He knows how to handle this situation. Nothing bad will happen.
对这场比赛的结果，他早已胸中有数。
Duì zhèchǎng bǐsài de jiéguǒ，tā zǎoyǐ xiōng zhōng yǒushù。
He knew the result of this match with certainty from early on.
胸口中了颗子弹。

He was hit in the chest by a bullet.
胸中有数
抒发胸中悲苦和愤懑。

胸中丘壑，笔下丹青。
抒发胸中的激情。

He gave vent to his anger.

他心胸阔达，从来不计较个人得失。

péiyǎngháizi de zìkòngnénglì 
teach children self-control

Everybody has desires. The key lies in self-control.

At last, the drop-off of the carrier rocket means the satellite has entered its self-guided phase.
自控
zìkòng
self-control
热水器有自动控制功能，当水达到设定温度的时候就自动断电了。
Rèshuǐqì yǒu zìdòng kòngzhì gōngnéng，dāng shuǐ dádào shèdìng wēndù de shíhou jiù zìdòng duàndiàn le。
The water heater has self-control functions and cuts off power after the water temperature reaches the setting.
我买的新车装有智能自动管控系统。
Wǒ mǎi de xīnchē zhuāngyǒu zhìnéng zìdòng guǎnkòng xìtǒng。
My newly-bought car is equipped with an automatic control system.

zhǐkòng
accuse; charge

指控
zhǐkòng

指控。

指控(某人)

他们指控他偷窃。

plaintiff versus defendant

控制权
kòngzhì quán
control
控制谈判；在谈判中取得主动权
kòng zhì tán pàn；zài tán pàn zhōng qǔ dé zhǔ dòng quán

控告
控告

她以诽谤罪控告这家报纸并索赔300万美金。

to sue sb for damages

抢婚的风俗现在已经很少见了。

The grabbing-bride ceremony is a rare custom nowadays.

I stole my brother\'s thunder by announcing my engagement at his wedding.

她就喜欢抢镜头，出风头。
Tā jiù xǐhuan qiǎngjìngtóu，chū fēngtou。
She loves to steal the show and be the centre of attention.

Dàbáitiān jiù míngqiǎng，zhè qǐ ànjiàn de yǐngxiǎng kě tài èliè le！

他是昨天半夜发的病，现在还在抢救。

他鼻息已经很微弱了，需要赶快送去医院抢救。

他因为肝昏迷被送进了抢救室。

他死亡的原因是后心受了重创，抢救无效。

这伙抢银行的狂徒已经被警方擒获了。

大白天就明抢，这起案件的影响可太恶劣了！

He intercepted the opposing team\'s fast breaks many times in the basketball match.
遇到抢匪时他冲在了最前面。
Yùdào qiǎngfěi shí tā chōngzài le zuì qiánmiàn。
He was right at the front when they were confronted by the robbers.

People worked fast and over night in order to complete and hand over the project at the end of the year.
由于我们利用了最佳的时间抢攻，才赢得了这场战役。
Yóuyú wǒmen lìyòng le zuì jiā de shíjiān qiǎnggōng，cái yíngdé le zhèchǎng zhànyì。
It was because we sped up the attack at the right time that we won the battle.
抢婚的风俗现在已经很少见了。
Qiǎnghūn de fēngsú xiànzài yǐjing hěnshǎojiàn le。
The grabbing-bride ceremony is a rare custom nowadays.
恋爱婚姻需要男女双方自愿，怎么能抢婚呢？

A love match should be at the wishes of both sides, how can they grab a bride?
在洪汛期到来之前，我们必须要抢建大堤！
Zài hóngxùnqī dàolái zhīqián，wǒmen bìxū yào qiǎngjiàn dàdī！
Before the flood season comes, we must rush to build the dam.
无数照相机都在抢景拍摄那进球的瞬间。

现在增强免疫力的中药成了抢手货。
Xiànzài zēngqiáng miǎnyìlì de zhōng yào chéng le qiǎngshǒuhuò。
Now traditional Chinese medicine to improve one\'s immunity has become a fast-selling product.
他已经在这座山上作了两年山大王，干了很多抢劫的坏事。
Tā yǐjing zài zhèzuò shān shàng zuò le liǎng nián shāndàiwang，gàn le hěnduō qiǎngjié de huàishì。
He has been the head of a group of outlaws on this mountain for two years, and has robbed others many times.
每年的双抢时候，驻扎此地的战士们都会来帮忙。
Měinián de shuāngqiǎng shíhou，zhùzhā cǐdì de zhànshìmen dōuhuì lái bāngmáng。
During every year\'s rush-harvest and rush-planting, the garrison here comes to help.
孙悟空初到水晶宫，就抢走了老龙王的定海神针。
Sūnwùkōng chū dào shuǐjīnggōng，jiù qiǎngzǒu le lǎolóngwáng de dìnghǎishénzhēn。
The first time the Monkey King went to the Dragon Palace, he grabbed the old Dragon King\'s Divine Needle which guarded the sea.
剧场门外的水牌上刚写出梅兰芳的演出预告，票就被抢购一空了。
Jùchǎng ménwài de shuǐpái shàng gāng xiěchū Méi Lánfāng de yǎnchū yùgào，piào jiù bèi qiǎnggòuyìkōng le。
The moment the announcement of Mei Lanfang\'s performance was written on the billboard outside the theater, tickets sold out in a rush.
他在死亡线上徘徊了好久，终于被抢救了回来。
Tā zài sǐwángxiàn shàng páihuái le hǎo jiǔ，zhōng yú bèi qiǎngjiù le huílái。
He struggled for quite a long time at the verge of death, and was finally saved.
他一定是吞服了过量的安眠药，应当赶紧送医院抢救。
Tā yídìng shì tūnfú le guòliàng de ānmiányào，yīngdāng gǎnjǐn sòng yīyuàn qiǎngjiù。
He must have taken a massive overdose of sleeping tablets, and should be sent to hospital at once.
汤姆的情况非常危险，医生正在抢救。
Tāngmǔ de qíngkuàng fēicháng wēixiǎn，yīshēng zhèngzài qiǎngjiù。
Tom\'s condition is very bad, the doctors are trying their best to save him.

achromatic colors
非彩色 (如黑、白、灰色)

你应该买一台彩色电视机。

19世纪，人们开始探索彩色摄影技术。

in colour
[+film，illustrations] 彩色

fēngfùduōcǎi
rich and varied; rich and colourful
中彩
zhòngcǎi
win a prize in a lottery
挂彩
ɡuàcǎi 
decorate with coloured silk festoons; decorate for festive occasions
张灯结彩
zhāngdēngjiécǎi
be decorated with lanterns and coloured streamers; be decked with lanterns and bunting; be decked out and hung with lanterns; be gay with lanterns and decorations
精彩
jīnɡcǎi
brilliant; splendid; wonderful
得了个满堂彩
dé le gè mǎntángcǎi
bring the house down
彩陶
cǎitáo
painted pottery (of a Neolithic culture)
这瓷瓶上彩绘着八仙过海的画儿呢。

你最好烧高香祈求这次考试能过。
Nǐ zuìhǎo shāogāoxiāng qíqiú zhècì kǎoshì néngguò。

如果这次考试能够顺利通过，我可真是烧高香了。

烧高香。
你要真肯出力相助，我给您烧高香啦
儿子能考上大学，我就烧高香啦。

赶上清明节，去火葬场烧纸的人会特别多。

那棵树被雷劈到，燃烧起来，远看就像一个火柱。

每逢既望之日他都会去寺庙烧香。

He goes to the temple to burn joss sticks every 15th day of the month.
不少人想依靠烧香拜佛来消灾解难。

Many people want to relieve their worries and difficulties by burning incense and praying to Buddha.
刚回到乡下老家，妈总怕我冷，给我那炕洞里不住地添柴烧火。
Gāng huídào xiāngxià lǎojiā，mā zǒng pà wǒ lěng，gěi wǒ nà kàngdòng lǐ búzhù de tiānchái shāohuǒ。
After I had just returned to my hometown in the countryside, mother was quite afraid that I felt cold and kept adding firewood to the flue of our kang.
清节时，按照家乡的风俗，他们给爷爷烧了些锞子。
Qīngjié shí，ànzhào jiāxiāng de fēngsú，tāmen gěi yéye shāo le xiē kèzi。
In Pure Brightness, people burn some mock bank money notes for grandpa, according to their hometown custom.
这个村子已经改用坑气来替代煤烧饭了。
Zhège cūnzi yǐjing gǎiyòng kēngqì lái tìdài méi shāofàn le。
Marsh gas has been supplied to the village instead of coal gas.
这片枯草还是及时烧掉，以免不小心造成火灾！
Zhè piàn kūcǎo háishi jíshí shāodiào，yǐmiǎn bùxiǎoxīn zàochéng huǒzāi！
This stretch of withered grass should be burned, or it may cause a fire.
这些枯枝可以拿回家当柴烧！
Zhèxiē kūzhī kěyǐ náhuíjiā dāng cháishāo！
These withered branches can be taken home for firewood.
烧锅炉还是需要块煤的，再买些吧。
Shāo guōlú háishi xūyào kuàiméi de，zài mǎi xiē ba。
Let us buy more lumps of coal, which will be needed to heat the boiler.
宝宝很喜欢吃妈妈做的红烧快鱼。
Bǎobao hěnxǐhuan chī māma zuò de hóngshāokuàiyú。
The child likes his mother\'s stewed herring with brown sauce very much.
堆在那边的木柴捆子是用来烧火的。
Duīzài nàbiān de mùchái kǔnzi shì yònglái shāohuǒ de。
The bales of firewood piled there are used to make fire.
这座立窑是专门用来烧制石灰石的。
Zhèzuò lìyáo shì zhuānmén yònglái shāozhì shíhuīshí de。
The erected stove is specially made for firing limestone.
我家自己烧的土暖气上有一个简易的连通器。
Wǒjiā zìjǐ shāo de tǔnuǎnqì shàng yǒu yígè jiǎnyì de liántōngqì。
The man-made central heating equipment of our home has a simple communicating vessel.
你别这么想不开，留得青山在，不怕没柴烧！
Nǐ bié zhème xiǎngbùkāi，liúdé qīngshān zài，búpà méichái shāo！
Why are you so pessimistic? While there is life, there is hope.
我用炉火烧掉了他的照片。
Wǒ yòng lúhuǒ shāodiào le tā de zhàopiàn。
I burnt his photos on the stove.
用这种焖烧锅做饭，既省电又方便。
Yòng zhèzhǒng mènshāoguō zuòfàn，jì shěngdiàn yòu fāngbiàn。
It is both economic and convenient to cook rice with this stew-pot.
这个饭店有一道名厨主理的红烧鱼，特别好吃。
Zhège fàndiàn yǒu yídào míngchú zhǔlǐ de hóngshāoyú，tèbié hǎochī。
There is an especially delicious dish of fish braised in brown sauce, which is cooked by a skillful chef.
我们给去世的奶奶烧了些冥币，可她真的能够收到吗？
Wǒmen gěi qùshì de nǎinai shāo le xiē míngbì，kě tā zhēn de nénggòu shōudào ma？
We burned some mock coins for our dead grandma, but can she really get them?
清明节那天，我们给去世的爷爷烧了些冥衣。
Qīngmíngjié nàtiān，wǒmen gěi qùshì de yéye shāo le xiē míngyī。
On Tomb Sweeping Day, we burned some paper clothing for our grandfather that passed away.
他头痛发烧，吃了几回平熄内风的中药汤，很见效果。
Tā tóutòng fāshāo，chī le jǐ huí píngxī nèifēng de zhōng yàotāng，hěnjiàn xiàoguǒ。
He had a headache and a fever. After taking some traditional Chinese medicinal soup several times, which is used to cure disease caused by pathological changes of internal organs, he is now better.
经过晾晒和烧制，这些泥坯将会变成美丽的花瓶。
Jīngguò liàngshài hé shāozhì，zhèxiē nípī jiāng huì biànchéng měilì de huāpíng。
After drying in the sun and baking, this molded pottery will be made into beautiful vases.
他说的话让我怒火中烧，至今也难以忘记。
Tā shuō de huà ràng wǒ nùhuǒ zhōng shāo，zhìjīn yě nányǐ wàngjì。
I was burning with rage at his words. I haven\'t forgotten them even now.
在陶瓷坯胎上画些图案，就可以烧出漂亮的花瓶啦！
Zài táocí pītāi shàng huà xiē tú\'àn，jiù kěyǐ shāochū piàoliàng de huāpíng la！
Draw some pictures on the enamelware mould and bake it, then a beautiful vase will appear.
一碗片儿汤加上个烧饼，这就是他的早饭啦。
Yì wǎn piànrtāng jiāshàng gè shāobǐng，zhè jiùshì tā de zǎofàn la。
A bowl of soup with flat pieces of dough cooked in it and a sesame seed cake is what he eats for breakfast.
他烧了一壶开水，准备给客人沏茶。
Tā shāo le yì hú kāishuǐ，zhǔnbèi gěi kèrén qīchá。
He started boiling water in a kettle to make tea for the guests.
你发烧时还是吃点清热的食品吧！
Nǐ fāshāo shí háishi chī diǎn qīngrè de shípǐn ba！
You’d better eat some heat-clearing foods as you have a fever.
昨天海关用燃烧弹销毁了一批毒品。
Zuótiān hǎiguān yòng ránshāodàn xiāohuǐ le yì pī dúpǐn。
Yesterday, customs destroyed a collection of drugs with incendiary bombs.
警方在爆炸现场发现了燃烧瓶的残骸。
Jǐngfāng zài bàozhà xiànchǎng fāxiàn le ránshāopíng de cánhái。
The police found debris from the Molotov cocktail at the site of the explosion.
我这两天一直发烧，而且嗓子眼疼。
Wǒ zhè liǎngtiān yì zhí fāshāo，érqiě sǎngzi yǎn téng。
These two days, I have had a fever and a throatache.
篝火要灭了，再添些烧柴吧。
Gōuhuǒ yào miè le，zài tiān xiē shāochái ba。
The bonfire is going to go out. Add some firewood.
如果这次考试能够顺利通过，我可真是烧高香了。
Rúguǒ zhècì kǎoshì nénggòu shùnlì tōngguò，wǒ kě zhēnshi shāogāoxiāng le。
If I pass this examination, I’ll thank God.
我午饭吃了十个肉馅的烧卖。
Wǒ wǔfàn chī le shí gè ròuxiàn de shāomai。
I ate ten shaomei with meat stuffing for lunch.
从颜色款式中可以看出，这件瓷器的烧制工艺十分高超。
Cóng yánsè kuǎnshì zhōng kěyǐ kànchū，zhèjiàn cíqì de shāozhì gōngyì shífēn gāochāo。
Judging from the color and style, this porcelain was fired with advanced skills.
做红烧肉时一定要炒糖色。
Zuò hóngshāoròu shí yídìng yào chǎo tángsè。
When cooking braised pork with soy sauce, it\'s better to add some sugar.
他在这次火灾中死里逃生，但是体表被大面积烧伤。
Tā zài zhècì huǒzāi zhōng sǐlǐ táoshēng，dànshì tǐbiǎo bèi dàmiànjī shāoshāng。
He had a narrow escape from the fire, but the surface of his skin was severely burned.
体温计显示你现在发烧四十度。
Tǐwēnjì xiǎnshì nǐ xiànzài fāshāo sìshí dù。
The thermometer shows that you are running a fever: your body temperature has reached 40°.
整整一夜，香案上的香烛都没有烧完。
Zhěngzhěng yíyè，xiāngàn shàng de xiāngzhú dōu méiyǒu shāowán。
The candles on the burner table didn\'t burn out after a whole night.
不完全燃烧的烟子也可以再循环利用。
Bùwánquán ránshāo de yānzǐ yě kěyǐ zài xúnhuán lìyòng。
The imperfectly combusted soot can be reused again.
赤壁之战，大火延烧了几天，敌军伤亡大半。
Chìbìzhīzhàn，dàhuǒ yánshāo le jǐtiān，díjūn shāngwáng dàbàn。
After the battle of Chibi a fire kept burning for days and killed a lot of the enemies.
蜡烛的焰心烧完了，你去开灯吧！
Làzhú de yànxīn shāowán le，nǐ qù kāidēng ba！
The candle\'s flame core has been used up, turn on the light, please!
一眨眼的功夫他就把烧鸡给吃光了。

He ate up the entire roast chicken in a short time.

The fuse has burned to the end, it\'s going to explode, let\'s get further away.
工匠们正在制作花瓶原坯，估计不久就能烧制了。

The craftsmen are making original moulds of the vases; it probably won\'t take long before they begin to bake them.
烛芯烧完，蜡烛也就不能用了。

在专差到来之前他们已经把文件都烧毁了。

They destroyed all the documents before the specially designated team arrived.
这个漂亮的茶壶是用紫砂烧制而成的。
Zhège piàoliàng de cháhú shì yòng zǐshā shāozhì érchéng de。
This beautiful teapot is made of purple clay.

Turn on the air-blower to make the fire bigger. It will be time for cooking soon.
这种混合物很易燃烧，甚至爆炸，属于危险品。
Zhèzhǒng hùnhéwù hěnyì ránshāo，shènzhì bàozhà，shǔyú wēixiǎnpǐn。
This mixture is dangerous, flammable and explosive.
小王一向懂得明哲保身，从不做引火烧身的事。
Xiǎo Wáng yí xiàng dǒngdé míngzhé bǎoshēn，cóng búzuò yǐnhuǒ shāoshēn de shì。
Xiao Wang always keeps himself out of harm by being discrete, he will never do anything that brings trouble on his own head.

The cloisonne technique is a special technique.

米饭烧焦了。

in flames
燃烧着
a fuse has blown
保险丝烧断了
to burn/raze sth to the ground
把某物烧成平地/夷为平地
to put the kettle on
烧水
to go up in smoke
[house etc+] 被烧光
to have {or} be running a temperature
发烧

yùhuǒ zhōng shāo

红烧肉
hóngshāo ròu
pork braised in brown sauce; red-cooked pork
这块猪肉肥瘦儿正合适，做红烧肉肯定好吃。
Zhèkuài zhūròu féishòur zhèng héshì，zuò hóngshāoròu kěndìng hǎochī。
This piece of pork is neither too lean nor too fat and can be braised in brown sauce to make a delicious dish.
他买了块后暸肉，肥瘦合宜，正好做红烧肉。
Tā mǎi le kuài hòuliàoròu，féishòu héyí，zhènghǎo zuò hóngshāoròu。
He bought a piece of haunch meat with neither too much fat nor muscle. It was suitable to cook bouilli.
做红烧肉时一定要炒糖色。
Zuò hóngshāoròu shí yídìng yào chǎo tángsè。
When cooking braised pork with soy sauce, it\'s better to add some sugar.
红烧牛肉
Hóngshāo niúròu
beef braised in soy sauce
红烧肉对我的口味。
The cook blackened the chicken breast.
Chúshī hóngshāole jī xiōngpú ròu。
厨师红烧了鸡胸脯肉。
红烧肉
hóngshāo ròu
pork braised in brown sauce; red-cooked pork
红烧蹄筋
hóngshāo tíjīn 
tendons stewed in soy sauce
这块猪肉肥瘦儿正合适，做红烧肉肯定好吃。
Zhèkuài zhūròu féishòur zhèng héshì，zuò hóngshāoròu kěndìng hǎochī。
This piece of pork is neither too lean nor too fat and can be braised in brown sauce to make a delicious dish.
他买了块后暸肉，肥瘦合宜，正好做红烧肉。
Tā mǎi le kuài hòuliàoròu，féishòu héyí，zhènghǎo zuò hóngshāoròu。
He bought a piece of haunch meat with neither too much fat nor muscle. It was suitable to cook bouilli.
宝宝很喜欢吃妈妈做的红烧快鱼。
Bǎobao hěnxǐhuan chī māma zuò de hóngshāokuàiyú。
The child likes his mother\'s stewed herring with brown sauce very much.
这个饭店有一道名厨主理的红烧鱼，特别好吃。
Zhège fàndiàn yǒu yídào míngchú zhǔlǐ de hóngshāoyú，tèbié hǎochī。
There is an especially delicious dish of fish braised in brown sauce, which is cooked by a skillful chef.
做红烧肉时一定要炒糖色。
Zuò hóngshāoròu shí yídìng yào chǎo tángsè。
When cooking braised pork with soy sauce, it\'s better to add some sugar.

一块烧红的煤
yí kuài shāohóng de méi
a live (or hot) coal
他锤打着烧红的铁片，看样子是在做一把刀。
Tā chuídǎ zhe shāohóng de tiěpiàn，kànyàngzi shì zài zuò yìbǎ dāo。
He was hammering an burning red iron sheet. It seems that he was making a knife.
实验室的蒸发皿已经被烧成红热状态了。
Shíyànshì de zhēngfāmǐn yǐjing bèi shāochéng hóngrè zhuàngtài le。
The evaporating dish in the lab has already been burned to hot heat.
他高烧烧到了40度，脸都发红了。
Tā gāoshāo shāo dào le sìshídù，liǎn dōu fāhóng le。
He got a temperature of 40 Celsius, his face was burning up.
红烧鲤鱼
炝锅以后再红烧。
红烧肉对我的口味。
红烧蹄筋。
连日发烧，脸色潮红。
The cook blackened the chicken breast.
Chúshī hóngshāole jī xiōngpú ròu。
厨师红烧了鸡胸脯肉。
This will be my first attempt at walking on burning coals.

这将是我第一次尝试在烧红的碳上行走。
To her annoyance a warm blush was steadily creeping into her cheeks.
Ràng tā nǎohuǒ de shì，tā liǎn jiá zhèng mànmàn biànhóng，hái yǒudiǎn fāshāo ne。
让她恼火的是，她脸颊正慢慢变红，还有点发烧呢。
The flare had burst behind her, lighting the whole area with its fiery red glow.
Lièhuǒ zài tā shēnhòu ránshāo，chìrè、 tōnghóng de huǒguāng zhàoliàngle zhěnggè Dìqū。
烈火在她身后燃烧，炽热、通红的火光照亮了整个地区。
发高烧
fā gāoshāo
have (or run) a high fever
他脑袋滚热，一定在发高烧。
Tā nǎodài gǔnrè，yídìngzài fā gāo shāo。
His forehead feels scalding hot; he must be running a very high fever.
他高烧烧到了40度，脸都发红了。
Tā gāoshāo shāo dào le sìshídù，liǎn dōu fāhóng le。
He got a temperature of 40 Celsius, his face was burning up.
高烧已经退下去了。
Gāoshāo yǐjīng tuì xiàqùle。
His temperature has already gone down.
你最好烧高香祈求这次考试能过。
Nǐ zuìhǎo shāogāoxiāng qíqiú zhècì kǎoshì néngguò。
You\'d better burn the best incense before the idol of a god, to pray that you can pass the examination.
如果这次考试能够顺利通过，我可真是烧高香了。
Rúguǒ zhècì kǎoshì nénggòu shùnlì tōngguò，wǒ kě zhēnshi shāogāoxiāng le。
If I pass this examination, I’ll thank God.
从颜色款式中可以看出，这件瓷器的烧制工艺十分高超。
Cóng yánsè kuǎnshì zhōng kěyǐ kànchū，zhèjiàn cíqì de shāozhì gōngyì shífēn gāochāo。
Judging from the color and style, this porcelain was fired with advanced skills.
发高烧还硬撑着上班
发高烧。
高烧不退。
高烧中，他绷着劲坚持把稿子写完了。
高烧消退。
高烧不退，病象凶险。
发高烧。
烧高香。
你要真肯出力相助，我给您烧高香啦
儿子能考上大学，我就烧高香啦。
a raging fever
骤起的高烧
He had a high temperature and a sore throat.
Tā fāzhe gāoshāo，hóulóng yě tòng。

孩子发烧，他连忙去请大夫。
Háizǐ fāshāo，tā liánmáng qù qǐng dàifū.

Yīn fāshāo，wǒ sìzhīwúlì。

危机重重
wēijī chóngchóng
bogged down in crisis; crisis-ridden
在这种危机重重的时候，向来聪明的他也只能装傻充愣。

Being bogged down in crises, he who was always very clever had no choice but to feign confusion over the current situation.

wēijī shēnzhòng

a grave illness
危急的重病

重大危险面前，很多人会退缩。

面临着越来越严重的能源危机，科学家们正在寻找新的能源。

There is serious risk of injury while operating that kind of heavy machinery.
操作那种笨重的机器要冒受伤的危险。

我上年纪了，还受过很严重的伤，做这种事情是很危险的。
It is important that you are alert to such dangers and call the police.
Nǐ yào duì nàxiē wēixiǎn bǎochí jǐngtì，suízhe zhǔnbèi bàojǐng，zhè fēicháng zhòngyào。
你要对那些危险保持警惕，随着准备报警，这非常重要。
采蜜工作具有一定的危险性，所以工作人员一定要经过专业的训练才行。
Cǎimì gōngzuò jùyǒu yídìng de wēixiǎnxìng，suǒyǐ gōngzuò rényuán yídìng yào jīngguò zhuānyè de xùnliàn cáixíng。
The risks involve in gathering honey require professional training.
民警的反扒工作既辛苦又有一定的危险性。
Mínjǐng de fǎnpá gōngzuò jì xīnkǔ yòu yǒu yídìng de wēixiǎnxìng。
The police\'s actions against thieves are both difficult and risky.
听说守墓人的生活不仅清苦寂寞，而且有一定的危险性。
Tīngshuō shǒumù rén de shēnghuó bùjǐn qīngkǔ jìmò，érqiě yǒu yídìng de wēixiǎnxìng。

zhōuqīxìngjīngjì wēijī

chǔjìng wēixiǎn 
be in a dangerous (or precarious) situation; be in peril

wēixiǎn dìdài 
a danger zone
