你不能边吃东西边喝水，这很危险。
You should see a doctor, attacks of asthma are quite dangerous.
你应该去看医生，哮喘病发作是很危险的。
They should do something for that bend, it\'s too dangerous.
那个转弯处太危险了，他们应该对此采取点儿措施。
Please walk at least 30 cm away from the edge, it is very dangerous.
请在离边缘至少30厘米的地方走，不然就太危险了。
It\'s dangerous to walk the back alley alone in the night.
夜晚独自走在僻静的小巷里是很危险的。
I have to back the car in the garage; it\'s dangerous to leave it outside.
我得把车倒进车库里去，把它停在外面太危险了。
I\'m old and I have a bad hurt, it\'s dangerous for me to do such things.
我上年纪了，还受过很严重的伤，做这种事情是很危险的。
Don\'t go there it\'s dangerous, a friend of mine was beaten black and blue there.
别去那儿，那儿很危险。我的一个朋友就是在那儿被打得遍体鳞伤的。
That exposed wire might be dangerous.
裸露的电线可能会有危险。
It\'s really dangerous motoring around at night.
夜间开着摩托车出行真的很危险。
There is serious risk of injury while operating that kind of heavy machinery.
操作那种笨重的机器要冒受伤的危险。
It is dangerous reading too much into the statistics.
过多偏信统计数据的行为是很危险的。
Smoking too much can run a risk of lung cancer.
吸烟过量有引发肺癌的危险。
Small amounts of wine are held to be good for slightly lowering  health risks of the heart.
人们认为少量饮葡萄酒会有助于减少患心脏病的危险。
The road was blanketed in fog; making it too dangerous to drive.
马路上大雾弥漫，驾车太危险了。
Forest fires, though dangerous, can actually be good for the environment because after the burn there is room for new growth.
森林火灾虽然危险，但对环境确实有好处，因为它会给新长出的植被腾出空间。
When she decided to escape from the country, she put herself in great danger.
决定要逃出这个国家时，她就已经将自己置于一个危险的境地了。
The hiking excursion might be a bit dangerous.
徒步旅行可能会有点儿危险。
I don\'t like sports because they seem to be dangerous.
体育运动看起来很危险，我不喜欢。

在动物园工作期间，我学到了很多有关危险动物的知识。
This situation might be dangerous.
这种情况可能会有危险。
He doesn\'t look like a dangerous person.
他看起来不像是个危险人物。
It\'s really dangerous to bike in Beijing because the traffic is awful.
在北京骑自行车非常危险，交通实在是太糟了。
There is a big break in the wall.It is really dangerous.
墙上裂了个大口子，真是太危险了！
Dry-cleaners deal with many hazardous chemicals.
干洗工要跟很多危险的化学品打交道。
a bit mad/dangerous
有点疯狂/危险
to be in the clear
无危险
there is a danger of/that...
有…的危险
&quot;danger!&quot;
“危险！”
to be in danger of doing sth
有…的危险
out of danger
[+patient] 脱离危险
it\'s dangerous to...
…是危险的
a man described by the police as extremely dangerous
一个被警察描述为极为危险的人
Their work is hard and dangerous.
他们的工作既费力又危险。
to be a hazard to sb
对某人构成危险
It looks difficult but at least it is not dangerous.
看起来很困难，但无论如何没有什么危险。
Your life is in danger.
你的生命处于危险之中。
the most dangerous substance known to man
人类所知的最危险的物质
more dangerous/difficult (than)
(比…)更危险/难
to be out of danger
脱离危险
to be plucked from danger
脱离危险
to run the risk of sth/doing sth
冒着某事/做某事的危险
at risk
处于危险
a danger to sb
对某人的危险

国际恐怖主义是整个世界潜在的严重危险。

危险物品会存放在一个专门仓库中。

检察官说这些危险的人物都不是在美国出生的。

许多人会在危险面前退缩，但我不会。

Tā chángcháng jiāng zìjǐ zhìyú jíqí wēixiǎn de jìngdì。
他常常将自己置于极其危险的境地。
Logic goes by the board in the face of danger.
Miànlín wēixiǎn， luójì bìng bù qǐ zuòyòng。
面临危险，逻辑并不起作用。
Efforts must be made to limit damage when things go wrong in the classroom.
Dāng jiàoshì chūxiàn wēixiǎn shí，wǒmen yào nǔlì bǎ sǔnshī jiàng dào zuìdī chéngdù。
当教室出现危险时，我们要努力把损失降到最低程度。
There are dangers to be guarded against.
Xūyào yùfáng yìxiē wēixiǎn。
需要预防一些危险。
The public has been in danger for two months.

公众处于危险之中已经两个月了。
If you\'re in danger, don\'t call me.

如果你有危险，别叫我。
They can be extremely dangerous，as well as lead people on to other crime .

他们可能会是极度危险的，同时还会诱骗人们去犯下其他罪行。
Rose risked life to find her only child.
Luósī màozhe shēngmìng wēixiǎn qù xúnzhǎo tā wéiyī de háizi。
罗斯冒着生命危险去寻找她唯一的孩子。
Living on cloud nine is intoxicating and precarious.

mínzú wēiwáng de shíkè 
when the nation\'s existence is in peril; when the fate of the nation hangs in the balance

fèngmìng yú wēinàn zhī jiān

be in dire peril

处境危险
chǔjìng wēixiǎn 
be in a dangerous (or precarious) situation; be in peril

Zhèxiē gōngyè fèiqìwù duì huánjìng de wēihài hěndà，yīngdāng tuǒshàn chǔlǐ。

超标排污危及生态环境。
A growing number of capital projects must now be in jeopardy.
Yuèláiyuèduō de zīběn xiàngmù zhèng chǔyú wēixiǎn jìngdì。
越来越多的资本项目正处于危险境地。
She was riding a tiger and there was no way of escape.
Tā zhèng chǔyú wēixiǎn jìngdì，méiyǒu bànfǎ táotuō。
她正处于危险境地，没有办法逃脱。
When she decided to escape from the country, she put herself in great danger.
决定要逃出这个国家时，她就已经将自己置于一个危险的境地了。
The investors were stuck in a dangerous situation.
Tóuzīzhě xiànrùle yì zhǒng wēixiǎn de jìngdì。
投资者陷入了一种危险的境地。
The organisation is in a dire position with many of its funding avenues blocked.
Zhège zǔzhī chǔjìng wēixiǎn，tā de xǔduō zījīn láiyuán dōu bèi zǔduàn le。
这个组织处境危险，它的许多资金来源都被阻断了。
Two of the burn victims were in a critical condition last night.
Liǎngmíng shāoshāng huànzhě zuótiān wǎnshàng chǔ yú fēicháng wēixiǎn de jìngkuàng。
两名烧伤患者昨天晚上处于非常危险的境况。
He often exposed himself to such great danger.
Tā chángcháng jiāng zìjǐ zhìyú jíqí wēixiǎn de jìngdì。
他常常将自己置于极其危险的境地。
The dangerous situation developed suddenly.
Wēixiǎn chǔjìng tūrán chūxiàn。
危险处境突然出现。
an unhealthy situation
危险的处境
The profits benefit a small minority, while the vast numbers of workers have no choice but to risk their lives in dangerous working conditions.
利润只归于一小撮人,大多数工人没有选择的余地,只能在危险的环境中拿生命作赌注。
Avoid getting into dangerous situations in the first place!
Shǒuxiān yào bìmiǎn jìnrù wēixiǎn de huánjìng！
首先要避免进入危险的环境！
Forest fires, though dangerous, can actually be good for the environment because after the burn there is room for new growth.
森林火灾虽然危险，但对环境确实有好处，因为它会给新长出的植被腾出空间。
The future of our wild birds and environment is under threat.
Yěshēngniǎolèi jí wǒmen de huánjìng jiāng jíjíkěwēi。
野生鸟类及我们的环境将岌岌可危。
an escape hatch
(危急时的)出口，应急出口；(摆脱困境等的)出路；(解决困难等的)办法
在那危急的时刻，他还保持着安详的神态。
Zài nà wēijí de shíkè，tā hái bǎochí zhe ānxiáng de shéntài。
At the critical juncture, he still kept his composure.
在这千钧一发、万分危急的时候，援军到了。
Zài zhè qiānjūnyífà、wànfēn wēijí de shíhou，yuánjūn dào le。
In this moment of extreme crisis when everything was hanging by a single thread, the relief troops arrived.
情势危急。
Qíngshì wēijí。
The situation is critical.
危急关头
wēijí ɡuāntóu 
critical juncture (or time, moment)
情况十分危急。
Qíngkuàngshífēn wēijí。
The situation is desperate.
伤势危急。
Shānɡshì wēijí。 
The wound may be fatal.
不能在危急关卡疾速奔跑，你的身体会受不了的。
Bùnéng zài wēijí guānqiǎ jísù bēnpǎo，nǐ de shēntǐ huì shòubuliǎo de。
Don\'t run too fast at critical moments, your body won\'t be able to stand it.
情况危急
qíngkuàng wēijí
desperate situation
这支救护队总是在最危难的时候急难而进。
Zhèzhī jiùhùduì zǒngshì zài zuì wēinàn de shíhou jínán ér jìn。
This rescue team always comes to people\'s help at the most urgent times.
危急。
扶危急难。
病情危急。
危急的时刻。
急救危重病人。
a critical situation in international relations
国际关系中的危急局面
an escape hatch
(危急时的)出口，应急出口；(摆脱困境等的)出路；(解决困难等的)办法
a grave illness
危急的重病
We didn\'t realize how dangerous the situation was.
我们没有意识到情况有多么危急。
The captain remained in the boat until the last fatal moment.
这名船长在最后的危急时刻仍然留在船上。
when the chips are down
[inf] 当危急关头
in a critical condition
情况危急
According to the doctor my situation had become critical.
Jù yīshēng shuō，wǒ de qíngkuàng yǐjīng biàn de hěn wēijí le。
据医生说，我的情况已经变得很危急了。
The man replied, holding out his arms to signify the extent of the situation.
Nánzǐ huídá wán，liàngchū tā de wǔqì biǎomíng qíngkuàng hěn wēijí。
男子回答完，亮出他的武器表明情况很危急。
Things really came to a head about a month ago.
Yuē yí gè yuè qián， shìqing jiù zhēn de bīnlín wēijí guāntóu le。
约一个月前，事情就真地濒临危急关头了。
Paul had a heart attack and is still on the danger list.
Bǎoluó xīnzàngbìng fāzuò，xiànzài réngrán bìngshì wēijí。
保罗心脏病发作，现在仍然病势危急。
Acute illness is the most dangerous because it can come without any warning.
Jíxìngbìng shì zuì wēixiǎn de，yīnwèi zhèzhǒng bìng lái shí háowú zhēngzhào。
急性病是最危险的，因为这种病来时毫无征兆。
He is calling an urgent meeting for immediate action on the public relations crisis.
他立即召开紧急会议应对公关危机。
An emergency council met to discuss methods to deal with the crisis.
Yígè jǐnjí wěiyuánhuì kāihuì tǎolùn yìngduì wēijī de fāngfǎ。
一个紧急委员会开会讨论应对危机的方法。
酒后开车危及他人生命。
Jiǔ hòu kāichē wēijí tā rén shēngmìng。
Drunk drivers endanger the lives of others.
随着计算机及因特网的普及，一种被称作“计算机综合征”的现代新生病越来越危及人们的健康。
Suí zhe jìsuànjī jí yīntèwǎng de pǔjí，yìzhǒng bèi chēngzuò“jìsuànjī zōnghézhēng”de xiàndài xīnshēngbìng yuèláiyuè wēijí rénmen de jiànkāng。
With the popularization of computers and the internet, a modern illness called &quot;computer syndrome&quot; is more and more of a threat to people\'s health.
个人主义思潮的盛行会危及集体利益。
Gèrénzhǔyì sīcháo de shèngxíng huì wēijí jítǐ lìyì。
Prevalence of individualism will jeopardize collective interests.
经济危机波及整个资本主义世界。
Jīngjì wēijī bōjí zhěnggè zīběnzhǔyì shìjiè。
The economic crisis affected the entire capitalist world.
心梗必须及时抢救，否则患者会有生命危险。
Xīngěng bìxū jíshí qiǎngjiù，fǒuzé huànzhě huì yǒu shēngmìng wēixiǎn。
Myocardial infarction must be treated immediately, otherwise the patient will die.
危及国家。
超标排污危及生态环境。

to put sb/sb\'s life in danger
危及某人/某人的生命
Home delivery of baby may endanger the mother\'s life.
不在医院分娩可能危及母亲的生命安全。
Driving at speed may be dangerous to other vehicles or pedestrians.
Gāosù xíngshǐ kěnéng huì wēijí qítā chēliàng hé xíngrén。
高速行驶可能会危及其它车辆和行人。
There is more at stake than your modesty.
Nàme wēixiǎn，jiù búyào gùjí miànzi le。
那么危险，就不要顾及面子了。
The future of our wild birds and environment is under threat.

The economic crisis affected the entire capitalist world.
财政危机
cáizhènɡ wēijī 
financial crisis
经济危机根源于资本主义制度。
Jīngjì wēijī gēnyuán yú zīběnzhǔyì zhìdù。
The economic crisis originated in the financial system.

ɡuójì shōuzhī wēijī
international payments crisis

wēijī shēnzhòng

wēijī chóngchóng

xìnyǎnɡ wēijī

zhōuqīxìngjīngjì wēijī 
periodic (or cyclical) economic crises
没想到在这个危机时刻得到了这笔钱，真是极处逢生呀！
Méi xiǎngdào zài zhège wēijī shíkè dédào le zhè bǐ qián，zhēnshì jíchù féngshēng ya！
It didn\'t occur to me that we could this money at this urgent moment. It\'s really like being rescued from a desperate situation!
他做事历练稳重，总能在危机关头随机应变，化险为夷。
Tā zuòshì lìliàn wěnzhòng，zǒng néng zài wēijī guāntóu suíjīyìngbiàn，huàxiǎnwéiyí。
He handles affairs neatly, maturely, and always plays to the score at critical moment to head off danger.
渠水的污染给当地居民带来了健康危机。
Qúshuǐ de wūrǎn gěi dāngdì jūmín dàilái le jiànkāng wēijī。
The health of local people is in crisis because of canal pollution.
物价腾跃是经济危机的表现之一。
Wùjià téngyuè shì jīngjì wēijī de biǎoxiàn zhīyī。

在那个危机时刻，一名解放军战士挺身而出。

At that critical moment, one soldier stepped forward bravely.
经济危机中，来银行挤兑的人一直有增无减。

During the economic crisis, the number of people making a run on the bank kept increasing.
在这种危机重重的时候，向来聪明的他也只能装傻充愣。
Zài zhèzhǒng wēijī chóngchóng de shíhou，xiàng lái cōngming de tā yě zhǐnéng zhuāngshǎ chōnglèng。
Being bogged down in crises, he who was always very clever had no choice but to feign confusion over the current situation.
面对亚洲金融危机，公司拿出了预案，并启动了自保计划。
Miànduì yàzhōu jīnróng wēijī，gōngsī ná chū le yùàn，bìng qǐdòng le zìbǎo jìhuà。
Faced with the Asian financial crisis, the company worked out a preliminary plan and initiated its self-protection scheme.
商品生产过剩会导致经济危机。
Shāngpǐn shēngchǎn guòshèng wǎngwǎng huì dǎozhì jīngjì wēijī。
Over-producing a commodity can lead to an economic crisis.
随着我国的不断从中转圜，核危机得以顺利解决。
Suízhe wǒguó de búduàn cóngzhōng zhuǎnhuán，héwēijī déyǐ shùnlì jiějué。
With our country\'s continuous mediation, the nuclear crisis was settled smoothly.
这个国家正处于经济危机的边缘。
Zhègeguójiā zhèngchǔyú jīngjìwēijīde biānyuán。
This country is on the verge of economic crisis.
新政府力图解决经济危机。
Xīnzhèngfǔ lìtú jiějué jīngjìwēijī.
The new government strove to solve the economic crisis.
我国法律明文规定，禁止携带危险品搭乘飞机。
Wǒguófǎlǜ míngwén guīdìng，jìnzhǐ xiédài wēixiǎnpin dāchéng fēijī。
The law in our country clearly states that dangerous objects are prohibited on planes.
这台机器有问题，快去告危。
Zhètái jīqì yǒu wèntí，kuàiqù gàowēi。
The machine doesn\'t function well, inform somebody of the problem soon.
这台病机不能使用，否则会出危险。
Zhètái bìngjī bùnéng shǐyòng，fǒuzé huì chū wēixiǎn。
This broken machine can not be used, otherwise danger could occur.

With the popularization of computers and the internet, a modern illness called &quot;computer syndrome&quot; is more and more of a threat to people\'s health.

董事会决定让安德鲁酌情处理这次危机。

由于经济危机，主要的出口市场持续恶化。
Due to the financial crisis, the government take stimulative measures to deliver economic growth.

由于经济危机，政府采取了刺激政策来挽救经济的增长。
The economic crisis was taking its toll in business.
Jīngjìwēijī zàochéng shāngyè sǔnshī。
经济危机造成商业损失。
He offers some desperate theories on the crisis.
Tā zhēnduì wēijī tíchūle yìxiē háowú xīwàng de lǐlùn。
他针对危机提出了一些毫无希望的理论。
Let us consider how some of these difficulties could be removed or controlled.
Zánmen kǎolǜ yíxià zěnyàng cáinéng jiěchú huò kòngzhì yìxiē wēijī。
咱们考虑一下怎样才能解除或控制一些危机。
They had always closed ranks in times of crisis.
Tāmen zài wēijī shíkè zǒngshì néng tuánjié yízhì。
他们在危机时刻总是能团结一致。
The six nations have agreed to form a coalition to resolve the crisis.
Zhè liù gè guójiā tóngyì jiéchéng Liánméng yǐ jiějué wēijī。
这六个国家同意结成联盟以解决危机。
They made a collective effort to address the crisis.
Tāmen gòngtóng nǔlì，yìngduì wēijī。
他们共同努力，应对危机。
The crisis forced him to make some political concessions to appease the masses.
Zhè cì wēijī pòshǐ tā zuòchū yìxiē zhèngzhì shàng de ràngbù lái ānfǔ dàzhòng。

Polls have shown that the public credit him for his leadership in the crisis.
Mínyì diàochá xiǎnshì，dàzhòng yīn tā zài wēijī zhōng xiǎnshì de lǐngdǎo nénglì ér zànyù tā。
民意调查显示，大众因他在危机中显示的领导能力而赞誉他。
They were unwilling to panic in the face of economic crisis.
Tāmen bú yuànyì zài miànduì jīngjì wēijī shí huángkǒng shīcuò。
他们不愿意在面对经济危机时惶恐失措。
The damage cannot be determined until after the crisis of the illness has passed.
Sǔnshī zhè cì jíbìng wēijī guòqù zhīhòu cáinéng quèdìng。
损失这次疾病危机过去之后才能确定。
The sense of crisis was heightened by dramatic closures in the airline industry.
Hángkōngyè xìjùxìng de guānbì jiājùle wēijīyìshí de tígāo。
航空业戏剧性的关闭加剧了危机意识的提高。
Britain is poised for a strong recovery after the economic crisis.
Yīngguó zhǔnbèi hǎo zài jīngjì wēijī zhīhòu yíngjiē yí gè qiángjìn huīfù。
英国准备好在经济危机之后迎接一个强劲恢复。
Most countries have been brought low by the financial crisis.
Jīnróng wēijī shǐ dà duō shù guójiā dōu biàn de pínkùn。
金融危机使大多数国家都变得贫困。
The economic crisis did many companies up.
Jīngjìwēijī tuōkuǎ le xǔduō gōngsī。
经济危机拖垮了许多公司。
It\'s an ill wind, but the economic crisis will teach people how to save money.
Shī cǐ dé bǐ， dàn jīngjì wēijī jiāng jiāohuì rénmen rúhé shěngqián。
失此得彼，但经济危机将教会人们如何省钱。
Experts were recalled from retirement to help with the crisis.
Tuìxiū de zhuānjiā yě bèi zhào huílái bāngmáng chǔlǐ zhè cì wēijī。
退休的专家也被召回来帮忙处理这次危机。
He cannot remain sitting on his hands in the face of an economic crisis.
Miànduì jīngjìwēijī，tā wúfǎ jìxù jùjué gōngzuò。
面对经济危机，他无法继续拒绝工作。
The economic crisis has everyone tightening their belts.
Jīngjì wēijī ràng měi gè rén dōu yào jiéjiǎn dùrì。
经济危机让每个人都要节俭度日。
Such a refusal would spark off a major constitutional crisis.

在这千钧一发、万分危急的时候，援军到了。
Zài zhè qiānjūnyífà、wànfēn wēijí de shíhou，yuánjūn dào le。
In this moment of extreme crisis when everything was hanging by a single thread, the relief troops arrived.
潜伏着的危机
qiánfú zhe de wēijī
a latent crisis
情势危急。
Qíngshì wēijí。
The situation is critical.
全然不顾个人安危
quánrán búgù gèrén ānwēi
give no thought to one\'s own safety
危机深重
wēijī shēnzhòng
be in the grip of a crisis
在马路上厮闹打逗是很危险的。
Zài mǎlù shàng sīnào dǎdòu shì hěn wēixiǎn de。
It is very dangerous to play in the street.
临危不惧，谈笑自若
Línwēibújù，tánxiàozìruò
talk and laugh imperturbably in face of danger
危险万状
wēixiǎn wànzhuàng
extremely dangerous
危崖
wēiyá 
a precipitous cliff
病势危殆
bìnɡshì wēidài 
be dangerously ill; be critically ill
危害国家主权和领土完整
wēihài guójiā zhǔquán hé lǐngtǔ wánzhěng
endanger the sovereignty and territorial integrity of the state
危害健康
wēihài jiànkānɡ 
be detrimental to health
危机重重
wēijī chóngchóng
bogged down in crisis; crisis-ridden
酒后开车危及他人生命。
Jiǔ hòu kāichē wēijí tā rén shēngmìng。
Drunk drivers endanger the lives of others.
危急关头
wēijí ɡuāntóu 
critical juncture (or time, moment)
情况十分危急。
Qíngkuàngshífēn wēijí。
The situation is desperate.
伤势危急。
Shānɡshì wēijí。 
The wound may be fatal.
处于危难之中
chǔyú wēinàn zhī zhōng 
be in dire peril
民族危亡的时刻
mínzú wēiwáng de shíkè 
when the nation\'s existence is in peril; when the fate of the nation hangs in the balance
冒生命危险
mào shēngmìngwēixiǎn 
at the risk of one\'s life
脱离危险
tuōlí wēixiǎn 
out of danger
有电，危险！
Yǒu diàn，wēixiǎn！
Danger! Electricity!
危险人物
wēixiǎn rénwù 
a dangerous person; a danger
危险信号
wēixiǎn xìnhào 
danger signal
危险工作津贴
wēixiǎn gōngzuò jīntiē 
danger money
这不是危言耸听，而是历史多次证明了的真理。
Zhè búshì wēiyánsǒngtīng，ér shì lìshǐ duō cì zhèngmíng le de zhēnlǐ。
This is not alarmist talk; it is a truth repeatedly borne out by history.
生命危在旦夕。
Shēnɡmìnɡ wēizàidànxī。 
Death is expected at any moment.
该城危在旦夕。
Gāi chénɡ wēizàidànxī。 
The city may fall at any moment.
信仰危机
xìnyǎnɡ wēijī
credibility crisis
异常危险
yìchánɡ wēixiǎn 
extremely dangerous
平静中隐伏着危险。
Píngjìng zhōng yǐnfú zhe wēixiǎn。
Danger lurked where all was quiet.
他这个人很危险，你最好远着他一点儿。
Tā zhège rén hěn wēixiǎn，nǐ zuìhǎo yuǎn zhe tā yìdiǎnr。
He is quite dangerous; you\'d better keep away from him.
局势中孕育着危险。
Júshì zhōng yùnyù zhe wēixiǎn。
The situation is pregnant with grim possibilities.
遭际艰危
zāojì jiānwēi
be confronted with difficulties and dangers
周期性经济危机
zhōuqīxìngjīngjì wēijī 
periodic (or cyclical) economic crises
装扮成朋友的敌人是最危险的。
Zhuāngbàn chéngpéngyou de dírén shì zuì wēixiǎn de。
The most dangerous enemy is one who disguises himself as a friend.
危殆
wēidài
in great danger; in jeopardy; in a critical condition
居安思危
jū\'ānsīwēi
think of danger in times of safety; be vigilant in peace time
危害
wēihài
harm; endanger; jeopardize
病危
bìngwēi
be critically ill; be terminally ill
危坐
wēizuò
sit bolt upright; sit properly
正襟危坐
zhèngjīnwēizuò
straighten one\'s clothes and sit properly
他俩是安危与共的好哥们儿。
Tā liǎ shì ānwēi yǔgòng de hǎo gēmenr。
They are the kind of friends who can share what they have, in both good and bad times.
这些不能降解的白色垃圾对环境造成危害很大。
Zhèxiē bùnéng jiàngjiě de báisè lājī duì huánjìng zàochéng wēihài hěndà。
Permanent white trash can do great damage to the environment.
真正的爱情是两个人在危难的时候相互傍依。
Zhēnzhèng de àiqíng shì liǎnggèrén zài wēinàn de shíhou xiānghù bàngyī。
True love means never giving up on each other in times of difficulties.
煤矿生产过程中可能出现的最大危险就是巷道崩坍。
Méikuàng shēngchǎnguòchéng zhōng kěnéng chūxiàn de zuì dà wēixiǎn jiùshì xiàng dào bēngtān。
The largest risk in coal mining is the collapse of the mine.
机动车应该主动避让老人和小孩，以免发生危险。
Jīdòngchē yīnggāi zhǔdòng bì ràng lǎorén hé xiǎohái，yǐmiǎn fāshēng wēixiǎn。
For their safety, cars should yield to the young and elderly.
这台病机不能使用，否则会出危险。
Zhètái bìngjī bùnéng shǐyòng，fǒuzé huì chū wēixiǎn。
This broken machine can not be used, otherwise danger could occur.
采蜜工作具有一定的危险性，所以工作人员一定要经过专业的训练才行。
Cǎimì gōngzuò jùyǒu yídìng de wēixiǎnxìng，suǒyǐ gōngzuò rényuán yídìng yào jīngguò zhuānyè de xùnliàn cáixíng。
The risks involve in gathering honey require professional training.
客车超员行驶是非常危险的。
Kèchē chāoyuán xíngshǐ shì fēicháng wēixiǎn de。
It\'s dangerous to overload a bus with passengers.
他现在来讨债简直就是趁人之危。
Tā xiànzài lái tǎozhài jiǎnzhí jiù shì chènrén zhī wēi.
If he asks you to pay back your debts right now, he wants to hit you when you\'re down.
尺蚓穿堤并非危言耸听，不注意细节也会酿大祸。
Chǐyǐn chuāndī bìngfēi wēiyánsǒngtīng，búzhùyì xìjié yě huì niàngdàhuò。
It is not alarmism to refer to the old saying &quot;that a little fish worm can damage a dyke&quot;.  Neglect of details may lead to catastrophe.
出阵迎敌就有战死沙场的危险。
Chūzhèn yíngdí jiù yǒu zhànsǐ shāchǎng de wēixiǎn。
You may die on the battlefield when fighting the enemy.
处女海的开发一定要慎重，否则会危害到海洋生物。
Chùnǚhǎi de kāifā yídìng yào shènzhòng，fǒuzé huì wēihài dào hǎiyáng shēngwù。
We must be prudent about the exploitation of the virgin ocean or it would endanger the halo bios.
黜退忠良，社稷危矣。
Chùtuì zhōngliáng,shèjì wēi yǐ.
We will endanger our country if we demote our most noble and talented citizens.
那几间危房倒坍了。
Nà jǐ jiān wēifáng dǎotān le。
These ramshackle buildings have fallen down.
连日暴雨使大水有漫过堤围的危险。
Liánrì bàoyǔ shǐ dàshuǐ yǒu mànguò dīwéi de wēixiǎn。
Continuous rainstorms might cause the flood to overflow the bank.
这座吊索桥，年久失修，非常危险。
Zhèzuò diàosuǒqiáo，niánjiǔ shīxiū，fēicháng wēixiǎn。
This suspension bridge is old and hasn\'t been repaired for a long time, so it is very dangerous.
那些地霸恶狗经常危害当地人民。
Nàxiē dìbà ègǒu jīngcháng wēihài dāngdì rénmín。
Those extremely vicious gangsters pose a great threat to the locals.
发动侵略战争的人，简直就是危害世界和平的反动派。
Fādòng qīnlüè zhànzhēng de rén，jiǎnzhí jiùshì wēihài shìjiè hépíng de fǎndòngpài。
Those who started the war of aggression are reactionaries who put the peace of the world in danger.
民警的反扒工作既辛苦又有一定的危险性。
Mínjǐng de fǎnpá gōngzuò jì xīnkǔ yòu yǒu yídìng de wēixiǎnxìng。
The police\'s actions against thieves are both difficult and risky.
他喜欢在公路上飞车，那样是很危险的。
Tā xǐhuan zài gōnglù shàng fēichē，nàyàng shì hěn wēixiǎn de。
He likes driving at top speed on the road, which is very dangerous.
这些工业废弃物对环境的危害很大，应当妥善处理。
Zhèxiē gōngyè fèiqìwù duì huánjìng de wēihài hěndà，yīngdāng tuǒshàn chǔlǐ。
We must deal with this industrial waste very carefully as it can cause great pollution to our environment.
这台机器有问题，快去告危。
Zhètái jīqì yǒu wèntí，kuàiqù gàowēi。
The machine doesn\'t function well, inform somebody of the problem soon.
这位心血管病病人告危。
Zhèwèi xīnxuèguǎnbìng bìngrén gàowēi。
This patient with cardiovascular disease is in danger.
病人还没有脱离危险，已经被送进观察室进行观察。
Bìngrén hái méiyǒu tuōlí wēixiǎn，yǐjing bèi sòngjìn guāncháshì jìnxíng guānchá。
The patient is still in danger and has been sent to the probationary ward for further observation.
史家龟鉴犹如一面镜子，使我们时刻居安思危。
Shǐjiā guījiàn yóurú yí miàn jìngzi，shǐ wǒmen shíkè jūānsīwēi。
Lessons of the past are held up as a mirror for the present and future, reminding us to always be prepared for danger in times of peace.
他有虎胆却没智慧，遇到危险也只管往前冲。
Tā yǒu hǔdǎn què méi zhìhuì，yùdào wēixiǎn yě zhǐguǎn wǎngqián chōng。
He is a man of dauntless courage, but he lacks wisdom. When confronted with danger, he just rushes forward.
这座山虎踞龙盘，危不可攀。
Zhèzuò shān hǔjù lóngpán，wēibùkěpān。
The mountain is too dangerous to climb, it is shaped like a crouching tiger and a hunkering dragon.
化学战的后果是很可怕的，危害很大。
Huàxuézhàn de hòuguǒ shì hěnkěpà de，wēihài hěndà。
The effects of chemical warfare are very terrible, causing great harm.
黄曲霉菌可能产生有毒的代谢物，从而危害人类身体健康。
Huángqǔméijūn kěnéng chǎnshēng yǒu dú de dàixièwù，cóngér wēihài rénlèi shēntǐjiànkāng。
Aflatoxin may produce poisonous metabolizing substances, and do harm to human\'s health.
别看是死火山，站在火山口也是很危险的。
Biékàn shì sǐhuǒshān，zhànzài huǒshānkǒu yěshì hěnwēixiǎn de。
Standing on a volcanic crater, even that of an extinct volcano, is very dangerous.
由于多年的战乱，这个国家的政权已经岌岌可危了。
Yóuyú duōnián de zhànluàn，zhège guójiā de zhèngquán yǐjing jíjí kěwēi le。
The political power of this country is threatened after many years of war.
没想到在这个危机时刻得到了这笔钱，真是极处逢生呀！
Méi xiǎngdào zài zhège wēijī shíkè dédào le zhè bǐ qián，zhēnshì jíchù féngshēng ya！
It didn\'t occur to me that we could this money at this urgent moment. It\'s really like being rescued from a desperate situation!
树木被大片砍伐动物生存亟亟可危，人们无家可归。
Shùmù bèi dàpiàn kǎnfá dòngwù shēngcún jíjí kěwēi，rénmen wújiā kěguī。
Trees are being felled on a large scale, animals are facing immediate extinction and people are losing their homes.
这支救护队总是在最危难的时候急难而进。
Zhèzhī jiùhùduì zǒngshì zài zuì wēinàn de shíhou jínán ér jìn。
This rescue team always comes to people\'s help at the most urgent times.
疾风劲草，越是危难时刻，我们越需要坚强。
Jífēng jìncǎo，yuè shì wēinàn shíkè，wǒmen yuè xūyào jiānqiáng。
The strength of character is tested in a crisis. The more difficult the situation is, the more brave we should be.
不能在危急关卡疾速奔跑，你的身体会受不了的。
Bùnéng zài wēijí guānqiǎ jísù bēnpǎo，nǐ de shēntǐ huì shòubuliǎo de。
Don\'t run too fast at critical moments, your body won\'t be able to stand it.
随着计算机及因特网的普及，一种被称作“计算机综合征”的现代新生病越来越危及人们的健康。
Suí zhe jìsuànjī jí yīntèwǎng de pǔjí，yìzhǒng bèi chēngzuò“jìsuànjī zōnghézhēng”de xiàndài xīnshēngbìng yuèláiyuè wēijí rénmen de jiànkāng。
With the popularization of computers and the internet, a modern illness called &quot;computer syndrome&quot; is more and more of a threat to people\'s health.
王先生一生济困扶危，不求名，不图利。
Wáng xiānshēng yìshēng jìkùn fúwēi，bùqiú míng，bùtú lì。
All his life, Mr. Wang helped those in trouble, and  never pursued fame or money.
乱吃减肥药对人体的危害很大。
Luànchī jiǎnféiyào duì réntǐ de wēihài hěndà。
Taking obesity drugs without prescription is harmful to one\'s body.
这些淫秽读物危害青少年身心健康，必须禁绝！
Zhèxiē yínhuì dúwù wēihài qīngshàonián shēnxīn jiànkāng，bìxū jìnjué！
Pornography has a bad influence on young people, and we have to ban it completely.
他能够在国家危难之时挺身而出、匡时济世，实在是不可多得的人才。
Tā nénggòu zài guójiā wēinán zhī shí tǐngshēn ér chū、kuāngshí jìshì，shízai shì bùkě duōdé de réncái。
He came out boldly to assist the society when the country was in danger. He is a real hero.
漓漓蛄是一种对庄稼有危害的虫子。
Lílígū shì yìzhǒng duì zhuāngjià yǒu wēihài de chóngzi。
Mole crickets are harmful to crops.
他做事历练稳重，总能在危机关头随机应变，化险为夷。
Tā zuòshì lìliàn wěnzhòng，zǒng néng zài wēijī guāntóu suíjīyìngbiàn，huàxiǎnwéiyí。
He handles affairs neatly, maturely, and always plays to the score at critical moment to head off danger.
他最终决定临危受命，走马上任。
Tā zuì zhōng juédìng línwēi shòumìng，zǒumǎ shàngrèn。
He finally decided to receive orders in the face of danger, and took office quickly.
露天矿的采集危险相对较小。
Lòutiānkuàng de cǎijí wēixiǎn xiāngduì jiàoxiǎo。
Opencast mining is relatively safer.
这个楼的落水管随时都有脱落的危险。
Zhège lóu de luòshuǐguǎn suíshí dōu yǒu tuōluò de wēixiǎn。
The downpipe of this building could fall off at any time.
胎头娩出会有危险，一定要做好保护孕妇工作。
Tāitóu miǎnchū huì yǒu wēixiǎn，yídìng yào zuòhǎo bǎohù yùnfù gōngzuò。
It will be dangerous when the head of the fetus goes out of the mother’s body, so we should protect the pregnant woman.
渠水的污染给当地居民带来了健康危机。
Qúshuǐ de wūrǎn gěi dāngdì jūmín dàilái le jiànkāng wēijī。
The health of local people is in crisis because of canal pollution.
汽车差一点就翻入了深涧，太危险了！
Qìchē chàyìdiǎn jiù fānrù le shēnjiàn，tài wēixiǎn le ！
It was so dangerous, the car nearly turned over in the gully!
听说守墓人的生活不仅清苦寂寞，而且有一定的危险性。
Tīngshuō shǒumù rén de shēnghuó bùjǐn qīngkǔ jìmò，érqiě yǒu yídìng de wēixiǎnxìng。
I heard that a grave-keeper\'s life is not only poor and lonely, but also a bit dangerous.
水网藻对于养鱼业来说危害极大。
Shuǐwǎngzǎo duìyú yǎngyúyè láishuō wēihài jídà。
The hydrodictyaceae is extremely harmful to the fishing industry.
对于那些做有生命危险的工作的人来说，上一份死亡保险是对家属的一种安慰。
Duìyú nàxiē zuò yǒu shēngmìng wēixiǎn de gōngzuò de rén láishuō，shàng yífèn sǐwáng bǎoxiǎn shì duì jiāshǔ de yìzhǒng ānwèi。
As for those people who risk their lives at work, life insurance is a comfort for their relatives.
物价腾跃是经济危机的表现之一。
Wùjià téngyuè shì jīngjì wēijī de biǎoxiàn zhīyī。
The steep rise in prices is one manifestation of an economic crisis.
在那个危机时刻，一名解放军战士挺身而出。
Zài nàge wēijī shíkè，yì míng jiěfàngjūn zhànshì tǐngshēn ér chū。
At that critical moment, one soldier stepped forward bravely.
危城因为有很高的城墙，一般比较难攻。
Wēichéng yīnwèi yǒu hěngāo de chéngqiáng，yìbān bǐjiào nángōng。
Cities with high walls are often hard to conquer.
由于四面受敌，这里俨然成了一座危城。
Yóuyú sìmiàn shòudí，zhèlǐ yǎnrán chéng le yízuò wēichéng。
Embattled on all sides, it has really become a city in danger.
汤姆的情况非常危险，医生正在抢救。
Tāngmǔ de qíngkuàng fēicháng wēixiǎn，yīshēng zhèngzài qiǎngjiù。
Tom\'s condition is very bad, the doctors are trying their best to save him.
人的求生本能会在身处危情时爆发。
Rén de qiúshēng běnnéng huì zài shēnchǔ wēiqíng shí bàofā。
Man\'s instinct for life will burst out in dangerous situations.
医生正在采取有效措施防止发生危象。
Yīshēng zhèngzài cǎiqǔ yǒuxiào cuòshī fángzhǐ fāshēng wēi xiàng。
The doctors are taking effective measures to prevent medical crises.
乌鲗遇到危险的时候会喷出黑色液体。
Wūzéi yùdào wēixiǎn de shíhou huì pēnchū hēisè yètǐ。
The cuttlefish spurts out dark ink when it is in danger.
每次碰到危险，他都会习惯性地发抖。
Měi cì pèngdào wēixiǎn，tā dōuhuì xíguànxìng de fādǒu。
It is his habit to shiver whenever he is in danger.
小王总是临危不惧，哪怕身处险地也毫不惊慌。
Xiǎo Wáng zǒngshì línwēibújù，nǎ pà shēnchǔ xiǎndì yě háobùjīnghuāng。
Xiao Wang is always fearless and never panics even when in danger.
心梗必须及时抢救，否则患者会有生命危险。
Xīngěng bìxū jíshí qiǎngjiù，fǒuzé huànzhě huì yǒu shēngmìng wēixiǎn。
Myocardial infarction must be treated immediately, otherwise the patient will die.
宣传车上都是吸毒危害身体的照片，很有教育意义。
Xuānchuánchē shàng dōushì xīdú wēihài shēntǐ de zhàopiàn，hěn yǒu jiàoyù yìyì。
The publicity vehicle is quite inspiring, with photos on the theme: smoking harms your health.
驯兽员的工作很危险，不是你想得那么简单。
Xùnshòuyuán de gōngzuò hěn wēixiǎn，búshì nǐ xiǎng de nàme jiǎndān。
Being an animal trainer is extremely dangerous. It\'s not as easy as you think.
为了国家的安危，一个人殉节又算什么。
Wèile guójiā de ānwēi，yígè rén xùnjié yòu suàn shénme。
Death isn\'t frightening at all if it is for the purpose of protecting the country.
经济危机中，来银行挤兑的人一直有增无减。

Tā kuàiyào cóng biānshàng diàoxiàláile，hěn wēixiǎn。
他快要从边上掉下来了，很危险。
He was blissfully unaware of the danger.
Tā tài xìngfú le，méiyǒu yìshídào wēixiǎn。
他太幸福了，没有意识到危险。
He is potentially dangerous.
Tā shì yí gè qiánzài de wēixiǎn rénwù。
他是一个潜在的危险人物。
The leakiness of the boat made it dangerous to use.
Zhè tiáo chuán lòushuǐle，xíngshǐ qǐlái hěn wēixiǎn。
这条船漏水了，行驶起来很危险。
The spruce bark beetle is the major tree-killing insect pest of Alaska spruce forests.
Yúnshānshùpíjiǎchóng shì ālāsījiāyúnshānshùlín zhōng wēihài shùmù de zhǔyào hàichóng。
云杉树皮甲虫是阿拉斯加云杉树林中危害树木的主要害虫。
The thawed ice was treacherous.
Jiědòng de bīng fēicháng wēixiǎn，hěn róngyì cǎikōng。
解冻的冰非常危险，很容易踩空。
The drawn draperies kept direct sunlight from fading the rug.
Lāshàng de wéizhàng yǐ bìmiǎn dìtǎn yīn tàiyáng zhíjiē zhàoshè ér tuìsè de wēixiǎn。
拉上的帷帐以避免地毯因太阳直接照射而褪色的危险。
A leeward tide is dangerous for small boats.
Shùnfēngcháo duì xiǎo chuán láishuō shì wēixiǎn de。
顺风潮对小船来说是危险的。
Accession to such demands would set a dangerous precedent.
Jiēshòu zhèyàng de yāoqiú jiāng kāiqǐ yí gè wēixiǎn de xiānlì。
接受这样的要求将开启一个危险的先例。
Alerting was indicated by the desynchronization of the EEG.
Nǎodiàntú shàng xiǎnshì de shītiáo jiéguǒ shì yzhǒng wēixiǎn xìnhào。

Fángfàn wēixiǎn shì tā de zérèn。
防范危险是他的责任。
Indulgent parents risk spoiling their children.
Jiāoguàn zǐnǚ de fùmǔ huì yǒu chǒnghuài háizi de wēixiǎn。

The index peaked at 32,500 before the crisis hit.

out of danger

mào shēngmìngwēixiǎn

Lessons of the past are held up as a mirror for the present and future, reminding us to always be prepared for danger in times of peace.

凡是他要的东西他都有本领弄到手。
Fánshì tā yào de dōngxi tā dōu yǒu běnlǐng nòng dào shǒu。
He is resourceful enough to get whatever he is after.
凡是正义的事业都是不可战胜的。
Fánshì zhèngyì de shìyè dōushì bùkězhànshèng de。
A just cause is invincible.
凡是认识他的人，没有不称赞他的。
Fánshì rènshi tā de rén，méiyǒu bùchēngzàn tā de。
All who know him speak highly of him.
凡是动物都有对外界的刺激发生比较灵敏的感应的特性。
Fánshì dòngwù dōu yǒu duì wàijiè de cìjī fāshēng bǐjiào língmǐn de gǎnyìng de tèxìng。
Reaction to strong stimuli from the outside world is a characteristic of all animals.
凡是条件许可的地方
fánshì tiáojiàn xǔkě de dìfāng
wherever conditions permit
宝宝的好奇心很强，凡是她不懂的事，她总要盘根问底。
Bǎobao de hàoqíxīn hěnqiáng，fánshì tā bùdǒng de shì，tā zǒngyào pángēn wèndǐ。
The baby shows strong curiosity, she likes to find out the ins and outs of everything she can\'t understand.
凡是50岁以上的都一刀切地被辞退了。
Fánshì wǔshísuì yǐshàng de dōu yìdāoqiē de bèi cítuì le。
People over fifty are dismissed, without exception.
凡是去过大连的人都说那儿好。
Fánshì qùguò Dàliánde rén dōushuō nàr hǎo。
Everyone who\'s been to Dalian says it\'s lovely.
凡是没洗干净的杯子都要放这儿。
Fánshì méixǐgānjìngde bēizǐ dōuyào fàngzhèr。
Any glasses that have not been washed properly should be put here.
是凡与他共过事的人，都知道他的工作态度很严谨。
Shì fán yǔ tā gòngguòshì de rén，dōu zhīdào tā de gōngzuò tàidu hěnyánjǐn。
People who have worked with him all know that he is very precise in his work.
他不过是个凡俗之辈，所以才写出如此俗套的作品来。
tā bú guò shì gè fánsú zhī bèi，suǒyǐ cái xiě chū rúcǐ sútào de zuòpǐn lái。
He is just an ordinary man and can only write a conventional book.
她可真是个超凡拔俗的才女呀。
Tā kě zhēnshì gè chāofán bású de cáinǚ ya。
She is a rare genius.
一眼就能看出来他是个超凡脱俗的人。
Yìyǎn jiùnéng kànchūlái tā shì gè chāofán tuōsú de rén。
One sight of him can tell that he is a man free from vulgarity.
他是一个平凡的人，并无俊伟之才。
Tā shì yígè píngfán de rén，bìng wú jùnwěi zhī cái。
He is a common person, with no distinguished talent.
他从小就文笔特好，长大以后更是下笔如有神，人们都说他是魁星下凡。
Tā cóng xiǎo jiù wénbǐ tè hǎo，zhǎngdà yǐhòu gèng shì xiàbǐ rú yǒushén，rénmen dōu shuō tā shì kuíxīng xiàfán。
He was of eminent literary talent when he was young. After growing up, he wrote as if with a magic pen. People say that he is a god on earth who governs literature and writing.
她是位丰姿不凡的女人。
Tā shì wèi fēngzī bùfán de nǚrén。
She is an elegant woman.
他是华胄，所以气质不凡。
Tā shì huázhòu，suǒyǐ qìzhì bùfán。
He was the offspring of a famed and noble family, thus he had outstanding qualities.
他是个事无巨细的人，凡事都要亲自处理。
Tā shì gè shì wú jùxì de rén，fánshì dōuyào qīnzì chǔlǐ。
He attends to everything by himself, important or not.
他发凡举要地给我们讲了什么是公益事业。
tā fāfán jǔyào de gěi wǒmen jiǎng le shénme shì gōngyì shìyè。
He introduced to us the main ideas of social benefits.
不愧是这方面的专家，出口不凡啊！
Búkuì shì zhèfāngmiàn de zhuānjiā，chūkǒu bùfán a！
Experts are experts! How extraordinary your opinion is!
她那件凡尔丁的外套，虽然有几分旧了，但还是很漂亮。
Tā nà jiàn fán\'ěrdīng de wàitào，suīrán yǒu jǐ fēn jiù le，dàn háishi hěn piàoliang。
Her old valetin coat still looks good.
这道菜的食料都是普通常见的东西，但经名厨做出，就显得不同凡响了。
Zhè dào cài de shíliào dōushì pǔtōng chángjiàn de dōngxi，dàn jīng míngchú zuòchū，jiù xiǎnde bùtóng fánxiǎng le。
The ingredients of this dish are ordinary foodstuffs, but it is wonderful in the hand of a renowned cook.
凡是验收不合格的，都要补课。
凡是应该做的，都要努力去做
凡是有利的条件，尽量加以利用。
凡是冤、假、错案一律都要平反。
是凡认识他的人，都佩服他能吃苦。
自称雅人的人，其实不过是凡夫俗子。
他是个勤快人，但凡能动，他就不闲着
That which is mortal is not immortal.
凡是会死的就不是永生的。
to reject proposals wholesale
凡是建议一概予以拒绝

凡是那些能获得我们船主信任的人，我对他们总是极尊重的。
Reaction to strong stimuli from the outside world is a characteristic of all animals.
凡是动物都有对外界刺激有比较灵敏感应的特性。
I can take whatever road I decide on.
Fánshì zìjǐ xuǎnzé de lù，wǒ dōuhuì yìwúfǎngù de zǒu xiàqù。
凡是自己选择的路，我都会义无反顾地走下去。
Van is a city in eastern Turkey on the shores of Lake Van.
Fán chéng shì Tǔ\'ěrqí dōngbù de yí gè chéngshì，zài fán húbiān shàng。
凡城是土耳其东部的一个城市，在凡湖边上。
What is certain is that every effect must have a cause.
Nénggòu quèdìng de shì fánshì bì yǒu yīn。
能够确定的是凡事必有因。
Such poise is singular in one so young.
Duìyú zhème xiǎo de niánlíng láishuō rúcǐ de zhèndìnggǎn shì fēifán de。
对于这么小的年龄来说如此的镇定感是非凡的。
Your execution Beethovan\'s Fifth is phenomenal.
你演奏的贝多芬第五交响曲真是不同凡响。
The unearthing of &quot;Peking Man&quot; was a remarkable discovery.
“北京人”的出土是个非凡的发现。
They really believed that the treaty of Versailles was iniquitously injust.

I celebrate your ability to deal with the problem we have been facing lately.
你在处理我们最近遇到的问题时表现出了超凡的才干，我很是钦佩。
Lawson\'s late wife, the beautiful Vanessa Salmon, was his cousin.
Láosēn gāng guò shì de lǎopo，měilì de Fánnīshā·Shā\'ěrmàn shì tā de biǎomèi。

Artists are terribly difficult people for us ordinary mortals to deal with.

对我们凡人而言，艺术家是难以相处和沟通的人。
Besides, she was no more than a moderately good workwoman.
而且她只不过是一个手艺平凡的工人。
We have a tendency to look to mortal beings for security.

那是典型的英国人作风，凡事必准时。

Zài 19 shìjì，fán tídào nǚxìng qíngyù jiù huì bèishìwéi shì bēibǐ de zhòngshāng。

He was an unambitious man destined for a commonplace job.
Tā shì yí gè méiyǒu yěxīn de rén，zhùdìng yào zhǎo yí gè píngfán de gōngzuò。
他是一个没有野心的人，注定要找一个平凡的工作。
凡事应该用脑筋好好想一想。
Fán shì yīnggāi yòng nǎojīn hǎohǎo xiǎngyixiǎng。
We should always use our brains and think everything over carefully.
他现在如履春冰，凡事都很小心。
Tā xiànzài rúlǚ chūnbīng，fánshì dōu hěnxiǎoxīn。
He deals with everything carefully.
他是个事无巨细的人，凡事都要亲自处理。
Tā shì gè shì wú jùxì de rén，fánshì dōuyào qīnzì chǔlǐ。
He attends to everything by himself, important or not.
眼下局势杌陧，请你凡事务必小心。
Yǎnxià júshì wùniè,qǐng nǐ fánshì wùbì xiǎoxīn.
Now the situation is unstable, you take care of yourself.
凡事须量力而行。
Fánshì xū liànglì\'érxíng.
In all matters one should act according to one\'s abilities.
大凡一件事的性质由“消遣的”而变为“义务的”，便觉得兴味索然。

Any pastime which is converted into an obligation loses its taste.
小时候，我特别喜欢看木偶片《阿凡提的故事》。
Xiǎoshíhou，wǒ tèbié xǐhuan kàn mù\'ǒupiān《Āfántí de gùshì》。

Her plumpness and elegance made her a beauty in the Tang dynasty.
这块肥腴的土地，孕育着庄稼人的希望！
Zhèkuài féiyú de tǔdì，yùnyù zhe zhuāngjiàrén de xīwàng！
This fertile land bears the hopes of the farmers.
有了这条灌溉渠，我们再也不用为庄稼的浇灌发愁了。
Yǒu le zhètiáo guàngàiqú，wǒmen zài yě búyòng wèi zhuāngjià de jiāoguàn fāchóu le。
With this irrigation ditch, we don\'t have to worry about irrigating the crops any more.
锅庄是藏族的一种舞蹈。
Guōzhuāng shì zàngzú de yìzhǒng wǔdǎo。
Guozhuang (during festivals or slack farm season, Tibetan men and women form a circle and move from right to left while singing and dancing) is a Tibetan folk dance.
旱魔使这个村庄损失惨重。
Hànmó shǐ zhège cūnzhuāng sǔnshī cǎnzhòng。
The severe drought caused heavy losses to the village.
这是一片河漫滩，村里没有人敢在这里种庄稼。
Zhè shì yípiàn hémàntān，cūn lǐ méiyǒu rén gǎnzài zhèlǐ zhòng zhuāngjià。
This is an alluvial flat where no villager dares to plant crops.
他这几天一直在地里为庄稼还田。
Tā zhè jǐtiān yìzhízàidì lǐ wèi zhuāngjià huántián。
He has been working in the field, top dressing crop-stalk made fertilizers to the crop.
封建社会贫民是被禁止进入皇庄的。
Fēngjiàn shèhuì pínmín shì bèi jìnzhǐ jìnrù huángzhuāng de。
In feudal society poor people were forbidden to enter the imperial country estate.
这个农庄中养了许多步伐矫健的黄骠马。
Zhège nóngzhuāng zhōng yǎng le xǔduō bùfá jiǎojiàn de huángbiāomǎ。
The farm has raised a number of strong, and vigorous white-spotted- yellow horses.
今年收成不好，是因为庄稼受到了蝗害。
Jīnnián shōuchéng bùhǎo，shì yīnwèi zhuāngjià shòudào le huánghài。
This year, the harvest is not good because the crop has suffered a plague of locusts.
在耕种时一定要用活土层，这样庄稼才更易成活。
Zài gēngzhòng shí yídìng yào yòng huótǔcéng，zhèyàng zhuāngjià cái gèng yì chénghuó。
Crops are more likely to survive if we plant them in loose soil.
洪水激剧上涨，淹没了附近的村庄。
Hóngshuǐ jījù shàngzhǎng，yānmò le fùjìn de cūnzhuāng。
The flood rapidly rose, submerging the neighboring villages.
改革开放后，这个村庄旧貌换新颜。
Gǎigé kāifàng hòu，zhège cūnzhuāng jiùmào huàn xīnyán。
After reform and opening up, this village totally changed.
因为遭遇百年不遇的大旱，庄稼几乎全部绝产。
Yīnwéi zāoyù bǎinián búyù de dàhàn，zhuāngjià jīhū quánbùjuéchǎn。
Because of a drought the like of which is not seen in a hundred years, there was almost a total crop failure.
他家姓孙，在高家庄属于客姓。
Tā jiā xìng sūn，zài gāojiāzhuāng shǔyú kèxìng。
The surname of his family is Sun, a non-native one in Gaojiazhuang.
这场苦雨下得我们所有的庄稼都被淹了！
Zhèchǎng kǔyǔ xià de wǒmen suǒyǒu de zhuāngjià dōu bèi yān le！
The incessant rain drowned all of our crops.
漓漓蛄是一种对庄稼有危害的虫子。
Lílígū shì yìzhǒng duì zhuāngjià yǒu wēihài de chóngzi。
Mole crickets are harmful to crops.
他们的地刚上过栏肥，种出来的庄稼格外壮实。
Tāmen de dì gāng shàngguò lánféi，zhòng chūlái de zhuāngjià géwài zhuàngshí。
They have spread barnyard manure, so the crops are especially hardy.
连耞虽然平时不常使用，但在打碾庄稼的时节，谁家也离不开它。
Liánjiā suīrán píngshí bùcháng shǐyòng，dànzài dǎniǎn zhuāngjià de shíjié，shéi jiā yě líbùkāi tā。
The flail is often not used today, but in the past it was indispensable for grinding crops.
我们把灵寝装饰得庄严肃穆。
Wǒmen bǎ língqǐn zhuāngshì de zhuāngyán sùmù。
We decorated the seat of the bier awfully and solemnly.
看着农田的庄稼露苗，他欣慰极了。
Kàn zhe nóngtián de zhuāngjià lòumiáo，tā xīnwèi jí le。
He is satisfied to see the sprouting of the crops.
忙月的时候我们需要大量的劳动力来收割庄稼。
Mángyuè de shíhou wǒmen xūyào dàliàng de láodònglì lái shōugē zhuāngjià。
In busy months, we need a large labour force to reap the harvest.
久居城市的人们都喜欢体验一下农庄生活。
Jiǔjū chéngshì de rénmen dōu xǐhuan tǐyàn yíxià nóngzhuāng shēnghuó。
People who live in the city for a long time want to experience village life.
他想有了钱之后买一座属于自己的农庄。
Tā xiǎng yǒu le qián zhīhòu mǎi yízuò shǔyú zìjǐ de nóngzhuāng。
He wants to buy himself a manor when he becomes rich.
大雪帲幪了整个村庄。
Dàxuě píngméng le zhěnggè cūnzhuāng。
Heavy snow covered the whole village.
这个千户的村庄，主要的经济来源就是旅游业。
Zhège qiānhù de cūnzhuāng，zhǔyào de jīngjì láiyuán jiùshì lǚyóuyè。
The main economic resource of this ten-thousand-family village is tourism.
今年庄稼遭了虫灾，肯定是个歉岁了。
Jīnnián zhuāngjià zāo le chóngzāi，kěndìng shì gè qiànsuì le。
The crops suffered from insect plague this year, it will definitely be a lean year.
夜间的村庄，四周一片阒寂。
Yèjiān de cūnzhuāng，sìzhōu yípiàn qùjì。
Everywhere in the village is silent at night.
你该给地里的庄稼上肥了。
Nǐ gāi gěi dì lǐ de zhuāngjia shàngféi le。
It is time for you to apply fertilizer to the crops.
传说是神农氏教会了人类种植庄稼。
Chuánshuō shì shénnóngshì jiāohuì le rénlèi zhòngzhí zhuāngjià。
It is said that it was Shen Nung who taught man how to grow crops.
你应该给这些庄稼施一些生长素。
Nǐ yīnggāi gěi zhèxiē zhuāngjià shī yìxiē shēngzhǎngsù。
You should spread some growth hormone on the crops.
我们在党旗下庄严的宣讲过誓辞，要为共产主义事业奋斗终生。
Wǒmen zài dǎngqí xià zhuāngyán de xuānjiǎng guò shìcí，yào wèi gòngchǎnzhǔyì shìyè fèndòu zhōng shēng。
We have sworn solemnly under the party flag that we will work for Communism all our lives.
我家水旱庄稼各种了3亩，收成都很好。
Wǒjiā shuǐhàn zhuāngjià gèzhòng le sānmǔ，shōuchéng dōu hěnhǎo。
My family has three mu of paddy lands and three mu of dry land, all of which have a high yield.
他是个四方脸，看起来端正庄严。
Tā shì gè sìfāng liǎn，kànqǐlái duānzhèng zhuāngyán。
He has a square face, looking upright and dignified.
今天我买了很多衣服，都是剔庄货，特别便宜。
Jīntiān wǒ mǎi le hěnduō yīfu，dōushì tīzhuānghuò，tèbié piányí。
I bought many clothes today, which were all sold at reduced prices.
从他端庄的体表可以看出他受到过良好的教育。
Cóng tā duānzhuāng de tǐbiǎo kěyǐ kànchū tā shòudàoguò liánghǎo de jiàoyù。
His dignified appearance shows the good education he has received.
今年天旱，庄稼的收成不好。
Jīnnián tiānhàn，zhuāngjià de shōuchéng bùhǎo。
The dry weather this year has resulted in a poor harvest.
她容颜秀丽、举止端庄，真可谓是天香国色呀。
Tā róngyán xiùlì、jǔzhǐ duānzhuāng，zhēn kěwèi shì tiānxiāng guósè ya。
She is a beautiful woman of ethereal color and celestial fragrance.
这支部队已向那个发出救援信号的村庄突进了。
Zhèzhī bùduì yǐ xiàng nàge fāchū jiùyuán xìnhào de cūnzhuāng tūjìn le。
This army has already marched towards the village that sent the SOS.
这个村庄土层里的养分肥沃，适合耕种。
Zhège cūnzhuāng tǔcéng lǐ de yǎngfèn féiwò，shìhé gēngzhòng。
The soil layer of this village is rich in nutrients, and thus suitable for cultivation.
翻过这个土坡，你就能看见我说的那个村庄。
Fānguò zhège tǔpō，nǐ jiùnéng kànjiàn wǒ shuō de nàge cūnzhuāng。
Climb over this earth slope, and you can see the village I\'m talking about.
这片土地经过脱盐就可以种植庄稼了。
Zhè piàn tǔdì jīngguò tuōyán jiù kěyǐ zhòngzhí zhuāngjià le。
Crops can be grown on this land after desalination.
杰西卡是一个仪表端庄婉丽的女人。
Jiéxīkǎ shì yígè yíbiǎo duānzhuāng wǎnlì de nǚrén。
Jessica is a woman with a decent and pretty appearance.
乡里聘请工程队修筑圩堤，保护庄稼。
Xiānglǐ pìnqǐng gōngchéngduì xiūzhù wéidī，bǎohù zhuāngjià。
The county employed a construction brigade to mend the embankment on the low-lying land so as to protect the crops.
弟弟考上清华大学的喜信已经传遍整个村庄了！
Dìdi kǎoshàng Qīnghuá dàxué de xǐxìn yǐjing chuánbiàn zhěnggè cūnzhuāng le！
The good news of my brother being enrolled in Tsinghua University spread through the entire village.
敌人的行动根本是“项庄舞剑，意在沛公”，蒙蔽不了我们。
Dírén de xíngdòng gēnběn shì“xiàng zhuāng wǔjiàn，yìzài pèigōng”，méngbì bùliǎo wǒmen。
The enemy acted in order to disguise a threat, but we are not going to buy it.
他们削平了乱土岗，开始种庄稼。
Tāmen xuēpíng le luàntǔgǎng，kāishǐ zhòng zhuāngjia。
They leveled the hillock to flat ground and began to grow crops.
敌人血洗了赵家庄，真没人性。
Dírén xuèxǐ le zhàojiāzhuāng，zhēn méi rénxìng。
It is extremely inhumane that the enemies massacred the inhabitants of the Zhao village.
村庄夜阑人静，清风徐来。
Cūnzhuāng yèlán rénjìng,qīngfēng xúlái.
The village is quiet at night with a fresh breeze blowing gently.
庄泳曾是一名在世界上很有影响的泳星。
Zhuāng Yǒng céng shì yìmíng zài shìjièshàng hěn yǒu yǐngxiǎng de yǒngxīng。
Zhuangyong used to be an internationally influential swimmer.
陨石雨会对庄稼造成不利影响。
Yǔnshíyǔ huì duì zhuāngjia zàochéng búlì yǐngxiǎng。
A meteorite shower would have a bad effect on crops.
百年不遇的洪水，使这个村庄遭受了重灾。
Bǎiniánbúyù de hóngshuǐ，shǐ zhège cūnzhuāng zāoshòu le zhòngzāi。
A flood, the likes of which have not been seen in a hundred years, has devastated this village.
这些庄户人家的小孩也可以享受良好的教育。
Zhèxiē zhuānghù rénjiā de xiǎohái yě kěyǐ xiǎngshòu liánghǎo de jiàoyù。
Peasant children can enjoy a good education too.
黝黑的皮肤，健壮的肌肉是饰演庄稼汉的必备条件。
Yǒuhēi de pífū，jiànzhuàng de jīròu shì shìyǎn zhuāngjiàhàn de bìbèi tiáojiàn。
Dark skin and strong muscles are indispensable to farmers.
他放学归来还要帮助母亲打理庄稼活儿。
Tā fàngxué guīlái háiyào bāngzhù mǔqīn dǎlǐ zhuāngjia huór。
After returning from school, he has to help his mother with farm work.
这些贫农们认为庄头是地主的走狗。
Zhèxiē pínnóngmen rènwéi zhuāngtóu shì dìzhǔ de zǒugǒu。
These poor farmers consider land managers the servile followers of land owners.
庄园主住的别墅都是劳工的血汗筑成的啊。
Zhuāngyuánzhǔ zhù de biéshù dōushì láogōng de xuèhàn zhùchéng de a。
The owner of the manor lives in a villa built at the cost of the laborers\' blood and sweat.
他们用贫苦百姓的钱修了这座宏大的庄院。
Tāmen yòng pínkǔ bǎixìng de qián xiū le zhèzuò hóngdà de zhuāngyuàn。
They built this magnificent courtyard with the money of the poor.
小村庄的人们过着自给自足的幸福生活。
Xiǎo cūnzhuāng de rénmen guò zhe zìgěi zìzú de xìngfú shēnghuó。
People living in small villages enjoy happy, self sufficient lives.
现在小村庄的人们不但能自给自足，还把富裕的农产品卖到城市里去。
Xiànzài xiǎo cūnzhuāng de rénmen búdàn néng zìgěi zìzú，hái bǎ fùyù de nóngchǎnpǐn mài dào chéngshì lǐ qù。
Nowadays, people from small villages can not only support themselves but also sell surplus farm products to the city.
他一身泥土，肯定刚从庄稼地里出来。
Tā yìshēn nítǔ，kěndìng gāng cóng zhuāngjia dì lǐ chūlái。
Judging by the mud all over his body, he must have just returned from the cropland.
庄稼人最怕的就是这种阴雨绵绵的天气。
Zhuāngjià rén zuì pà de jiùshì zhèzhǒng yīnyǔ miánmián de tiānqì。
The farmers fear this kind of rainy weather most.

He is a skilled farmer.

我们沿着一段悠长的上坡路，来到了这个村庄。
The continued along the road which leaves the village towards London.
Tāmen zài líkāi cūnzhuāng、tōngwǎng Lúndūn de dàolù shàngqián jìn。
他们在离开村庄、通往伦敦的道路上前进。
The grant covered the cost of hiring the village hall.
Bōkuǎn hángàile zūlìn cūnzhuāng lǐtáng de chéngběn。
拨款涵盖了租赁村庄礼堂的成本。
The village as such is ordinary perhaps but its setting is sublime.
Zhèzhǒng cūnzhuāng yěxǔ kànqǐlái hěn píngcháng，dàn tā bèihòu de gùshi shì hěn lìng rén jìngwèi de。
这种村庄也许看起来很平常，但它背后的故事是很令人敬畏的。
They shepherded all the sheep of the village.
Tāmen fàngmù cūnzhuāng lǐ suǒyǒu de yángqún。
他们放牧村庄里所有的羊群。
The map shows different walks in the area around the village.
Zhè zhāng dìtú biāoshì chū le cūnzhuāng zhōubiān qūyù de dàolù。
这张地图标示出了村庄周边区域的道路。
The village stands along a single street roughly parallel with the river.
Cūnzhuāng zuòluò zài yǔ héliú dàtǐ píngxíng de yì tiáo jiēdào páng。
村庄座落在与河流大体平行的一条街道旁。
We found a few friendly soldiers in the deserted village.
Wǒmen zài fèiqì de cūnzhuāng zhōng zhǎodào yìxiē yǒujūn shìbīng。
我们在废弃的村庄中找到一些友军士兵。
A village was built over part of the ancient site.
Bùfen gǔlǎo yízhǐ shàng jiànle yí zuò cūnzhuāng。
部分古老遗址上建了一座村庄。
All the nearby villages will be in ruins forever.
Suǒyǒu fùjìn de cūnzhuāng jiāng yǒngyuǎn chéngwéi fèixū。
所有附近的村庄将永远成为废墟。
With his dying breath, the mage cursed the village.
Línzhōng qián，fǎshī zǔzhòule zhège cūnzhuāng。
临终前，法师诅咒了这个村庄。
We have been loafing about this village for an hour with nothing to do.
Wǒmen zài cūnzhuāng lǐ huàngdàngle yí gè xiǎoshí，shénme yě méi zuò。
我们在村庄里晃荡了一个小时，什么也没做。
They was attacked in a small village not a hundred miles from Hong Kong.
Tāmen zài yí gè lí Xiānggǎng bù yuǎn de xiǎocūnzhuāng zāoyù gōngjī。
他们在一个离香港不远的小村庄遭遇攻击。
The taunts of the village children from earlier in the day still rang in his ears.
Qīngchén，cūnzhuāng lǐ háizǐmen de xīluòshēng réngrán zài tā ěrbiān huíxiǎng。
清晨，村庄里孩子们的奚落声仍然在他耳边回响。
The people were starved out of the village.
Yīnwèi jī\'è，cūnzhuāng lǐ de rén yuèláiyuè shǎo。
因为饥饿，村庄里的人越来越少。
The road winds through the country.
Lù wānwān-qūqū chuānguò cūnzhuāng。
路弯弯曲曲穿过村庄。
The whole village has been wiped off the map.
Zhěnggè cūnzhuāng yǐ bèi chèdǐ qīngchú le。
整个村庄已被彻底清除了。
The tigers were stealing along the path towards the village.
Lǎohǔ men cháozhe zhège cūnzhuāng de fāngxiàng，qiāoqiāo qiánjìn。
老虎们朝着这个村庄的方向，悄悄前进。
The residents of this village adhered to Catholicism.
Zhège cūnzhuāng de jūmín dǔxìn Tiānzhǔjiào。
这个村庄的居民笃信天主教。
The swollen river flooded the village.
Fànlàn de héliú yānmò de cūnzhuāng。
泛滥的河流淹没的村庄。
The pirates raided the coastal villages regularly.
Zhèxiē hǎidào jīngcháng xíjī Yán\'àn cūnzhuāng。
这些海盗经常袭击沿岸村庄。
The Serbs attacked the village at night.
Sài\'ěrwéiyàrén zài yèjiān xíjīle nàgè cūnzhuāng。
塞尔维亚人在夜间袭击了那个村庄。
The population of this village increased sevenfold in the past 100 years.
Zài guòqù 100 nián lǐ，zhège cūnzhuāng de rénkǒu zēngzhǎng le qī bèi。
在过去100年里，这个村庄的人口增长了七倍。
They went to the village afoot.
Tāmen bùxíng qùle nàgè cūnzhuāng。
他们步行去了那个村庄。
People returned to the plundered village.
Rénmen huídào bèi jiélüè guò de cūnzhuāng。
人们回到被劫掠过的村庄。
The countryside rolled greenly down into the valley.
Cóng nàgè cūnzhuāng dào shāngǔ dàochù shì yī piàn shēngjī\'àngrán de jǐngxiàng。
从那个村庄到山谷到处是一片生机盎然的景象。
The village looked delusively near.
Nàgè cūnzhuāng kànqǐlái hěn jìn，shíjìshàng què hěn yuǎn。
那个村庄看起来很近，实际上却很远。
The train clanked through the village.
Huǒchē dīngdīng dāngdāng tōngguò le cūnzhuāng。
火车叮叮当当通过了村庄。
Morning azured the village.
Qīngchén wèi zhège cūnzhuāng túshàng yì céng wèilánsè。
清晨为这个村庄涂上一层蔚蓝色。

dǎbànchéngzhèngrénjūnzi 
masquerade as a gentleman

Yéye shì gè zhèngrén jūnzǐ，cóngbùqǔ xiécái。
My grandfather is an upright person who never touches illegal money.
正人君子
他虎步龙行，具有君王霸气。
Tā hǔbùlóngxíng，jùyǒu jūnwáng bàqì。
He carries a mighty bearing, and has the air of a king.
传说中太上老君住在九重霄之上。
Chuánshuōzhōng Tàishànglǎojūn zhùzài jiǔchóngxiāo zhīshàng。
It is said that the supreme god lives in the highest part of heaven.
在中国神话里，太上老君专职修炼仙丹。

In Chinese Mythology, Laojun was in charge of alchemy.
佘老太君百岁挂帅的故事令人感佩。
Shēlǎotàijūn bǎisuì guàshuài de gùshì lìngrén gǎnpèi。
Going into a battlefield at your mother\'s age is very extraordinary!
戏台上，佘太君自称为老身。

On the stage, the Dowager called herself &quot;Laoshen&quot;.
有事好好说，君子动口不动手！

gentleman\'s agreement
君子协定

现在世界上君主制的国家已经很少了。

Nowadays, there are few monarchies left in the world.
在当今世界上，只有十几个国家仍保持君主国体制。
Zài dāngjīn shìjièshàng，zhǐyǒu shíjǐgè guójiā réng bǎochí jūnzhǔ guótǐzhì。
In the world today, there are only a dozen countries that still keep a monarchical state system.
清末的那次维新变法，皇帝曾经想要实施君主立宪制度，但终于没能成功。

During the Reform in the last years of the Qing Dynasty, the emperor wanted to implement the constitutional monarchy system but eventually failed.
君主专制。
The country was declared following the overthrow of the monarchy.

该国推翻君主制之后，宣布正式建国。
In an absolute monarchy the king can do anything he wants.

在君主专制政体下，国王能够做任何他想做的事情。
The Kingdom of the Netherlands is a hereditary and constitutional monarchy.

Guìzú qítè de zhànqián chuántǒng shì jūnzhǔ de sānzhùmén。
贵族奇特的战前传统是君主的三柱门。
The lord dictated to them and treated them like slaves.
Zhège jūnzhǔ yīzhàng quánshì yāpò tāmen，duìdài tāmen xiàng núlì yìbān。
这个君主依仗权势压迫他们，对待他们像奴隶一般。
The lord was in residence the castle.
Jūnzhǔ zhù zài chéngbǎo lǐ。
君主住在城堡里。
A monarch has a duty to his subjects.
Jūnzhǔ duì tā de guómín fùyǒu zérèn。
君主对他的国民负有责任。
储君嗣位。
The despot gassed the rebellious tribes.
Zhè wèi bàojūn xiàng fǎnpàn de bùluò shīfàng dúqì。
这位暴君向反叛的部落施放毒气。
他是两代君王的辅弼。
Tā shì liǎng dài jūnwáng de fǔbì。
He assisted two generations of emperors.
古代，忠臣往往因为直言规谏君王而遭受处罚。
Gǔdài，zhōng chén wǎngwǎng yīnwèi zhíyán guījiàn jūnwáng ér zāoshòu chǔfá。
In ancient times, loyal officials were always punished after directly speaking out against the emperor.
他虎步龙行，具有君王霸气。
Tā hǔbùlóngxíng，jùyǒu jūnwáng bàqì。
He carries a mighty bearing, and has the air of a king.
为君王者，不可贪恋酒色。
Wéi jūnwáng zhě，bùkě tānliàn jiǔsè。
Kings and emperors should not indulge in wine and women.
听说楚国国君王正想方设法招纳贤士。
Tīngshuō Chǔguó guójūnwáng zhèng xiǎngfāng shèfǎ zhāo nà xiánshì。
It is heard that the King of the Chu kingdom is recruiting talented and able people.
作为一代君王，他得到了天下子民的祝颂。
Zuòwéi yídài jūnwáng，tā dédào le tiānxià zǐmín de zhùsòng。
As an emperor, he received the good wishes of his people.
王君他已去好久了。
Wáng Jūn tā yǐ qù hǎojiŭ le。
由于误抽被注入大麻的香烟，小王不幸成了瘾君子。
Yóuyú wùchōu bèi zhùrù dàmá de xiāngyān，Xiǎo Wáng búxìng chéng le yǐnjūnzǐ。
Unfortunately, Xiaowang became a drug addict after he mistakenly smoked a marijuana cigarette.
君王
a liege lord
君主；王侯
The doctrine of the divine right of kings was enunciated by the stuarts in Britain in the 16th century.
16 shìjì yīngguó de sītúyàtè wángshì tíchūle jūnquán shénshòu。
16世纪英国的斯图亚特王室提出了君权神授。
In an absolute monarchy the king can do anything he wants.
Zài jūnzhǔ zhuānzhì zhèngtǐ xià，guówáng nénggòu zuò rènhé tā xiǎng zuò de shìqing。
在君主专制政体下，国王能够做任何他想做的事情。
The kind prince has emerged into a tyrant.
Nàgè héshàn de wángzǐ kāishǐ xiǎnxiàn chū yìxiē bàojūn de běnzhì。
那个和善的王子开始显现出一些暴君的本质。
大青山脚下的昭君墓被称为青冢。

这个权臣把持朝政多年，众人都要求他归政于君主。

After being in power for many year, this official was asked to return the power of the imperial government to the emperor.

jūnchén 
the monarch and his subjects

wúdào hūnjūn

Xianming is good at playing chess. He always feels like a sovereign descending to the world in front of the chess board.
在当今世界上，只有十几个国家仍保持君主国体制。

In the world today, there are only a dozen countries that still keep a monarchical state system.
清末的那次维新变法，皇帝曾经想要实施君主立宪制度，但终于没能成功。
Qīngmò de nà cì wéixīn biànfǎ，huángdì céngjīng xiǎngyào shíshī jūnzhǔ lìxiàn zhìdù，dàn zhōng yú méinéng chénggōng。
During the Reform in the last years of the Qing Dynasty, the emperor wanted to implement the constitutional monarchy system but eventually failed.

Xìtái shàng，Shētàijūn zìchēng wéi lǎoshēn。
On the stage, the Dowager called herself &quot;Laoshen&quot;.
他企图弑君叛国，这种乱臣贼子还是及早除掉为好。

As a traitor and usurper who sought to murder the sovereign and betray his country, he should be killed as soon as possible.
张君秋曾演过《苏三起解》这出戏。
Zhāng Jūnqiū céng yǎnguò《Sūsānqǐjiě》zhèchūxì。
Zhang Junqiu once played in the drama &quot;Su-San Under Police Escort&quot;
大青山脚下的昭君墓被称为青冢。
Dàqīngshān jiǎoxià de zhāojūnmù bèi chēngwéi qīngzhǒng。
Wang Zhaojun tomb below Daqing mountain was once called Qing tomb.
三国时期的诸侯们都打着清君侧的旗号为已谋利。

The dukes in the times of the Three Kingdoms all stove for their own benefits under the pretext of ridding the emperor of &quot;evil&quot; ministers.
佘老太君百岁挂帅的故事令人感佩。
Shēlǎotàijūn bǎisuì guàshuài de gùshì lìngrén gǎnpèi。
Going into a battlefield at your mother\'s age is very extraordinary!
现在的皇帝是个昏君，每天只知道在围场打猎。

The current reigning emperor is fatuous and self-indulgent, he just hunts in the hunting enclosure every day.
听说楚国国君王正想方设法招纳贤士。

It is heard that the King of the Chu kingdom is recruiting talented and able people.
爷爷是个正人君子，从不取邪财。

My grandfather is an upright person who never touches illegal money.

他衣冠楚楚的，其实是个伪君子。

Zhōngguó gǔdài qījūn de guānyuán wǎngwǎng huì bèi pànchǔ yízú de zhòngzuì。

As an emperor, he received the good wishes of his people.
一个昏君是不会用多少时间来批复奏疏的。

wěidà de chuàngjǔ 
a great beginning
毛泽东是当代最伟大的人物之一。
Máo Zédōng shì dāngdài zuì wěidà de rénwù zhīyī。
Mao Zedong was one of the greatest men of our time.
大火之后，庙里过去那些雄伟建筑荡然无存。
Dàhuǒ zhīhòu，miào lǐ guòqù nàxiē xióngwěi jiànzhù dàngránwúcún。
Nothing remained of the beautiful temple buildings after the fire.
伟大而艰巨的任务
wěidà ér jiānjù de rènwu
a great and arduous task
光荣归于伟大的祖国。
Guāngróngguī yú wěidà de zǔguó。
Glory to the great motherland.
南京长江大桥的夜景雄伟瑰丽。
NánjīngChángJiāngdàqiáo de yèjǐngxióngwěi guīlì。
The view of the Nanjing Changjiang bridge at night is magnificent.
一座雄伟的大桥横亘在江上。
Yí zuò xióngwěi de dà qiáo hénggèn zài jiāngshàng。
A magnificent bridge spans the river.
宏伟的人民大会堂
hóngwěi de Rénmín Dàhuìtáng
the magnificent Great Hall of the People
宏伟的前景
hóngwěi de qiánjǐng
grand prospects
一项宏伟壮丽的事业
yí xiàng hóngwěi zhuànglì de shìyè
a magnificent undertaking
宏伟的计划
hóngwěi de jìhuà 
a magnificent project
人们集会纪念这位伟大的音乐家。
Rénmen jíhuì jìniàn zhèwèi wěidà de yīnyuèjiā。
People held a meeting to commemorate the great musician.
中国革命是伟大的十月革命的继续。
Zhōngguó gémìngshì wěidà de Shíyuè Gémìng de jìxù。
The Chinese revolution is a continuation of the great October Revolution.
宏伟的建筑
hóngwěi de jiànzhù 
a magnificent structure
伟人逝世，人们浸没在悲痛之中。
Wěirén shìshì，rénmen jìnmò zài bēitòngzhī zhōng。
People were immersed in grief at the passing away of the great man.
现代科学技术正在经历着一场伟大的革命。
Xiàndài kēxué jìshù zhèngzài jīnglì zhe yìcháng wěidà de gémìng。
Modern science and technology are undergoing a great revolution.
惊天动地的伟业
jīngtiāndòngdì de wěiyè
a magnificent and earth-shake feat
这样宏伟的建筑，竟然只用十个月的时间就完成了。
Zhèyànghóngwěi de jiànzhù，jìngrán zhǐ yòngshí gè yuè de shíjiān jiù wánchéng le。
To think that such a magnificent building was completed in ten months!
这样伟大的工程，可真来劲！
Zhèyàngwěidà de gōngchéng，kě zhēn láijìn！
What a magnificent project! How thrilling!
这里埋葬着一位伟人。
Zhèlǐ máizàng zhe yíwèi wěirén。
A great man is buried here. or Here lies a great man.

Wǒguó gǔdài de wěidà jiànzhù，kǒngpà mò guò yú Wàn Lǐ Chángchéng le。
Of all the ancient Chinese buildings, the Great Wall is perhaps the greatest.
这首诗歌颂了黄河的伟大气魄。
Zhèshǒushī gēsòng le HuángHé de wěidà qìpò。
This poem praises the grandeur of the Yellow River.
气势雄伟的长城
qìshì xióngwěi de Chángchéng
the imposing Great Wall
文学艺术家们要切实负起人类灵魂工程师的伟大使命。
Wénxué yìshùjiāmen yào qièshí fùqǐ rénlèi línghún gōngchéngshī de wěidà shǐmìng。

二十世纪最伟大的事件
èrshí shìjì zuì wěidà de shìjiàn
the greatest event in the 20th century
长城太伟大了。
Chángchéng tài wěidà le。
The Great Wall is really great.

shēncái wěi\'àn 
tall and sturdy; of great height and powerful build

the magnificent Tian An Men

kuíwěi

雄伟
xióngwěi
grand; imposing
紫禁城内的殿宇，金碧辉煌，异常雄伟。
Zǐjìnchéng nèi de diànyǔ，jīnbìhuīhuáng，yìcháng xióngwěi。
Palaces within the Forbidden City are grand and resplendent.
你看那些国旗班的战士，都是些俊伟帅气的小伙儿！
Nǐ kàn nàxiē guóqíbān de zhànshì，dōushì xiē jùnwěi shuàiqì de xiǎohuǒr！
You see those soldiers from the national flag squad? All of them are strong and handsome young men.
他是一个平凡的人，并无俊伟之才。
Tā shì yígè píngfán de rén，bìng wú jùnwěi zhī cái。
He is a common person, with no distinguished talent.
这个新建的黄河桥，气势宏伟，跨径很大。

The newly built bridge on the Yellow river, having a large span, is full of momentum.
据说天空中有一座凌霄宝殿，甚是雄伟。

毛泽东生来就注定是个奇伟之人。

望着他颀伟的背影，她心生爱慕之情。

这些奇异的景观都是拜大自然的伟力所赐。

bǎ wèntí àn qīngzhònghuǎnjí páipaiduì
arrange the problems in order of importance and urgency

缓不济急
huǎnbújìjí
slow action cannot save a critical situation
水流湍急(迟缓)
shuǐliú tuānjí(chíhuǎn)
rapid (sluggish) flow; rushing current
轻重缓急
做事应分轻重缓急。
分别轻重缓急
衡量轻重缓急
弄清轻重缓急。
不能不管别人的缓急，一味替自己打算。
做事要斟酌轻重缓急，有步骤地进行。

to have a sense of proportion
具有辨别轻重缓急的能力

在许多文化中，儿童长大成人时要举行成人仪式。
The children are beginning to adolesce around the age of 12.
Értóng zài shíèr suì zuǒyòu kāishǐ jìnrù qīngchūnqī。
儿童在12岁左右开始进入青春期。
The children must be properly socialized.
Értóng bìxū shìdàng de shèhuìhuà。
儿童必须适当地社会化。
Children learn early on to categorize.
Értóng hěn zǎo jiù xuéhuì guīlèi。
儿童很早就学会归类。
The blood-thirsty mob lynched the alleged killer of the child.
Cánrěn de bàomín duì bèi zhǐkòng de értóng shāshǒu chǔyǐ sīxíng。
残忍的暴民对被指控的儿童杀手处以私刑。
The brain damage will retard the child\'s language development.
Dànǎo sǔnshāng huì zǔ\'ài értóng de yǔyán fāyù。
大脑损伤会阻碍儿童的语言发育。
He walked with the wiggliness of a child on high heels.
Tā zǒulù shí rú értóng chuānzhe gāogēnxié yíyàng zuǒyáo-yòuhuàng。
他走路时如儿童穿着高跟鞋一样左摇右晃。
Adolescence is a transitional stage between childhood and adulthood.
Qīngchūnqī shì értóngqī hé chéngniánqī zhījiān de yí gè guòdù jiēduàn。
青春期是儿童期和成年期之间的一个过渡阶段。
Children should do well by their parents.
Értóng yīngdāng shòudào fùmǔ hěn hǎo de zhàogù。
儿童应当受到父母很好的照顾。
It involved testing thousands of children for smallpox.
Zhè xiàng gōngzuò shèjí jiǎnchá shù qiān míng értóng shìfǒu huànyǒu tiānhuā。
这项工作涉及检查数千名儿童是否患有天花。
The nurse vaccinated the children in the school.
Hùshi wèi zàixiàoértóng zhùshè yìmiáo。
护士为在校儿童注射疫苗。
He urged zero tolerance for priests who abuse children sexually.
Tā lì zhǔ duì xìng qīn értóng de mùshī juébù yǔyǐ gūxī。
他力主对性侵儿童的牧师绝不予以姑息。
The provoked animal attacked the child.
Bèi jīnù de dòngwù gōngjī le zhège értóng。
被激怒的动物攻击了这个儿童。
Street children beg or steal in order to survive.
Liúlàng\'értóng wèile shēngcún ér qǐtǎo huòzhě tōudào。
流浪儿童为了生存而乞讨或者偷盗。
The pedophile turned to boys for satisfaction.
Liàntóngpǐzhě xúnzhǎo értóng mǎnzú tāmen de yùwàng。
恋童癖者寻找儿童满足他们的欲望。
His early orphanage shaped his character as an adult.
Tā tóngnián de gūer jīnglì sùzàole tā chéngshú de xìnggé。
他童年的孤儿经历塑造了他成熟的性格。
But like most novelists, he plans to draw on his childhood.
像很多小说家一样，他也打算从自己童年借用点儿素材。
She saw some children looking over the wall and smiling at the bird.
Tā kàndào yìxiē háitóng yuèguò qiáng cháozhe niǎo\'er wēixiào。
她看到一些孩童越过墙朝着鸟儿微笑。
她为了凑足自己下学期的学费，当起了报童。
Tā wèi le còuzú zìjǐ xià xuéqī de xuéfèi，dāngqǐ le bàotóng。
In order to earn enough money for tuition of next term, he became a paper boy.
据报道：台风过后，有一3岁男童失踪。
Jù bàodào：táifēng guòhòu，yǒu yì sānsuì nántóng shīzōng。
It is reported that a three-year-old boy was missing after the typhoon.
那些走私货物被港务局扣押了。
Nàxiē zǒusī huòwù bèi gǎngwùjú kòuyā le。
Those smuggled goods have been detained by the port office.
一批走私货物被海关截查了。
Yì pī zǒusī huòwù bèi hǎiguān jiéchá le。
A number of smuggled products were captured by customs officers.
走私的货物
zǒusī de huòwù 
smuggled goods
警方查截一辆大货车，发现了很多走私物资。
Jǐngfāng chájié yí liàng dàhuòchē，fāxiàn le hěnduō zǒusī wùzī。
The police detained a large truck and found many smuggled goods.
盗运走私货物。
The attachment of smuggled goods has been approved by the local police.
查封走私货物的行动已经被当地警方批准了。
The police exerted the extent of the cargo to the businessman who was suspected of smuggling.
警察向那个有走私嫌疑的商人展示了货物扣押令。
Do you want something from the vending machine?
你想从自动售货机里买点儿什么吗？
The vendor is out of order again.
这台自动售货机又坏了。
The vending machine needs a jog every now and then.
Xiànzài zìdòng shòuhuòjī měicì dōu xūyào qīng yáo yíxià。
现在自动售货机每次都需要轻摇一下。

nǚzhuāng zhōng de rèhuò

Tā chuān de nà jiàn shēn huángsè xīzhuāng，yí kàn jiùshì míngpáihuò。
At first sight, you can see that the dark yellow suit he\'s wearing is of a famous brand.
不用担心，货已经到了，装卸工人正在卸载呢。

这个货架是他自己装的，骑自行车时可以放很多东西。

He fixed this rack himself. A lot of things can be put into it while he is biking.
百货商店有很多童装可供挑选。

The department store has a large selection of children\'s clothes.
大商场货物齐全，例如服装、家电、食品等应有尽有。

The big shopping centre sells all kinds of goods, for example, clothes, household appliances and food.
她背子里装满了要拿到集市上卖的山货。
Tā bèizi lǐ zhuāngmǎn le yào nádào jíshì shàng mài de shānhuò。
The basket on her back is full of mountain products that she is going to sell in the market.
这可是正经八百的原装货。
车厢装载货物不得超长、超高。
这些服装都是大路货
家用电器、服装鞋帽、床上用品以至日用小百货都已准备齐全。

很多动物在它们的一生中，总有那么一天要被装上货车，大多数情况下，他们的目的地就是屠宰场。

恶性通货膨胀
èxìng tōnghuòpéngzhàng
galloping (or runaway) inflation
通货膨胀政策解救不了经济危机。

Inflationary policies are no remedy for an economic crisis.
螺旋式通货膨胀
luóxuánshì tōnghuò péngzhàng
inflation spiral; spiralling inflation
通货一膨胀，物价就涨，水涨船高嘛。

Prices rise in proportion to inflation, like boats going up with the level of the water.

制止通货膨胀
zhìzhǐ tōnghuò péngzhàng
check (or halt) inflation
通货膨胀是由于货币供应量供大于求引发的。
Tōnghuò péngzhàng shì yóuyú huòbì gōngyìngliàng gòng dàyú qiú yǐnfā de。
Inflation has been triggered because the currency supply volume exceeds market demand.

货币流通
huòbìliútōng
circulation of money

duì huòbì de liútōngbúduàn jìnxíngtiáojié

Only with smooth channels to sell the goods can the enterprise develop at a fast speed.
货币(商品)流通
huòbì（shāngpǐn）liútōng
the circulation of money (commodities)
铜元曾经作为货币一度流通。

Copper coins were once in circulation as money.

为了抑制居高不下的通货膨胀，内阁决定进口小麦、糖和豆类。

通货膨胀是供过于求的结果。
a hedge against inflation
防止通货膨胀的手段

跟上需求/通货膨胀

多年来最低程度的通货膨胀率

她在2000年初购买了当时新发行的10年期通货膨胀指数型国债，现在赚到了43,000美元。

我父亲把他的钱投到20年期通货膨胀指数型国债中去了。
We must take drastic measures to cool inflation.
我们必须采取强有力的措施抑制通货膨胀。

The major inflationary impetus was provided by the conjunction of two factors.
Zhòngyào de tōnghuò péngzhàng tuīdònglì shì yóu zhè liǎng gè yīnsù yìqǐ chǎnshēng de。
重要的通货膨胀推动力是由这两个因素一起产生的。
The conquest of inflation remained the first objective of policy.
Kèfú tōnghuòpéngzhàng réngrán shì zhèngcè de shǒuyàomùbiāo。
克服通货膨胀仍然是政策的首要目标。
We have got the scourge of inflation under control.
Wǒmen yǐ jiāng zhè cì tōnghuòpéngzhàng de huòhuàn kòngzhì zhù le。
我们已将这次通货膨胀的祸患控制住了。
He told the conference that his priority was to curb inflation.
Tā gàosu dàhuì，tā de shǒuyào mùbiāo shì yìzhì tōnghuòpéngzhàng。
他告诉大会，他的首要目标是抑制通货膨胀。
Elected politicians have so far lacked the stomach for a war on inflation.
Cānjiā xuǎnjǔ de zhèngkèmen mùqián háiméiyǒu fādòng tōnghuòpéngzhàng zhànzhēng de yìxiàng。
参加选举的政客们目前还没有发动通货膨胀战争的意向。
Inflation and the balance of payments depend on the amount of slack in the economy.
Tōnghuòpéngzhàng hé màoyì zhīfù chā\'é yījù jīngjì xiàhuá de chéngdù。
通货膨胀和贸易支付差额依据经济下滑的程度。
Investment in commercial property has been seen as providing a hedge against inflation.
Zài shāngyè zīchǎn shàng de tóuzī yǐjīng bèi kànzuòshì yìngduì tōnghuòpéngzhàng de yì zhǒng tàoqī bǎozhí cuòshī。
在商业资产上的投资已经被看作是应对通货膨胀的一种套期保值措施。
Inflation peaked at 5.8 percent in the United States in 1970.
yījiǔqīlíng nián Měiguó tōnghuòpéngzhànglǜ dádào zuì gāo diǎn，wéi bǎifēnzhī wǔ diǎn bā。
1970年美国通货膨胀率达到最高点，为5.8%。
Other price rises will be less than the rate of inflation.
Qítā jiàgé de shàngzhǎng mànyú tōnghuòpéngzhànglǜ。
其他价格的上涨慢于通货膨胀率。
I mean, fifty per cent inflation is a bit much.
Wǒ de yìsi shì， bǎifēnzhī wǔshí de tōnghuò péngzhàng shì bù hélǐ de。
我的意思是，50%的通货膨胀是不合理的。

我们将尽力在五年内把通货膨胀降到百分之五。
This method is designed to damp down inflation.

这个方法旨在减缓通货膨胀。
Consumer Price Index inflation edged down to 1.8% in March.

通货膨胀率在三月份微降至1.8%。

在西班牙，通货膨胀目前为１.８个百分点。
They had run away inflation and it cost $1 million for a loaf of bread.

Inflation has been suppressed by recession.

This economic measure doesn\'t even begin to deal with the problem of inflation.

这项经济措施甚至根本没有触及到通货膨胀问题。

攀升的通货膨胀使经济日益萧条。
The war inflated the economy.
Zhànzhēng shǐ jīngjì chūxiàn tōnghuò péngzhàng。
战争使经济出现通货膨胀。
In inflation everything gets more valuable except money.

在通货膨胀时期，除了钱，任何东西都变得更有价值。

利率提高往往与通货膨胀相伴随。

If even the shop assistant can\'t provide the consumer an exact price, how can anyone trust a shop like this?
昨天她和一个售货员歇斯底里地大吵了一顿。

hawk low-quality goods

各国都同意以硬货币开展双边贸易，取代以前的实物交易。
因为卖假货，这个商场被勒令闭市整顿。
Yīnwéi mài jiǎhuò，zhège shāngchǎng bèi lèlìng bìshì zhěngdùn。
This market place was closed for selling fake products.
羊城无假货的行动就要开始了，你们参加了吗？
Yángchéng wú jiǎhuò de xíngdòng jiùyào kāishǐ le，nǐmen cānjiā le ma？
The activity &quot;No Fake Products in Yangcheng&quot; is going to start, are you going to attend?
市场上充斥着假货。
shìchǎngshàng chōngchìzhe jiǎhuò。
The market is flooded with fake goods.
花这么多钱买了假货，太冤了！
Huā zhèmeduō qián mǎile jiǎhuò，tài yuān le！
What bad luck to spend so much money on a fake.
这家店卖假货倒牌子了。
假货严重损害消费者利益。
假货冒充正品。
质问商场为什么销售假货。
These bastard devices are the size of a small aluminium briefcase.
Zhèxiē jiǎhuò xiàng yígè xiǎo de lǚ gōngwénbāo nàme dà。
这些假货像一个小的铝公文包那么大。
由于恶性通货膨胀该国货币大大贬值了。
Yóuyú èxìng tōnghuòpéngzhàng，gāi guó huòbì dàdà biǎnzhí le。
Owing to runaway inflation, that country\'s currency has greatly depreciated.
货币贬值。
物价上涨，货币贬值。
货币增值。
Prices tumbled after the devaluation of the currency.
Huòbì biǎnzhí zhīhòu，wùjià bàodiē。
货币贬值之后，物价暴跌。
The value of currencies is regulated by the market mechanism.
货币的价值是由市场机制决定的。
The United Nations is calling on several countries to appreciate their currencies.
Liánhéguó zhèngzài hūyù jǐ gè guójiā tíshēng qí huòbì de jiàzhí。
联合国正在呼吁几个国家提升其货币的价值。
They devalued their own currencies, making their exports more competitive.
Tāmen biǎnzhíle tāmen de huòbì，shǐ tāmen de chūkǒu huòwù gèng yǒu jìngzhēnglì。
他们贬值了他们的货币，使他们的出口货物更有竞争力。
Investment in commercial property has been seen as providing a hedge against inflation.
Zài shāngyè zīchǎn shàng de tóuzī yǐjīng bèi kànzuòshì yìngduì tōnghuòpéngzhàng de yì zhǒng tàoqī bǎozhí cuòshī。
在商业资产上的投资已经被看作是应对通货膨胀的一种套期保值措施。
We will supply a top-ranking international freight agency service, and create the future logistic nonesuch.
我们为您提供一流的国际货运代理服务，更创造未来物流价值的典范！
Our currency has inflated enough that coins aren\'t worth anything anymore.
Wǒmen de huòbì yǐjīng tōngzhàng de tài lìhai le，yìngbì gēnběn bùzhí shénme qián le。
我们的货币已经通胀的太厉害了，硬币根本不值什么钱了。
In inflation everything gets more valuable except money.
Zài tōnghuò péngzhàng shíqī，chúle qián，rènhé dōngxi dōu biàn de gèng yǒu jiàzhí。
在通货膨胀时期，除了钱，任何东西都变得更有价值。

Hǎiguān duì shāngpǐn hé huòwù chūkǒu zhíxíngjiānguǎn。
The customs office supervises the export of commodities and goods.
货物在运输中的亏耗
huòwù zài yùnshū zhōng de kuīhào
losses incurred in the course of transportation

Yí dìngyào bǎ zhè pī huòwù kǔnzā hǎo le。

用篷布把货物盖上
yòngpéngbùbǎ huòwù gàishàng

货物品种齐全
huòwù pǐnzhǒng qíquán
have a good assortment of goods
这商店虽然小，货物却很齐全。
Zhè shāngdiàn suīrán xiǎo，huòwù què hěn qíquán。
This store, though small, has a satisfactory variety of goods.

Huòwù yèyǐ qǐyùn。

qīngxiāo huòwù

huòwù qīngdān

Zhèjiā pùzi huòwù de pǐnzhǒng hěn quán。
This store has a wide assortment of goods.
这商店虽小，货物倒是很全乎。

货物如期运到。
Huòwù rúqī yùndào。
The goods arrived on schedule.

Kǎchē bǎ huòwù shūsòngdào biānjiāng dìqū。

货物出门，概不退换。
Huòwù chūmén, ɡài bú tuìhuàn。

这个港口一年可吞吐三千万吨货物。

This port can handle up to 30,000,000 tons of cargo a year.

Huòwù yǐ dào，wánhǎowúsǔn。

zhēnɡshuì huòwù

这部货梯的载重量很大，请放心把货物放进去。

There is more than money at stake in the Greek crisis.

在希腊危机中，面临风险的并不仅仅是货币。

由于经济危机，很多富有才华的大学毕业生学非所用，从事送货或者其他体力工作。

zàihuò chuánzhī 
carrying vessels

dìngqī huòchuán 
cargo liner
今年5月份，在港外待卸的货船，平均每天下降到276艘，比压船最多的2月份减少77艘。
Jīnnián wǔyuèfèn，zài gǎngwài dàixiè de huòchuán，píngjūn měitiān xiàjiàng dào èrbǎiqīshíliù sōu，bǐ yāchuán zuìduō de èryuèfèn jiǎnshǎo qīshíqīsōu。
In May this year, the average number of cargo ships waiting to be unloaded in the harbor every day dropped to 276, 77 less than the record number in February.

Huòwù yùnshūliàng jiāng dádào sìqiān wàn dūn。

yòng guóchǎnpǐn dàitì jìnkǒuhuò

货运单据
huòyùn dānjù

货币单位
huòbì dānwèi

Zhè pī huò tā yì dǎoshǒu jiù zhuàn le yìqiān yuán。

货底子
huòdǐzi

yòng huòwù dǐcháng qiànkuǎn

Zài zhèlǐ jiàn gè bǎihuò shāngdiàn，dìdiǎn dào shì zhōng。
This would be a suitable site for a new department store.
点货
diǎnhuò

按清单点收货物
àn qīngdān diǎnshōu huòwù

订货确认书
dìnghuò quèrènshū

Nǐ gěi zhè pī huò dìng gè jià ba。

dōushòu lièhuò

Zhèzhǒng huò dào nóngcūn zhèng duìlù。

fànmài píhuò

Nà jiā gōngchǎngwú rén dìnghuò，bèipò guānbì。
The factory had to close down through lack of orders.
国产远洋货轮
ɡuóchǎn yuǎnyánɡ huòlún

hángkōnghuòyùn

Zhège shípǐn gōngsī chūnjié qījiān chūshòu de huòpǐn jiāngàn yǒuguānguīdìnghé jià，yǐfángluàn zhǎngjià。
To prevent random price hikes, the prices of goods sold by this company during Spring Festival will be verified in accordance with the regulations.
货车轰响着开过去了。
Huòchē hōngxiǎng zhe kāi guòqù le。
The lorry roared past.

她背子里装满了要拿到集市上卖的山货。
