如何处理这些积压的背货，这让总经理非常头疼。
Rúhé chǔlǐ zhèxiē jīyā de bèihuò，zhè ràng zǒngjīnglǐ fēicháng tóuténg。
It is a headache for the manager to deal with the outdated goods.
不同国家规定的本位货币标准是不同的。
Bùtóng guójiā guīdìng de běnwèi huòbì biāozhǔn shì bùtóng de。
The standards for basic unit of a national currency vary by country.
姐姐老是骂她是笨货，连毛衣都不会织。
Jiějie lǎoshì mà tā shì bènhuò，lián máoyī dōu búhuì zhī。
Her elder sister always calls her names, and scolds her for not even being able to knit sweaters.
因为卖假货，这个商场被勒令闭市整顿。
Yīnwéi mài jiǎhuò，zhège shāngchǎng bèi lèlìng bìshì zhěngdùn。
This market place was closed for selling fake products.
中国期货市场面临重大变局。
Zhōngguó qīhuò shìchǎng miànlín zhòngdà biànjú。
The forward market is facing a dramatic change.
为了冬季的货物运输，他们开辟了冰道。
Wèile dōngjì de huòwù yùnshū，tāmen kāipì le bīngdào。
They opened up an ice passage for the transportation of goods in Winter.
他在公司主要负责采运货物。
Tā zài gōngsī zhǔyào fùzé cǎiyùn huòwù。
He is mainly in charge of the purchasing, and transportation of  products.
农妇正在用草绳把货物固定在马车上。
Nóngfù zhèngzài yòng cǎoshéng bǎ huòwù gùdìng zài mǎchē shàng。
A farmwife is fixing cargo to the carriage with straw ropes.
警方查截一辆大货车，发现了很多走私物资。
Jǐngfāng chájié yí liàng dàhuòchē，fāxiàn le hěnduō zǒusī wùzī。
The police detained a large truck and found many smuggled goods.
如发现违禁货物，警方有权查扣。
Rú fāxiàn wéijìn huòwù，jǐngfāng yǒu quán chákòu。
The police have the right to confiscate any forbidden objects they find.
厂方已经向消费者承诺，如有质量问题一律负责退货。
Chǎngfāng yǐjing xiàng xiāofèizhě chéngnuò，rú yǒu zhìliàng wèntí yílǜ fùzé tuìhuò。
The factory has promised to their consumers that all defective goods can be returned.
这些都是刚刚到货的炒青绿茶。
Zhèxiē dōushì gānggāng dàohuò de chǎoqīng lǜchá。
This is the pan-fried green tea that has just arrived.
他什么工作都干不了，真是个吃货。
Tā shénme gōngzuò dōu gànbùliǎo，zhēnshì gè chīhuò。
He is able to do nothing, he really is a good-for-nothing.
我们一定要保证公司的货源充畅。
Wǒmen yídìng yào bǎozhèng gōngsī de huòyuán chōngchàng。
We must make sure that the supply of goods in our company is sufficient and smooth.
警察在毒贩出货的时候将他们抓获。
Jǐngchá zài dúfàn chūhuò de shíhou jiāng tāmen zhuāhuò。
The police arrested the drug dealers in the act.
除月到了，大伙儿都开始置备年货了。
Chúyuè dào le，dàhuǒr dōu kāishǐ zhìbèi niánhuò le。
December of the lunar calendar has arrived, and every family begins to purchase special items for Spring Festival.
老板决定把这批货物船运出境。
Lǎobǎn juédìng bǎ zhè pī huòwù chuányùn chūjìng。
The boss decided to ship this batch of goods abroad.
你去查一下存本，看看我们的货物还剩多少。
Nǐ qù chá yíxià cúnběn，kànkàn wǒmen de huòwù hái shèng duōshǎo。
Go and check the reference files to see how many goods are left in stock.
货物的存量已经明显不足。
Huòwù de cúnliàng yǐjing míngxiǎn bùzú。
There is an obvious shortage in the amount in stock of the goods.
我们公司将开始办理货物存取业务。
Wǒmen gōngsī jiāng kāishǐ bànlǐ huòwù cúnqǔ yèwù。
Our company will start a new business storing and delivering goods.
这些货物，打总你都带回去吧。
Zhèxiē huòwù，dǎzǒng nǐ dōu dài huíqù ba。
You can take these goods back together.
这几箱大件货物我找专车运吧。
Zhè jǐ xiāng dàjiàn huòwù wǒ zhǎo zhuānchē yùn ba。
I will call another truck to ship these bulky boxes of goods.
这个库里的货物需要全部倒仓。
Zhège kù lǐ de huòwù xūyào quánbùdǎocāng。
All the goods in the storeroom need to be transferred to another.
犯罪分子盗运的这批货已被警方截获。
Fànzuì fènzǐ dàoyùn de zhè pī huò yǐ bèi jǐngfāng jiéhuò。
The goods illegally transported by criminals have been intercepted by the police.
这排货架上摆放的都是低盐食品。
Zhè pái huòjià shàng bǎifàng de dōushì dīyán shípǐn。
Low-salt food is stored on this row of storage racks.
他到处兜卖这些积压货物。
Tā dàochù dōumài zhèxiē jīyā huòwù。
He sells surplus goods everywhere.
这位作家的新书刚一上市就成了独门热货。
Zhèwèi zuòjiā de xīnshū gāng yí shàngshì jiùchéng le dúmén rèhuò。
The writer\'s new book turned out a best-seller as soon as it hit the market.
主渠道货源紧张啊，我们只好又从二渠道进了一些。
Zhǔqúdào huòyuán jǐnzhāng a，wǒmen zhǐhǎo yòu cóng èrqúdào jìn le yìxiē。
The main source of supply cannot meet our demands so we have to take from other sources.
小王，你把这批货发运到山东吧。
Xiǎo Wáng，nǐ bǎ zhè pī huò fāyùn dào Shāndōng ba。
Would you please send this load of goods to Shandong.
那些走私货物被港务局扣押了。
Nàxiē zǒusī huòwù bèi gǎngwùjú kòuyā le。
Those smuggled goods have been detained by the port office.
一辆货车不小心碰到了隔离墩上。
Yí liàng huòchē bùxiǎoxīn pèngdào le gélídūn shàng。
A truck accidentally ran into the side of the road.
民国时期，光洋是主要货币。
Mínguó shíqī，guāngyáng shì zhǔyào huòbì。
During the time of the Republic of China, the silver dollar was the major currency.
改革开放之初，广货很受大家欢迎。
Gǎigé kāifàng zhīchū，guǎnghuò hěnshòu dàjiā huānyíng。
At the early stage of China\'s reform and opening up to the outside world, goods produced in Guangdong province were very popular among customers.
这些都是行货，不要欺骗我。
Zhèxiē dōushì hánghuò，búyào qīpiàn wǒ。
Don\'t try to cheat me, all these goods are roughly processed.
这座大型市场汇聚了各地的货物。
Zhèzuò dàxíng shìchǎng huìjù le gè dì de huòwù。
Commodities from all places are gathered in this large market.
小刚家是做物流生意的，一发货就有十火车皮之多。
Xiǎo Gāng jiā shì zuò wùliú shēngyì de，yì fāhuò jiù yǒu shí huǒchēpí zhī duō。
Xiao Gang\'s family are in the logistics trade, and they deliver as many as ten railway cars of goods every time they do business.
有了新的货架，商品更容易摆放整齐了。
Yǒu le xīn de huòjià，shāngpǐn gèng róngyì bǎifàng zhěngqí le。
It is easier to place commodities in order on the new storage racks.
这个货架是他自己装的，骑自行车时可以放很多东西。
Zhège huòjià shì tā zìjǐ zhuāng de，qí zìxíngchē shí kěyǐ fàng hěnduō dōngxi。
He fixed this rack himself. A lot of things can be put into it while he is biking.
他每天走街串巷都挑着他的货郎担。
Tā měitiān zǒujiē chuàn xiàng dōu tiāo zhe tā de huòlángdàn。
He carries his vendor stand and wanders about the streets every day.
小时候一听到货郎鼓就知道卖东西的来了。
Xiǎoshíhou yì tīngdào huòlánggǔ jiù zhīdào màidōngxī de lái le。
In my childhood, I knew that sellers were coming the moment I heard their rattle-drum.
由于您没有预定，现在这里的货位已经满了，请你再找一家吧。
Yóuyú nín méiyǒu yùdìng，xiànzài zhèlǐ de huòwèi yǐjing mǎn le，qǐng nǐ zài zhǎo yìjiā ba。
Since you don\'t have a reservation, the goods yard here is already full. Please find another one.
中国古代在边境地区也有大量货殖的纪录。
Zhōngguó gǔdài zài biānjìng dìqū yě yǒu dàliàng huòzhí de jìlù。
There are also many records of trade at the Chinese border in ancient times.
在中国古代经商的人往往被称作“货殖”。
Zài Zhōngguó gǔdài jīngshāng de rén wǎngwǎng bèi chēngzuò“huòzhí”。
In ancient China, people engaged in trade were often called &quot;merchants&quot;.
请于十点到火车站交卸货物。
Qǐng yú shí diǎn dào huǒchēzhàn jiāoxiè huòwù。
Please go the train station at ten o\'clock to pick up the goods.
那批货物交运了吗？
Nà pī huòwù jiāoyùn le ma？
Has that batch of goods been transported?
一批走私货物被海关截查了。
Yì pī zǒusī huòwù bèi hǎiguān jiéchá le。
A number of smuggled products were captured by customs officers.
金锭、银锭、银票曾是古人的货币。
Jīndìng、yíndìng、yínpiào céngshì gǔrén de huòbì。
The gold ingot, silver ingot and notes are ancient currencies.
这批货他打算低于进价出售。
Zhè pī huò tā dǎsuàn dīyú jìnjià chūshòu。
He decided to sell the products at a price lower than his  purchasing price.
仓库里存着贵重货物，咱们晚上睡觉要警醒些。
Cāngkù lǐ cúnzhe guìzhòng huòwù，zánmen wǎnshàng shuìjiào yào jǐngxǐng xiē。
We must be alert when we sleep and watch over the valuable goods in the garage.
春节快到了，大家在竞购年货。
Chūnjié kuàidào le，dàjiā zài jìnggòu niánhuò。
People vie with each other in making special purchases for Spring Festival.
作为一名售货员，对顾客要掬诚以待。
Zuòwéi yìmíng shòuhuòyuán，duì gùkè yào jūchéng yǐdài。
A salesperson should be sincere and polite to customers.
这些金锞子在古代是货币，在现在则成了很好的收藏品。
Zhèxiē jīnkèzi zài gǔdài shì huòbì，zài xiànzài zé chéng le hěnhǎo de shōucángpǐn。
These small gold ingots were money in ancient times, and are precious relics nowadays.
这是批快货，应该再进一些！
Zhè shì pī kuàihuò，yīnggāi zài jìn yìxiē！
This is quick-selling merchandises. We should stock more.
店里的苹果已经亏短了，需要补货！
Diàn lǐ de píngguǒ yǐjing kuīduǎn le，xūyào bǔhuò！
The apples in the store are insufficient so we need to purchase more.
他把小车换成大车就是为了揽货方便。
Tā bǎ xiǎochē huànchéng dàchē jiùshì wèi le lǎnhuò fāngbiàn。
He changed the small truck for a big one in order to ship goods more conveniently.
这个货比较冷背，上市以来销路就不好。
Zhège huò bǐjiào lěngbèi，shàngshì yǐlái xiāolù jiù bùhǎo。
The product is slow-moving. Ever since it was put into market, it hasn\'t sold well.
过年买的年货太多，把挺大的冷柜都塞满了。
Guònián mǎi de niánhuò tài duō，bǎ tǐngdà de lěngguì dōu sāimǎn le。
We have bought too many special purchases for the Spring Festival, and crammed the big refrigerator.
我们商店的库房里积压着大量冷门货，正准备降价销售。
Wǒmen shāngdiàn de kùfáng lǐ jīyā zhe dàliàng lěngmén huò，zhèng zhǔnbèi jiàngjià xiāoshòu。
In our depot, there overstocks a lot of outdated goods. We are preparing to sell them at a lowered price.
你的货一到，我们立地发款。
Nǐ de huò yí dào，wǒmen lìdì fākuǎn。
Once your goods arrive, we will pay immediately.
仓库中凌杂地堆放着各种货物。
Cāngkù zhōng língzá de duīfàng zhe gèzhǒng huòwù。
Different kinds of merchandise are piled up disorderly in the storehouse.
这些货物太少了，只能零担运输了。
Zhèxiē huòwù tài shǎo le，zhǐnéng língdān yùnshū le。
There are so few goods that you have less than a carload.
仓库里还有2万元的毛货没有销售出去。
Cāngkù lǐ háiyǒu liǎngwànyuán de máohuò méiyǒu xiāoshòu chūqù。
There are still 20,000 yuan worth of unsold woolens remaining in the storehouse.
警方查获了一批毛货大衣。
Jǐngfāng cháhuò le yì pī máohuò dàyī。
The police tracked down and seized a batch of woolen overcoats.
已经有几艘货轮锚泊在这个港湾里了。
Yǐjīng yǒu jǐ sōu huòlún máobó zài zhège gǎngwān lǐ le。
There are already several cargo vessels anchored in the harbour.
我们公司的货轮在这个港口有固定的锚位。
Wǒmen gōngsī de huòlún zài zhège gǎngkǒu yǒu gùdìng de máowèi。
Our company\'s cargo vessels have fixed anchorages in the harbour.
这些货物都是用闷罐车运输的，绝对安全。
Zhèxiē huòwù dōushì yòng mènguànchē yùnshū de，juéduì ānquán。
These goods are transported by boxcar, which can ensure absolute safety.
每到年根，大家就要忙着采购年货了。
Měidào niángēn，dàjiā jiùyào máng zhe cǎigòu niánhuò le。
At the end of each year, people are busy doing Spring Festival shopping.
盘运这么多货物，我们至少还需要8个帮手。
Pányùn zhèmeduō huòwù，wǒmen zhìshǎo hái xūyào bāgè bāngshǒu。
We need at least eight helpers to move so many goods.
本周的期货市场，因为有人恶意抛盘而显得震荡不稳。
Běnzhōu de qīhuò shìchǎng，yīnwèiyǒurén èyì pāopán ér xiǎnde zhèndàng bùwěn。
This week\'s option market seemed to have fluctuated because somebody was selling maliciously.
这批货物要先走水路，到天津以后再起旱。
Zhè pī huòwù yào xiān zǒu shuǐlù，dào Tiānjīn yǐhòu zài qǐhàn。
This batch of goods shall be firstly delivered by water, and then by land after Tianjin.
他的货币收藏品中，有几张是清代的钱票。
Tā de huòbì shōucángpǐn zhōng，yǒu jǐzhāng shì Qīngdài de qiánpiào。
There are some notes from the Qing dynasty among his money collection.
现在增强免疫力的中药成了抢手货。
Xiànzài zēngqiáng miǎnyìlì de zhōng yào chéng le qiǎngshǒuhuò。
Now traditional Chinese medicine to improve one\'s immunity has become a fast-selling product.
今天下午公司要清库盘点货物。
Jīntiān xiàwǔ gōngsī yào qīngkù pándiǎn huòwù。
The company will make an inventory of the warehouse this afternoon.
你把这批货物运过这个区段就行了。
Nǐ bǎ zhè pī huòwù yùnguò zhège qūduàn jiù xíng le。
You shall just deliver the cargos through this sector.
他穿的那件深黄色西装，一看就是名牌货。
Tā chuān de nà jiàn shēn huángsè xīzhuāng，yí kàn jiùshì míngpáihuò。
At first sight, you can see that the dark yellow suit he\'s wearing is of a famous brand.
过年以前我到食品街采购了许多吃食、年货。
Guònián yǐqián wǒ dào shípǐnjiē cǎigòu le xǔduō chīshí、niánhuò。
Before the new year, I bought a lot of foodstuffs and special commodities for the Spring Festival in Food Street.
那边有个售货亭，我去那儿买瓶水喝。
Nàbiān yǒu gè shòuhuòtíng，wǒ qù nàr mǎi píng shuǐ hē。
There is a sales booth there, I\'ll go to buy a bottle of water.
把那个抬筐拿过来，你俩把这些货物抬到车上去。
Bǎ nàge táikuāng náguòlái，nǐliǎ bǎ zhèxiē huòwù táidào chēshàng qù。
Bring that big basket here, carry all the goods to the truck.
他的摊床上摆满了要甩卖的货物。
Tā de tānchuáng shàng bǎimǎn le yào shuǎimài de huòwù。
There are many goods marked down for sale on the stand he has just set up.
这个市场内有上百个摊档，货物比较齐全。
Zhège shìchǎng nèi yǒu shàngbǎi gè tāndàng，huòwù bǐjiào qíquán。
There are more than a hundred stalls in this market, and a huge variety of goods.
今天我买了很多衣服，都是剔庄货，特别便宜。
Jīntiān wǒ mǎi le hěnduō yīfu，dōushì tīzhuānghuò，tèbié piányí。
I bought many clothes today, which were all sold at reduced prices.
我国经济已经出现了通货紧缩的迹象，必须及时加以控制。
Wǒ guó jīngjì yǐjing chūxiàn le tōnghuò jǐnsuō de jì xiàng，bìxū jíshí jiāyǐ kòngzhì。
The economy is showing signs of deflation, which should be curbed in time.
这次加息的主要目的是为了抑制通货膨胀的出现。
Zhècì jiāxī de zhǔyào mùdì shì wéi le yìzhì tōnghuò péngzhàng de chūxiàn。
The increase in interest rates this time is for the purpose of preventing inflation.
铜元曾经作为货币一度流通。
Tóngyuán céngjīng zuòwéi huòbì yídù liútōng。
Copper coins were once in circulation as money.
我新买进的蔬菜都是统货。
Wǒ xīn mǎijìn de shūcài dōushì tǒnghuò。
The vegetables I just bought are all ungraded goods.
期货市场可能是这笔资金的最佳投向。
Qīhuò shìchǎng kěnéng shì zhè bǐ zījīn de zuìjiā tóu xiàng。
The futures market may be the best investment place for this capital.
与外货相比较，我们的国产品牌也并不差！
Yǔ wàihuò xiāng bǐjiào，wǒmen de guóchǎn pǐnpái yě bìng búchà！
Our national brands are not worse than those foreign ones!
榴莲是外来货，但好多人很喜欢吃。
Liúlián shì wàiláihuò，dàn hǎo duō rén hěnxǐhuan chī。
Durian is imported from foreign countries, but many people like eating it very much.
街角这家水果店的货架上摆满了鲜润的水果。
Jiējiǎo zhè jiā shuǐguǒdiàn de huòjià shàng bǎimǎn le xiānrùn de shuǐguǒ。
The racks in this fruit store are stacked with fresh fruit.
销货渠道畅通才能保证企业的快速发展。
Xiāohuò qúdào chàngtōng cáinéng bǎozhèng qǐyè de kuàisù fāzhǎn。
Only with smooth channels to sell the goods can the enterprise develop at a fast speed.
不用担心，货已经到了，装卸工人正在卸载呢。
Búyòng dānxīn，huò yǐjing dào le，zhuāngxiè gōngrén zhèngzài xièzǎi ne。
Don\'t worry, the goods have arrived and are being unloaded by the workers.
这可是咱压仓的货，你也要拿出去卖吗？
Zhè kěshì zán yācāng de huò，nǐ yěyào ná chūqù mài ma？
This is our ballast. Do you want to sell even this?
你眼皮子也太低了，这样的货色你也要。
Nǐ yǎnpízi yě tài dī le，zhèyàng de huòsè nǐ yě yào。
Your way of looking at things is so cheap, you even want this rubbish.
你什么时候来公司验货啊？
Nǐ shénme shíhou lái gōngsī yànhuò a？
When will you come to our company to inspect goods?
羊城无假货的行动就要开始了，你们参加了吗？
Yángchéng wú jiǎhuò de xíngdòng jiùyào kāishǐ le，nǐmen cānjiā le ma？
The activity &quot;No Fake Products in Yangcheng&quot; is going to start, are you going to attend?
你就是喜欢买样子货，一洗就不行了。
Nǐ jiùshì xǐhuan mǎi yàngzi huò，yì xǐ jiù bùxíng le。
You just like good-looking but useless goods, this one just needs to be washed but it is good quality.
他们都是一路货，你被骗了。
Tāmen dōushì yílùhuò，nǐ bèi piàn le。
They are of one and the same sort, you have been cheated.
市第一百货大楼正在进行小家电商品议售。

开一张定货单让杂货商把东西送来

Wǒmen bìxū quèdìng huòwù shìfǒu fúhé héyuē shàng de miáoshù。
我们必须确定货物是否符合合约上的描述。
In a bimetallistic system both gold and silver can constitute legal tender.
Zài jīnyín èrběnwèi tǐzhì zhōng，huángjīn hé báiyín kěyǐ gòuchéng fǎdìng huòbì。
在金银二本位体制中，黄金和白银可以构成法定货币。
They monetized the lira.
Tāmen bǎ lǐlā dìngwéi fǎdìnghuòbì。
他们把里拉定为法定货币。
to deliver a grocery order
把所定的杂货送去
The grocer priced his wares high.
Zhège záhuòshāng duì tā de huòwù dìngjià piāngāo。
这个杂货商对他的货物定价偏高。
on order
[商] 已定而尚未交货的
The company regularly updates their spot status.
这家公司定期更新其现货状态。

为了抑制居高不下的通货膨胀，内阁决定进口小麦、糖和豆类。

送货员通常按照固定路线送牛奶。

货币的价值是由市场机制决定的。

This is the pan-fried green tea that has just arrived.
小时候一听到货郎鼓就知道卖东西的来了。
Xiǎoshíhou yì tīngdào huòlánggǔ jiù zhīdào màidōngxī de lái le。
In my childhood, I knew that sellers were coming the moment I heard their rattle-drum.
现在货流已经很普及，小的市县也可以及时收到货物。
Xiànzài huòliú yǐjing hěnpǔjí，xiǎo de shìxiàn yě kěyǐ jíshí shōudào huòwù。
Physical distribution is common today. Even small cities and counties can receive goods on time.
这种货到农村正对路。
Zhèzhǒng huò dào nóngcūn zhèng duìlù。
These goods are the very thing the countryside needs.
货到付款
huò dào fùkuǎn
cash on delivery (C.O.D.)
厂家收到了预付款，因此货物如期送到。
Chǎngjiā shōudào le yùfùkuǎn，yīncǐ huòwù rúqī sòngdào。
After receiving the cash before delivery, the factory delivered the goods on time.
你的货一到，我们立地发款。
Nǐ de huò yí dào，wǒmen lìdì fākuǎn。
Once your goods arrive, we will pay immediately.
不出3天货就到了。
Bùchū sāntiān huò jiù dàole。
The goods arrived within three days.
新到的一批货
xīn dào de yìpī huò
a new batch of goods
到火车站提货
dào huǒchēzhàn tíhuò 
pick up goods at the railway station
货物已到，完好无损。
Huòwù yǐ dào，wánhǎowúsǔn。
The goods have arrived in good condition.
能看到这样的宝货真是开了眼界。
Néng kàndào zhèyàng de bǎohuò zhēnshì kāi le yǎnjiè。
It opens one\'s eyes to see such a treasure.
小王，你把这批货发运到山东吧。
Xiǎo Wáng，nǐ bǎ zhè pī huò fāyùn dào Shāndōng ba。
Would you please send this load of goods to Shandong.
把那个抬筐拿过来，你俩把这些货物抬到车上去。
Bǎ nàge táikuāng náguòlái，nǐliǎ bǎ zhèxiē huòwù táidào chēshàng qù。
Bring that big basket here, carry all the goods to the truck.
不用担心，货已经到了，装卸工人正在卸载呢。
Búyòng dānxīn，huò yǐjing dào le，zhuāngxiè gōngrén zhèngzài xièzǎi ne。
Don\'t worry, the goods have arrived and are being unloaded by the workers.
现在市场繁荣，到处都有入眼货。
Xiànzài shìchǎng fánróng，dàochù dōu yǒu rùyǎnhuò。
The market is flourishing, and there are so many things to attract the buyer.
卡车把货物输送到边疆地区。
Kǎchē bǎ huòwù shūsòngdào biānjiāng dìqū。
Commodities are transported to border areas by truck.

Qǐng yú shí diǎn dào huǒchēzhàn jiāoxiè huòwù。

货物一次到位。

Huòwù rúqī yùndào。

她背子里装满了要拿到集市上卖的山货。

Tā dàochù dōumài zhèxiē jīyā huòwù。

chádiǎn cúnhuò

check an inventory list

Wǒmen gōngsī jiāng kāishǐ bànlǐ huòwù cúnqǔ yèwù。
Our company will start a new business storing and delivering goods.

货物的存量已经明显不足。
Huòwù de cúnliàng yǐjing míngxiǎn bùzú。

你去查一下存本，看看我们的货物还剩多少。

The cargo ship will embark the unloaded freight from the draft trucks.
货船将会装载载重卡车卸下的货物。
The tugboat tugged the freighter into the harbor.
拖轮把货船拖进海港了。
A large cargo ship was already getting up steam.
Yìsōu dàxíng huòchuán yǐjīng zài mànmàn jiāsù。
一艘大型货船已经在慢慢加速。
The cargo will be sent by ship, and will not arrive for two to three months.
Yòng chuán yùnshū de huòwù liǎng dào sān zhōu hòu dōu bùnéng dàodá。
用船运输的货物两到三周后都不能到达。
The boats came in and were unloaded and the fish was carted away.
Chuán kāi jìnlái，bǎ huòwù xièxià，zhèxiē yú jiù bèi yòngchē zhuāngzǒu le。
船开进来，把货物卸下，这些鱼就被用车装走了。
Cargo discharged from the vessel Ruth was the first handled by the new machine.
Cóng Lǔsī chuánshàng xièxià de huòwù shì xīn jīqì chǔlǐ dì-yī pī de huòwù。
从鲁斯船上卸下的货物是新机器处理第一批的货物。
The weight of the documentation of all the consignments on board a contemporary container ship can exceed 90 pounds.
Zhuāng zài yì sōu xiàndài jízhuāngxiāngchuán shàng de suǒyǒu huòwù de wénjiàn zhòngliàng kě chāoguò 90 bàng。
装在一艘现代集装箱船上的所有货物的文件重量可超过90磅。
Outstanding payments will be transferred to your account after the cargo ship arrived.
未付的货款将在船到岸后划入你的帐户。
The cargo was manifested in the captain\'s log.
这些货物被记入了船长的记录。
All ships entering or leaving this port must manifest their cargo.
所有进出这个港口的船只必须登记其运载的货物。

customs declaration for imports and exports
